The three decide to tie your mother back up, and leave her under a pile of their sweaty socks (it's a wonder how they got so many) to go investigate. You see them heading towards the entrance of the factory. It may be time to strike...
12131121122112112211.title: At the old abandoned cookie factory!

choices: You leap after Darla and ruin her first
You decide to quickly take down Alice first
121311211221121122111.content: As the three girls exit the factory, you leap down from your perch at a nearby building with a flip. You land firmly in front of the three into a crouch, slowly standing up. The darkness of night gives you a shadowy intimidating figure. "Wh....what?! Hawkboy?! No fucking way! Grrr, no fucking way!!" She angrily stomps her bare foot several times. Your eyes casually trail to her sexy french pedicure but you stay on focus. "Hawkboy is no more. You left him for dead back in that house. I'm his replacement....Hawkman. Your reign of evil and sweet treats are over!". A bit of cheesyness never hurt any superhero. Alice scowls. "Yeah whatever Hawk"man". You should just give up. Super Heroes are overrated. Hawkboy was a testimony to your failure. Darla, go in there and RUIN hawkboy's mom. We'll take care of this guy..."
121311211221121122111.title: You leap down and confront them head on

choices: The Adventures of Hawkman
1213112112211211221111.content: As soon as begin to shift her body back towards the warehouse you were in motion. You darted over the Troup Squad in a swift flip, causing them to look up in awe. You'd come down with a powerful drop kick right onto Darla's shoulder, causing her to fall to the ground. Her shoulder was definitely dislocated, her collarbone broken, and she completely unconscious. "Shit!!!" Alice complained as she took a step back from Hawkman. "Go get her Amy!" Amy would rush forward with a sudden jumpkick. You saw it come at you in slow motion, and you could've easily dodged...but the allure of her dirty foot was strong. It's pugnant oder stung more than the kick to the face, causing you to stumble back. Alice followed up with a double kick to your face, knocking you back to the ground. Some Hawkman you turned out to be. She puts her full weight on your face with her bare feet, giving you a strong erection beneath your costume cup. "Too-easy..." Alice said in triumph when suddenly you had enough. You'd swiftly pull your body out from under her, causing her to topple to the ground. But you weren't done yet. You'd rise, and catch her by her ankles in mid-fall,before tossing her into the now charging Amy. Both fell to the ground knocked unconscious. "Is this...is this the power of Hawkman...?" You couldn't help but say to yourself looking down at your hands again. You'd grip them into fists before rushing off to deal with your mother. You'd explain to her the situation, and let her know you had to fake your death to protect her. Before you were only an average boy, but now you felt like it was time to just be Hawkman, and make a return to footopolis. You'd make your final sad goodbyes before preparing for your triumphant return. You also masturbate for hours on end to the many socks of the Troop Squad that you managed to sneak out after their arrest. It seemed as if the future was looking bright...
1213112112211211221111.title: You leap after Darla and ruin her first

choices: Investigate At The Docks!
More Options!
12131121122112112211111.content:
Victory, at last.
The feeling was grand and majestic, heartfelt and accomplished, like you had come back from a near crippling injury to win the Olympics, a noble feat in that of itself. And in the way, you did win the Olympics, maybe not physically, but mentally, in your heart, you beat the others, you rose from the ashes, and you went back at him, a hero reborn, a Hawk Boy reborn.
Now, you’re Hawk Man, the successor to the already famed crime fighter, with an even bigger chip on your shoulder. Defeating the Troop Squad, child’s play, they worked well as a time, but once you took one of them out, the human pyramid crumbled right down. Alice, Darla, Amy, are now serving hard time in three separate jail cells right now, but those are the monsters inside of the prison, the ones who can’t get out. Now, you need to worry about the monsters outside.
There are still numerous bad guys out there, some with extra incentive to get you now that the secrets out. That means no more time out, no more changing back into civilian mode. No more hiding. Not so good for them, right?
Heck, your journey back to prominence wouldn't even be complete without taking out the person who started it all: Madam Reich. You haven't seen the Nazi supremacist since she nearly crippled you on the rooftop, driving her boot down and down into your body, crushing your bones into Play-Doh under her heel, then smearing it away like much stained on her polished sole. What hurt even more than the physical punishment was the humiliation that followed, that empty, almost helpless feeling that for once, you couldn’t overcome, you couldn’t prevail, and now the people of Footropolis were paying for your mistakes. You could still picture her triumphant smirk curl on her bloodstained lips as she brought her boot down on your back, stomping up and down, again and again until you couldn’t even feel your legs. That same taunting sneer never faded from your mind, taunting you every minute on from then, almost eating at you from the inside out like a cancer you couldn’t cure. You spent a long time stuck in that wheelchair, thinking, almost plotting in your mind the things, the many things you would do to that woman should you walk again. Now, well, things change, people change. You’re not that same submissive, naive little boy who she could intimidate into licking her boots, no this time, she’ll be the one who won’t get back up, she’ll be the one begging for mercy, she’ll be the one who can’t feel her legs. But, she won’t be the only one, there’s still work to be done cleaning Footropolis of the criminal scum. The night is young, and so are you.

Recently, there have been reports of a disturbance in the North Bay Docks, usually the fishermen who go by there daily have reported what seemed to be gunshots cracking in the night, usually accompanied by what sounded to them to be cherry bombs going off. The police have checked, but they couldn’t find anything. Sounds like her work. Reich’s been pretty quiet lately, almost too quiet. There’s a calm before a storm, and with someone so sadistic and emotionless as Reich, there’s no telling the storm she’s cooked up for Footroplis. Too big of a risk to leave out. You should go investigate, checkout the noise, and if possible, bring the fiend to justice. Of course, she won't be alone. She'll have her men with her, a little safety precaution for the paranoid Madam after word got out that you were back and better than ever. She knows that you're coming, and won't stop until she's behind bars, and you gotta give her credit, she's smarter than she looks. They'll probably be armed, and just waiting to clip your wings, permanently. Taking them out is easy, fighting her face to face should be interesting. After all, she's the one who crippled you in the first place, why not repay the favor?
12131121122112112211111.title: The Adventures of Hawkman

choices: You open the door, you have come this far, why turn back now.
You get as close to the door as you can to listen for sounds from within.
121311211221121122111111.content: You make your way to the docks to find a warehouse at the location your sources had provided as the hub of Madame Reich's recent criminal activity. As you approach, you notice a portion of the roof is made of glass windows that can be easily removed. You scale the building and enter through the windows to find yourself on a catwalk overlooking an enormous room with many storage containers being prepared to be shipped, presumably to Germany you think. Silently making your way across the catwalk you notice the distinct lack of action occurring in the warehouse. There is not another sound being made throughout the building, at least to your knowledge. Finally, as you reach the end of the catwalk you take a spiral staircase down to the main level. There, you see a door with a red light emanating from beneath it. Within this door, you suspect is Madame Reich.
121311211221121122111111.title: Investigate At The Docks!

choices: Kneeling at the feet of Madame Reich.... again
You look for anything on the door or walls that might help you escape.
1213112112211211221111111.content: You confidently throw open the door to find a long room that looks more like a hallway. The light you saw escaping through the door, you now realize was created by rows of candles being held on the walls of this room. The candles outline a long red walkway that reachest on for about 30 yards. At the end of this walkway are three solitary red steps reaching up to a platform. Sitting atop this platform, perched on a solid gold throne is Madame Reich. As your eyes meet the figure at the end of the room you feel your heart skip a few beats and the submissive feelings that you thought you had conquered begin to flush back in. The confident Hawkman who and opened the door all of a sudden feels like a distant memory. You flash back to the images and visceral feelings, memories of kissing the boots of the woman staring at you from across this room. The feeling of humiliation and strange satisfaction that it gave you to completely put yourself at the mercy of this vision of pure evil. Moreso, you see her in her jackboots, a full skin tight leather outfit, and a fur shawl. After what feels like forever, you finally regain some composure and begin to walk down the hallway. As you do, you hear the door slam behind you and a glass barrier fall from the ceiling in front of you, effectively sealing you in to the small part of the room from which you entered. "Hello pet, I've been waiting for you," Madame Reich says with a sadistic grin. "Ever since I heard you had recovered I knew it was only a matter of time until you came for me. I knew you couldn't resist the feeling of being beneath me. You live for it." With a slight sense of panic, you respond "if that's honestly why you think I'm here than you're crazier than I thought. I'm here to put a stop to you, for good." Madame Reich laughs as she responds, "Oh my pet, you have so much to learn. But don't worry, you will be worshipping me once again very soon." As she said this, a set of silver shackles fell from a compartment into the portion of the room Hawkman was standing in. "Now, boy, you will strip all of your clothes except your mask, put on the shackles, and crawl to me." Stunned, you respond "and why would I do any of that? I'm here to stop you, not put myself in the same position that got me in a wheelchair." "Well, for one, you WILL obey, because your mistress has instructed you so. And two, because with every breath you take from within that chamber you are one breath closer to death unless you comply like a good little boy." With those words, you finally notice why your breathing had started becoming so labored. It's not from the nerves, it's because there is no oxygen coming into your part of the room. So now you have to decide, do I try to find a way out? Or do I comply with the instructions and try to find a way out after getting out of this most immediate threat.
1213112112211211221111111.title: You open the door, you have come this far, why ...

choices: Go After Frostbite!
Go After Mighty Mouth and Jester!
121311211221121122111112.content:
1. As enticing as that sounds, Madam Reich is not the only one who needs to learn to “chill out”, no pun intended. Frostbite, one of the more notorious criminals, is out and about in the city. She’s been on a little shopping spree lately, taking deposits of thousands of dollars stored away in bank vaults away from the good citizens, and she needs to be stopped. Her meta human abilities grant her the ability to create ice-coated objects seemingly out of thin air, a dangerous trait that should mark her as a highly dangerous individual. There have been police calls around that area that she’s in the midst of robbing one of the a weapons storage facility in downtown Footropolis, which houses more than just weapons of mass destruction. Her freeze gun is still locked in there somewhere, and she won’t stop at nothing to obtain it, even at the cost of human life. The thing can not only enhance, but amplify her freezing power, able to freeze whole crowds of people at one time. She’ll be unstoppable with it. Personal hatred for Reich aside, should Frostbite get her freeze gun back, the city itself could be undergoing a second ice age.This cold-hearted fatale is on the loose, and she needs to be put on ice, permanently.

2. Then, there’s the tag team of Mighty Mouth and Jester, two already combustible elements. Mighty Mouth is the epitome of the ultimate temptation, someone who could lure you in with her luscious, curvaceous body, then drain you of your dignity, your strength, but most importantly, your super power. She’s essentially a leech, someone who’s brought even the most stoic heroes down with her body and mind. Tackling her would be a battle, tackling them both would be a war. Jester is an enigma by herself, no one knows much about her past really. You've read files saying that she used to be some sideshow act in Gotham City, but nothing revealing of why she decided to be a villainess. Regardless, she’s tough to beat, tougher to figure out. Dressed from head to toe in clown wear, the twenty-one year old is dangerous, even without her toys. You've been on the receiving end of her little gadgets she stores in her belt once before, and they’re not exactly a joke. She preys on the innocent of laugh, giggling and laughing, until the punch line comes in. Fighting her would be a challenge, fighting them both, unlikely but not impossible. They’re in the midst of robbing the First Bank down the corner right now. Reports are saying that they've got hostages as well, meaning that this isn't the usual job. Make a mistake, and those people might have to suffer the consequences of your actions. Those two need a first-class ticket for two back to the prison, and you’d be obliged to punch the tickets.

Who Will You Tackle Next?
121311211221121122111112.title: More Options!

choices: You use the ceiling to prevent arousing suspicion!
Reader's Choice
1213112112211211221111121.content:
Getting in was the easy part.
After all, they practically left the skylight wide open for you.
And as you pried the window up, and slid your slender yet agile body underneath the glass, your body was absolutely beaming radiating with confidence. You hadn't expected it to be that easy yo get inside the weapons warehouse, especially with the police perimeter outside.
Your boots clanged softly against the metal catwalk as you silently dropped down.
“So far, so good,” you thought to yourself, which were always an indication that things were about to go wrong.
Instinctively darting your eyes from left to right, you found no other company on the walkway, and your muscles instantly relaxed. The tensed look on your face quickly brightened, as you casually walked across the metallic walkway, surveying the environment around you.
A couple of ceiling lights above barely managed to illuminate the room, but enough that you were able to recognize what area of the facility you were in.
It was the central loading bay, and an abandoned one at that. Entire rows of forklifts stood unmanned, their metallic blades glimmering. Giant crates formed entire mountains, and the rusty conveyor belts noisily creaked to life, slowly transporting objects from one point to another. The sound of machinery quickly livened the place up, but only just. It was still devoid of any human activity, at least for now.
Leaning on the railing, you briefly surveyed the equipment being processed and transported throughout the area.
You narrowed your eyes as you read the labels attached to some of the crates being processed through the machine belt. One in particular read “Evidence of military-grade bombing equipment, procured from a safe house owned by “Jenny’s Schnitzel.” You knew that “Jenny’s Schnitzel” was just code-name for one of Madam Reich’s various hideouts through Footroplis, the business itself was simply a cover. Another crate read “Evidence of Super-Criminal, Jester”, one of your more notorious adversaries.
Just when things couldn't be any more calmer, your sudden respite was broken by the sounds of electronic doors sliding open to your right.
You instinctively took cover against the railing, your eyes peering intently through the metal bars as two of Frostbite’s henchgirls suddenly became visible.
Knowing that Frostbite was no slouch when it came to these heists, you had a growing suspicion that she had brought her “snow-girls” with her, a group of female adolescent delinquents who seemed to share in her sadistic methods. Armed with her standard freeze guns, they were deadly alone, but almost unstoppable together.
These two however, were unarmed, and by the looks of it, unaware of their presence. Clad with Frostbite's signature snowy-white Eskimo jackets, their legs were bare save for a pair of blue Uggs, which caused your eyes to involuntarily glare at.
“Can you believe how much that last hostage screamed when we almost froze his fingers off?” one of them laughed.
Your right hand clenched angrily, realizing that they were torturing their hostages. And by the sound of their voices, they weren't too apologetic about it.
“Yeah, I’m surprised he didn't break the ice with a high pitch like that,” she agreed.
They walked in front of a conveyor belt, pausing for a moment to watch the crates move past them.
“So what’s the plan now?” she prompted.
“For now, nothing. Frostbite wants us to keep any eye over this place, make sure all the exits are covered. The last thing we need is Stupid Girl or whatever her name is trying to break in here and ruin our plans,” she explained.
Sensing that their attention was now completely devoted to the conveyor belt, you silently lifted yourself over the railing and dropped to the ground below. Aside from some initial stumbling, they failed to notice you.
Now crouching, you began silently approaching the oblivious henchgirls.
“I doubt that. Ever since Hawk-Boy got his wings clipped by Reich, the super-zeroes in Footroplis have taken a step back. Figured that if Hawk-Boy couldn't hack it, why should they?” she smirked arrogantly.
Now inches away from that, you stood up to your full height, as they continued talking.
“I guess you’re right, but that brat’s got more lives than a cat. Put me and him in a room together for five minutes, and I’d make him squeal like a little bit-” she started to say, before you quickly shut her up.
In one swift motion, you grabbed both of their heads and slammed them against each other, causing their eyes to roll to to the back of their heads. Their backs slumped against each other as they slid to the ground, fading into unconsciousness.
Smirking at your luck, you turned to the door that they originally entered from, only to find it equipped with a keycard scanner.
You pondered ways to get through, seeing how there was no security override attached to it.
“Well, maybe they can help me,” you suddenly thought to yourself, before crouching down next to them
Reaching into one of their jacket pockets, you felt something rectangular touch your fingers, and held it up to your eyes, revealing a golden keycard.
You walked up to the machine, and held the scanner up to the designated area, smiling when the machine read “access granted”, the electronic doors sliding open.
Now entering a narrow, metallic corridor, your eyes instinctively scanned the area ahead of you. Aside from a few crates stacked along the corners, the hallway was relatively deserted, that is, until you noticed some voices ahead of you.
Cautiously approaching the direction of the voices, your hand slid down your side, reaching into your utility belt and drawing your signature Hawk-Disc, a circular blunt projectile capable of incapacitating enemies from close-to-medium range.
Just as the voices got louder and you approached the end of the hallway where it suddenly veered to the right, you took cover behind the corner, the Hawk-Disc firm in your hands.
You briefly peered over your shoulder, making out three of Frostbite’s Snow-Girls, along with a single hostage. You gritted your teeth angrily as they circled around his grounded body, his face riddled with various bruises and cuts. Judging by his uniform, he was a security guard, and one who had gotten himself into some trouble.
Of course, the only thing stopping you from rescuing him were the familiar flashes of brand new assault rifles.
Two of them were armed with assault rifles, the polish alone making them seem brand-new. The third was seated atop a crate, facing the security guard. Your eyes briefly stayed towards the one sitting atop the crate, who had removed her Ugg and instead rolled her ankle sorely. You could just make out her bare foot, her toes adorned appropriately in icy blue nail polish.
“Must be one of her new requirements,” you remarked to yourself, as you attempted to form a battle strategy.
“So what are we waiting for? Let’s just kill the rat and get back to patrol,” one of them pressed, her voice weary likely from arguing.
“What, and miss out? No, I think this one needs to suffer a little longer,” the seated Snow-Girl smiled, before caressing his bruised head with her bare foot, laughing as he cringed.
“Kelly, even I’m starting to get bored. This idiot here tried to escape, thinking that we wouldn’t notice, and got what was coming to him. Now, lets finish him off and get back to the group. my stomach is growling,” one of them complained.
“Not now, Brie. I almost rolled my ankle trying to catch him. And my foot’s been dying to get out of these Uggs since we first got here. And besides Hun, I think I’m enjoying this a little too much to put a bullet through his cute little head,” Kelly purred seductively, laughing as he squirmed, still struggling against his bonds.
“You’re starting to creep me out a bit, Kelly,” one of them commented, and Kelly merely shrugged.
“Now look hun, these girls want to kill you, but I think that everyone deserves a second chance. If you want to life, you need to make me feel better. And I think a nice, long kiss on my little piggies would do the trick, wouldn’t you agree?” she purred, hovering her bare foot above his head, taunting him as her toes tickled his bruised cheek.
“Screw you!” he replied defiantly, his voice cracking but firm.
“Tsk tsk, I think I’m gonna have to hurt you a little more until you agree,” she smiled, before raising her foot dramatically.
“Do your worst,” he spat, almost resigning to his fate.
“Oh don’t worry darling, I haven’t even begun,” she smiled, before stomping down hard on his face. The sound of flesh slamming against bone echoed throughout the room, as the man howled in pain. You could barely make out blood seeping out of his nose, indicating a broken nose, but more importantly, a broken man.
“Yeah, well you have fun! I’m gonna check on Dee and Dee, make sure they didn't get lost in the loading bay,” one of them said, before turning towards your direction.
Cold sweat started trickling down your neck, as you found yourself fumbling for a plan. Obviously, you couldn't confront them head-on, especially against armed hostiles. Sure, you might be able to catch one of them off-guard, but the others will have their guns trained on you the second they snap out of it.
And turning back now wasn't an option. They were brutalizing an innocent man, and your morals wouldn't allow for you to simply bypass him. You had to save him. The only problem was that you didn't know how.
Your eyes frantically scanned the room for any environmental advantages, before the biggest one of all revealed itself off your peripheral vision.
Her footsteps drawing nearer, you looked up with a wide smile as you looked up at the ceiling. A metal grating was attached to the ceiling, allowing for your gloves to latch on too. Your sudden realization of this couldn't be any sooner, because within moments your position would be compromised.
You knew what you had to do, and you had to do it now.
1213112112211211221111121.title: Go After Frostbite!

choices: You block the kick barely, and fight back!
Game Over! Kelly brutalizes you, ending your mission!
12131121122112112211111211.content:
Jumping to the ceiling wasn't as difficult as you expected. You used a nearby crate to launch yourself within reaching distance, and with a good jump your fingers grabbed on to the metal net, allowing you to literally stick to the wall. Thankfully, weeks of cardio and weightlifting gave you the edge you needed, and with ease, lifted your entire body up to the net. The toe of your boot managed to cling on to the net, successfully housing your body-weight.
That was the easy part.
The hard part was staying on.
Your fingers nearly slipped, but held firm, at least for now. You wore gloves, but even they were starting to slip. Your arms soon became wobbly nevertheless, and gravity began to factor in to your predicament.
Your torso naturally wanted to bend towards the ground, but it took nearly all of your willpower just to stay up. Sweat drenched through your mask, as your strained cries had to be suppressed through gritted teeth and grim determination.
Still, your plan worked, as the first Snow-Girl turned around the corner, only to find no trace of your prior existence. She merely shrugged nonchalantly, before continuing on her way. You were thankful that she declined even checking her surroundings, something that even you would've done. The top of her snow-white hood soon passed you, causing you to sigh in relief.
Of course, like most of your plan, it seemed to go all wrong just when it couldn't have gone better.
Your own relief might’ve been your own downfall, as you loosened your arm muscles just when it seemed like she was on her way out.
Your right glove dramatically slipped off of the metal grating, causing it to flail frantically in the air for a few seconds before you garnered the strength to pull it back up to the ceiling.
Unfortunately for you, that might’ve given away your position.
The previously bored Snow-Girl suddenly straightened up, as her peripheral vision caught a brief glare of your arm.
She twirled around, her weapon now at the ready and her finger on the trigger.
You cursed yourself, for letting your own presumptions get the better of you.
The Snow-Girl began cautiously approaching you again, causing you to drastically rethink your strategy. She was getting dangerously close, and with you in such a vulnerable position, your big comeback might be over before it even began.
As of acting on pure instinct alone, you let your legs drop down, but kept your arms fastened around the grating. It was even more challenging maintaining your grip now that you had to support your legs as well.
“Time for extra sessions of gymnastics class to finally pay off,” you thought to yourself, as you started to swing them backwards, building momentum.
Her eyes widened as your legs became visible, giving your position away. At this point, you had reached the point of no return.
She nearly dropped her gun, but the surprised expression on her face gave you just enough time to take advantage.
With a cry, you let go of the grating just as your legs swung towards her, all of your momentum backed behind this one move.
Her finger fumbled around for the trigger, but it was too late.
Your boots emphatically slammed into her shocked face, both feet embedding themselves in her forehead. With all of your momentum behind the kick, she flew through the air before landing on her neck, limply rolling over on her stomach. A faint moan emitted from her now barely stirring body, as you landed backfirst on the floor.
Scratching one henchgirl off your list, you knew that that noise instantly alerted the others, and that you had just given yourself away to the remaining two. With that in mind, you started to clamber up to your feet, only to come face-to-face with the muzzle of an assault rifle.
“Well well, lookie what we have here,” came the triumphant sneer of the second Snow-Girl, her assault rifle aimed at your nose.
The two of you were feet away, yet you could easily distinguish the sheer look of hatred on her face as she smiled at you. Her index finger wrapped around the trigger, you quickly thought of a Plan B.
“Is everything alright back there?” came Kelly’s concerned voice.
“Yeah, just taking care of a little vermin problem,” she smiled, taking the safety off.
As she did so, your hand slowly retreated to your utility belt, drawing a Hawk-Disk from one of the pockets. Your fingers hiding it within your palm, you instead let her talk in hopes o
“You broke my nose, snapped two of my ribs, and knocked two teeth out back when I first joined up in this gang. And that was before I went to juvie. As you can tell, I held a grudge,” she grinned, before taking the safety off.
“Now, well, I don’t know how you managed to get the balls to show your face around town. And frankly I don’t care. What I do know is that I’m gonna make sure you regretted crawling out of that wheelchai-” she started to declare, before you sprang into action.
Taking advantage of her overconfidence, you hurled the projectile at her muzzle, not even waiting for it to connect.
She instinctively flinched, starting to press the trigger. Just when her finger closed around it, the Hawk-Disc knifed into the muzzle, causing the assault rifle to malfunction.
You easily knocked the weapon out of her hands before landing a brutal right hand to the her nose, causing her to shriek in pain.
“Yeah, well this time I’m gonna break a lot more than just your nose,” you snarled, as she gazed wide-eyed at you, her hand clutching her now bleeding nose.
Before she could retort, you slammed your left fist in chin, causing her teeth to clatter. The momentum behind the blow itself caused her to stand upright, almost standing on her tiptoes. As she lurched backwards, you finished with a spinning back kick, the sole of your boot embedding itself within her stomach.
She flew through the air before crashing into the wall, her body growing slack and motionless as she crumpled to the floor.
Your fists clenched, you approached her limp body, a satisfied look on your face as her head rolled to the ground. You then turned to the now lone Snow Girl, her previously smug expression replaced by a startled glare. She was in the midst of forcing the poor security guard to inhale between her toes, her bare foot still clamped around his nose.
“You!” she finally mouthed, her voice almost emotionless.
“It’s good to be back,” you smiled, before walking towards her, a Hawk-Disc drawn in one hand.
Unfortunately for you, her shock didn't last for very long, as she quickly reaffirmed her glare, flashing you a seductive smile.
Just before you were about to attack, she suddenly sprang into action, sliding her heel off his throat and running at you.
You had just enough time to raise your hands before she lunged at you, maneuvering her body in mid-air so that her bare foot would be aimed towards you in a surprisingly flexible flying heel kick.
Just when your hands were about to intercept the kick in a perfect X-block, you soon found your eyes involuntarily focusing on her freshly bared foot, the sheer sight of it almost hypnotizing you. You were so focused on her bare foot that you let your own guard down, allowing the Snow-Girl to gain the early advantage.
Her foot slammed right into your nose, most if not all of her body weight behind the kick. Staggering backwards, you now found yourself on the offensive, as she quickly righted herself among arrival, flashing you a smile while doing so.
Snarling irritably, you foolishly let your anger get the best of you, and threw a wild haymaker at her, half expecting the punch to connect.
You soon found your punch connect with the air, as she expertly ducked the punch before shooting back towards you, landing a brutal uppercut to the chin. Reeling backwards, you sorely rubbed your exposed chin, before tasting blood in your mouth.
“That’s what I get for getting too cocky,” you thought to yourself, as she used her sudden wave of momentum to twirl around, lifting her foot into the air with ease.
And once again, you were almost entranced by her bare foot to even concentrate, much less think of a counterattack. Cursing your perverse demons for once again polluting your mind, you soon found yourself on the receiving end of a powerful spinning heel kick to the face, her heel digging into your right cheek.
The momentum behind the kick alone sent you flying, your body sprawling through the air before landing unceremoniously on the ground, the fall knocking the wind out of you. Your arms lay limp beside you, as you soon found yourself gazing almost blankly at the ceiling lights. A familiar emotion began circulating through your brain, as you began pondering where coming back so soon as Hawk-Man was such a good idea, if it was even that.
You didn't have much time to even gather your thoughts, as her sneering yet slender figure soon came into view. Sauntering into your vision, she smirked before slamming her bared foot right into your throat, laughing as you squirmed beneath her foot.
“We always thought you had a thing for feet, Hawk-Boy, and now that its just me and you, I think I’m gonna enjoy this,” she smiled, a triumphant look on her face.
“Enjoy what?” you demanded, her foot still pressing down hard on your throat.
“Oh, just a little payback I've been itching to get off my back since you left me in the hospital with a broken leg and two broken ribs a few months back,” she grinned, her eyes glimmering mischievously.
You were taken aback by this sudden familiarly, as memories of fighting an equally talented Snow-Girl during one of Frostbite's heists months earlier began flashing before your very eyes.
She didn't give you much time to think, but instead raised her bared foot, her toes wiggling anxiously as she awaited what came next.
“I’m so happy you decided to come out of retirement or whatever. Beats ripping off Mr. Rent-a-Cop over there. Plus, this time I really get to enjoy it,” she purred, before stomping down.
What happens next?
12131121122112112211111211.title: You use the ceiling to prevent arousing suspicion!

choices: The cop, hurt but otherwise fine, is freed and the day is nearly saved!
More grunts come in!
121311211221121122111112111.content:
"You know, you're right. I have a thing for feet. I'm not exactly perfect." You say, getting an idea to form; this would buy you a bit of time. Kelly reacted as well as accepted, slowly pausing her attack.
"Really now! Gee, I couldn't tell!" She replied sarcastically. "So, you'll enjoy t-"
"But you're also wrong."
"....What?" Kelly asked, looking at you in confusion.
"I'm not Hawkboy. Stop calling me that."
"You can tell me who you are AFTER I beat you to a pulp!" She retorted, bringing her foot down...just as your brief chat brought the limpness out of your arms. You fold them and let martial arts training from various schools and a bit of tutelage from Ninja Girl kick in, as you block the kick and pump your shoulders up, knocked her off balance. At the point, you flipped to your back, further disorienting Kelly before shooting forward into a roll, righting yourself as you took out a 'feather': one of your more archaic ranged weapons, but always full of tricks. Once again, tutelage from Ninja girl helped, as you proceeded to expertly flick the feather and land it front of Kelly, letting out a smokescreen.
"Cough....Rah...c-can't beat me in a real fight, s-so you employ tricks? For a 'predator', you certainly...cough...are cowardly!" She quipped, backing away from smoke.
You decided to play along, smirking. "You know, there is an advantage to having such an obvious advantage. Would you like to know?" You say, darting past her. She turned and tried to punch at the area she thought you were, but just sent her hand through a box.
"Sh-shut up! You're just a pervert! A pathetic pervert who got a second shot!" Kelly said, growing angry.
"Oh, true, true! But, you see, the thing is..." You then darted by her again, but did a slide under her stuck hand, tumbled out of it, and landed a kick in her stomach, sending her reeling. Another kick detached her hand from the box entirely, exposing the crate slightly. You saw a bunch of pipes stacked inside and quickly grabbed one. "The thing is, my weakness is SO predictable no one EVER thinks about any others weaknesses I may have!" You said confidently, rolling out of the way as Kelly threw one of her boots at you, throwing another, more normal 'feather' at her, catching the hood of her eskimo gear and sticking it to the crateshe was behind. Growling, she slipped out of her gear...just as you struck her with the pipe in the stomach, causing her to reel backwards. Throwing the pipe aside, you then charged her and tackled her to the ground, grinning. "Pretty bad when you have to rely on a fetish to beat me, huh?"
"Y-you perverted shit head, get off me!" Kelly said, struggling.
"Right, I'm perverted! Almost forgot!" You grabbed one of her feet, gave it a quick lick, grinned at her smugly as she watched in awed disgust, and punched her in the face, knocking her out.
"Still, though, that was pretty pathetic of me. I REALLY need to practice if some goons have a shot at me. I'll look into that later. Anyway..." You get up and stretch a little, feeling your body start to recover already. "Better check on the cop."
121311211221121122111112111.title: Never give in!

choices: The Hunt Continues!
1213112112211211221111121112.content:
Just when things couldn’t get any worse, they did. A lot worse.

“It never ends,” you murmured to yourself, as the electronic doors slid open, unleashing a new wave of Frostbite’s henchgirls upon you.

A trio of Snow-Girls sauntered towards you, collectively all clad in Eskimo jackets and Uggs, all armed with Frostbite’s signature freeze guns.

The apparent leader, a muscular blonde with cold blue eyes, stepped in front of them, a smug smirk on her face as she brandished her own freeze gun.

“Lookie here girls. A little birdy come to play. Looks like Christmas came early,” she taunted, leveling the muzzle of her weapon at your nose.

“Shouldn’t we report him to Frostbite, Brenda?” one of them suggested, her voice slightly shaky.

“She must be the smart one,” you thought to yourself sarcastically.

“What, and miss teaching this loser a lesson? Nah, Frostbite will get him eventually, but he won’t be in one piece,” she smiled evilly, showing off her wide and quite rotten grin.

“I’m gonna take my time with you, freak,” the other one sneered eagerly.

“Ladies ladies please, there’s no need to fight over me, alright? If you want your season's beatings so bad, why not just line up in a nice, orderly fashion?” you taunted in return, cracking your knuckles.

“You got a mouth, bird boy. Too bad you won’t be able to crack anymore jokes through broken teeth and punctured lungs after we’re done with you,” she snorted smugly.

You obviously had to isolate them, and what better way to start by goading the biggest threat, their leader. With her out of the picture, the rest should be easy.

“I’d say the same about you Brenda, but judging by your body type, you could use some of those teeth,” you smiled, causing her to snarl irritably.

“He’s mine,” she growled, squeezing the trigger.

Sheer instinct took over as soon as she pressed the trigger, releasing an icy beam that hurtled towards you. Without hesitation, you threw yourself backwards to evade the deadly blast.

The ice beam instead hit the nearby wall, where it materialized in an icy blanket that covered the metallic surface.

Rising up on one knee, you retorted by hurling your signature metallic disk her way, the shiny blur whining at her at a breakneck pace.

Within seconds, the disk tore the rifle away from her grasp, nearly dislocating her shoulder in the process. Her smug look soon dissolved as her equalizer clattered harmlessly to the floor, leaving her virtually unarmed.

Standing up, you couldn’t help but smile as the now fuming Snow Girl looked frantically to her fellow companions, who responded with glares of equal disbelief.

“You were saying?” you piped in, much to her utter chagrin.

Gritting her teeth angrily, she stormed towards you in a sprint powerful enough to send seismic waves through the ground as she (predictably) threw the first punch.

With ease, you ducked the blow, letting it whistle overhead and miss your forehead by a good three inches.

Shooting back up, you replied with a swift uppercut to her gut, one that forced the arrogant henchgirl back a step.

Twirling around on your heel, you finished her off with a crisp jumpspin kick to her chin, your steel-plated boot making quick work of her exposed face.

Within seconds, Brenda was on the ground in a dazed and nearly unconscious heap.

Turning back to the previous two, you merely made a beckoning motion towards the other two, who were clearly having second thoughts now that their ring leader was down and out.

“Anyone else?” you taunted, causing one of them to suddenly seethe in frustration and move to the left. Out of nowhere, she grabbed a rusted crowbar behind a crate.

Okay then.” You sighed before reaching into your utility belt and producing a twin pair of escrima sticks, a new addition to your arsenal.

She made a not-so-subtle lunge towards you with the crowbar, which prompted you to skip backwards to avoid the blow. She tried again, only with less luck.

Finally, on her third try, you intercepted her.

Blocking her next overhead strike with your escrima stick, you slid the weapon down the metal to keep it at bay. With the other hand, you smacked her directly between the eyes with the second escrima stick, staggering her.

Finally, you finished her by swooping downward and knocking her off her feet with a quick kick behind her knee.

“Uugghhh…” She groaned in pain as the back of her head cracked against the floor, leaving only the third and final Snow Girl.

Deciding to go down fighting, she raised her freeze gun and fired an ice beam your way. Sidestepping the blast, you threw one of the escrima sticks towards her gun arm as you maneuvered to the right with your shoulder hitting the ground first.

In one fluid motion, the escrima stick ricocheted off her wrist and disarmed the Snow Girl of the cyrokinetic blaster, leaving her petrified with fear.

Before she could fight the old-fashioned way, you launched yourself into the air by jumping off the wall.

Then, you landed a momentous Superman punch to her temple, causing crimson to spurt out of one end of her mouth as your fist rammed into the other end. Twirling around groggily on her heel, she unceremoniously faceplanted to the ground, unconscious.

Picking up the downed escrima stick from the floor, you expertly twirled them around on your wrists for a while as you scanned the groaning mass of humanity that lay sprawled out on the floor around you.

“Still got it,” you remarked confidently, before clipping the pair to your utility belt and attending to the beaten and humiliated security guard.
Using your gauntlet blades to slice through his metallic restraints, you offered him a taloned hand, and he gladly took it.

Wincing heavily, he clutched at his midsection sorely as you helped him to his feet. His nose was a bloodied mess of broken cartilage and mucus, prompting you to hand him a spare handkerchief to clean off some of the blood.

“Thanks Hawk Boy. I don’t imagine I’d still be walking if you hadn’t shown up when you did. I’m John, by the way,” he thanked, applying pressure to his broken nose.

“What’s the situation here?” You asked heroically, injecting enough masculine confidence into your adolescent vocals to give off the impression that you were the cavalry.

“In a word, shitty. About half an hour ago, me and the guys were patrolling the warehouse, business as usual. Then all of a sudden we get reports of a disturbance, possibly metahuman-related, at the front office. Half the team went to investigate, while we went on lockdown back here. We thought the situation would’ve been contained, but I guess we underestimated those brats. Somehow, those ice bitches managed to sabotage the ventilation systems, bringing the temperatures down to sub-zero. All they had to do was wait until we nearly frozen before blowing a hole in the floor and coming up right up our asses from the sewer system.”

“Then they took you hostage?”

He nodded gravely before continuing. “Once they ambushed us, we were all separated so we couldn’t communicate and find a way to call for backup Those ice bitches had us restrained to chairs and thrown in storage lockers to get the access codes to the confiscated weapons vaults. Those...monsters made us listen as they froze our friends’ fingers one-by-one just to get information. Ramirez broke and told them what they wanted to hear, and I played along with them long enough to escape. And as you probably saw, that didn’t go so well for me.”

“Where are the other guards at now? Still in the storage rooms?” you pressed on, your fists instinctively clenching in anger as you learned more about what Frostbite’s Eskimo entourage had done.

“Unfortunately. I was the only one to escape. I don’t even know if any of my colleagues made it out. I took the coward’s way out to save my ass when I should’ve come back for all of them,” he snarled bitterly, his voice still stricken with guilt over his split second decision.

As he lamented his current predicament, you couldn’t help but sympathize with his guilt-laden angst. After all, you knew that feeling all too well after being forced into retirement by the malevolent Madame Reich.

“You did the right thing John. You distracted them long enough to slow down their progress which gives me enough time to stop Frostbite from starting another Ice Age here in Footropolis,” you assured, a point that he reluctantly conceded.

“So what now? No doubt those frost bitches hold the surveillance room now, and this facility has got countermeasures on every hallway they can access to slow you down. Thing is every way I know that leads to the weapons vault is lined with security cameras,” he pointed out, gesturing at a mounted camera from above currently fixated at them.

You regarded the camera for a moment before something else caught your eye. “Then I guess I’ll have to find my own way.”

Walking past him and towards the right of the hallway, you extended the sharp ends of your taloned gloves and pried open a nearby ventilation lid.

Depositing it to the side, you crouched down in front of the dark opening before turning back towards John who had familiarized himself with an ice gun.

“I’m going to free the guards, then take down Frostbite. If any of her Frost Girls come by this way-”

“I do to them what they did to us,” he grinned, hefting the ice weapon on his shoulder confidently.

Smiling from ear to ear, you took a deep breath before entering the metallic labyrinth.
1213112112211211221111121112.title: More grunts come in!

choices: Dodge the blow and finish Amy off once and for all!
Do nothing- you're too entranced by her foot!
1213112112211211221112.content:
Alice.

Above the others, she was the one who had to pay.

She was the ringleader, the architect of your mother’s plight and your continued degradation. Madame Reich may have been the one to plunge that fateful boot into your back, but she reveled in being able to twist it in even further.

Until your rebirth, she made your life a living hell.

Tonight, what goes around comes around.

As soon as the blonde leader finished barking her instructions to Darla, you burst into action.

Quickly closing the distance between you and the Troop Squad in just a few athletic bounds, your eyes immediately zeroed in on Alice’s smug expression who was still sneering at you with arms crossed and hips confidently cocked to the side.

Flawless blonde hair cascading down broad shoulders. A near supermodel physique with athletic proportions all in the right places no doubt accentuated by her very wealthy and opulent lifestyle. Not to mention slender and well-shaped legs that stretched on seemingly forever, finished off by an equally immaculate pair of bare feet with a French varnish to only add to their natural allure.

On the surface, these outward qualities would make Alice desirable beyond meaning of the word. But beneath those superficial perks, she was a depraved and self-absorbed criminal who deserved everything that was coming to her. Literally and figuratively.

“Amy, get this los-ooomph!” She never finished the sentence as you were already on her.

Tackling her off her feet in a single motion, she only had time to whimper pathetically before she collapsed backfirst to the ground with your armored torso now straddling her.

Letting emotions get the better of you, you reared back your dominant hand and without hesitation struck her hard across the face in a dazzling blur that nearly knocked her pretty head right off her shoulders.

Anger. Humiliation. Shame. Revenge.

You put all those emotions, plus some, behind the powerful blow as it connected flush against her lower jaw.

Rearing back to deliver another blow, the left corner of your eye suddenly caught Darla fleeing back towards the warehouse.

“Shit,” you thought to yourself, reaching towards your utility belt with the same arm instead of continuing to inflict long-overdue punishment upon the girl who had done so much to make your life post-paralysis utter hell.

Shaking off the brief emotional outburst as the now downed Alice moaned pitifully beneath you, you produced your patented grapple gun and aimed it at the redhead just as she neared the facility entrance.

Finger curling around the trigger, you steadied your aim and was just about to fire when a hulking shadow exploded into your periphery.

“Uuuuggghh…” Amy’s foot, a fleshy wrecking ball in itself, smashed hard into the right side of your face in a sudden display of pure power yet quickness that took you by surprise.

Thrown to the side as Amy successfully kicked you off her leader, you instinctively rolled on your shoulder back up to a knee with the gadget still firmly in your grasp.

Cursing yourself for letting emotions get the better of you, you nevertheless refocused your attention on the now seething muscle of the Troop Squad as she stalked towards you.

Just a few inches beneath six feet, she sported a near Amazonian physique that reminded you of some male professional wrestlers. Her tan Girl Scout uniform was nearly unbuttoned at her midriff, revealing an equally impressive six-pack of muscles.

As the brunette continued to advance on you, you couldn’t help but cast a fleeting glance downwards towards her bare feet.

About as meaty as the rest of her, the subtle calluses and blisters alongside her wrinkled soles only highlighted her tomboyish nature, with chapped red nail polish adorning each toe just to maintain that feminine sheen.

“You’re gonna regret that, freak!” she spat angrily, cracking her knuckles eagerly as you stood up.

Retracting the grapple gun back into your belt, you assumed a defensive stance before beckoning her on. “You’re all gonna regret what you did to my mother.”

Keeping one eye on Darla as her slim figure grew fainter and fainter, you barely managed to duck her first punch before sidestepping to avoid her second clubbing blow aimed for your neck.

Sensing your opportunity as her third blow breezed by your chin, you threw yourself underneath her left armpit as she swung at you wildly with both hands in a sledgehammer motion.

Rolling around towards her blindside, you sacrificed your offensive window to pull out the grapple gun and with only seconds to aim fired it off just as Darla was about to get out of range.

“Whoa!” Arms flailing about wildly as the three-pronged hook latched onto her back leg, you grunted slightly before yanking backwards and sent her crashing to the floor facefirst just as she was about to get inside.

Stopping Darla for at least the moment, your sudden intervention unintentionally gave the advantage back to Amy who came up behind you with arms outstretched.

Pinning your forearms to your sides from behind in a rear bearhug, she easily lifted you off the ground before tightening her hold over you.

Grunting slightly as her forearms tightened around your torso, you continued to struggle to free yourself.

Feeling that constricting force threaten to cave in your midsection with every painful second, you retaliated with a few desperate elbows to her exposed ribcage that only elicited faint grunts from the feminine powerhouse.

Amy in turn responded by hooking her arms together and after planting herself on the ground lifted you even further up into the air before unceremoniously slamming you back down to earth.

Wheezing inwardly as your side hit the floor first, she followed up the brutal bodyslam while you were still reeling by reeling back her back leg.

Then, just as you were about to get back into a kneeling position she shot her bare foot forward into your stomach. Nearly kicking you up into the air as the kick resonated soundly, you sailed a few feet back into the air before tumbling over on your stomach.

Catching your breath as you sensed Amy’s footsteps draw closer, you only had a second more to respond before your vision became clouded by the brunette’s charging form.

Barely able to throw herself to the side as she nearly bulldozed through you, you shot back up to your feet as she staggered to a halt.

Now face-to-face, she gritted her teeth angrily before throwing hands yet again.

Ducking a sloppy haymaker that nearly clobbered your cowled mask, you retaliated with a few lightning-quick gut punches to her stomach before jolting her chin back with an upwards forearm smash.

Tumbling back by only a step, she quickly shook it off and fired back with an overhead backfist that you easily telegraphed by a mile.

Taking a knee until her fist harmlessly sailed over your face, you again relied on your smaller size to intercept her before she could maneuver her Amazonian figure back into another counter.

Raising your leg up, you caught her off-balance with a low kick to the back of her knee that brought the brunette down into a kneeling position.

Scowling at you despite her now lowered stance, she started to grab at you only to be rocked by a swift right cross that you put nearly your entire body weight behind.

As soon as your capped knuckles smashed into her mouth, you backed up a moment to survey the damage inflicted as she nearly kneeled over clutching her jaw.

Spitting out crimson to the side as your punch landed squarely, Amy took a moment to touch her now crimson lip before glowering right back at you resentfully.

Deciding to up the ante in order to put her down for good, you took another step back before breaking into a running start towards her.

Quickly building up momentum as she remained on her palms and knees, you launched yourself into the air with a running knee intended to knock her out once and for all.

However, despite your best intentions it was not to be.

Just before your knee could connect, Amy surprised even you by snapping her head out of trajectory to avoid the momentous blow before hooking her forearm around the back of your raised knee.

Using your own momentum against you as she grabbed hold of your other leg, she lifted you even higher up in the air before emphatically slamming you right back down to the ground.

Every breath you had previously taken was seemingly knocked right out of you as your back hit the cold concrete.

Staring up at the moonlight sky now in a dazed state, you remained near motionless on the ground as her heavy footsteps approached.

Things were only made worse when your already groggy vision suddenly dominated by the quite surreal image of Amy’s bare foot hovering just feet above your grimacing expression.

And as much as you hated to admit it, this provided an opportunity for you to simply marvel at her powerful limb as it remained poised in the air like a nuclear bomb of pain just waiting to drop down on you.

Noticing her wrinkled sole and shapely toes in even greater detail this time, you remained petrified in a paralyzing blend of fear, intrigue, and naturally arousal as the Troop Squad’s powerhouse prepared to deliver the ultimate coup de grace.

“If you thought what we did to your man was bad, just wait until we get done with you!” she declared confidently, before stomping down towards your unprotected face.

And as her foot raced down to meet your vulnerable face, you had only a split second to react.

What do you do?
1213112112211211221112.title: You decide to quickly take down Alice first

choices: You are Hawk Man and you can not be stopped!
Their attack is too vicious they begin to stomp the crap out of you.
12131121122112112212.content:
By the time you had left, it was already nightfall in your new found city. The streets were primarily empty, but regardless you took to the roves to try out your new "wings". You find with your new found strength and the aid of the wings you were able to get a serous glide going. You easily leap from rooftop to rooftop till you reached the cookie factory. You looked down at the old abandon building and peered through the windows. You could already spot Alice, Darla, and Amy working your mother over. It seemed as if they had untied her, but now were taking turns wrestling her to the ground, and pinning her beneath their sweated feet.

"Grrrr!!~!!!! They won't escape my talons. Not by a longshot~!" You shout out, although probably a bit loud.

You see through the windows the Troop Squad all look up at the sound of your voice. The three decide to tie your mother back up, and leave her under a pile of their sweaty socks (it's a wonder how they got so many) to go investigate. You see them heading towards the entrance of the factory. It may be time to strike...

As the three girls exit the factory, you leap down from your perch at a nearby building with a flip. You land firmly in front of the three into a crouch, slowly standing up. The darkness of night gives you a shadowy intimidating figure.

"Wh....what?! Hawkboy?! No fucking way! Grrr, no fucking way!!" She angrily stomps her bare foot several times. Your eyes casually trail to her sexy french pedicure but you stay on focus. "Hawkboy is no more. You left him for dead back in that house. I'm his replacement....Hawkman. Your reign of evil and sweet treats are over!".

A bit of cheesiness never hurt any superhero. Alice scowls. "Yeah whatever Hawk"man". You should just give up. Super Heroes are overrated. Hawkboy was a testimony to your failure. Darla, go in there and RUIN Hawkboy's mom. We'll take care of this guy..."

You knew you had to act fast to save your mom. Using your new found speed and strength you intercept Darla. Darla lashes out with a swift kick to your mid section. You easily catch her foot pinning it to your body. You look down at the foot, that gorgeous foot and can't resist giving it a quick kiss.

"Let me go you bastard!"

Darla jumps out and kicks with her other foot striking you hard in the face. You drop her foot and she rolls over onto the ground as you are caught off guard from the blow. Thankfully you're also a lot tougher now. It only takes you a second to recover from the kick and a second was all the time you had before Alice and Amy were on you.

Amy struck out with a solid punch that you easily deflected, you returned the favor with a punch of your own to her sternum, knocking the wind out of her. Alice their leader simply came in with a flying kick aimed at your chest. You saw it coming but were mesmerized by the foot as it got closer to your chest.

Not even trying to deflect the attack her kick hit you high on the chest and you are knocked back into the brick wall. Alice is shocked that you bounce right back seemingly without any injury.

"I told you, you weren't dealing with Hawk Boy anymore, I'm twice as strong and three times as tough as I used to be!"

Alice scowls at you and launches another kick at your body. Like you did with Amy you catch Alice's foot and kiss it. Then you run your tongue over it before spinning her in the air and throwing her into Darla.

As you confidently stalk forward Alice gets up enraged, her blond hair now all in disarray from the collision with her underling.

"You sick foot freak! I bet you loved it when we stuffed our feet into your mom's face you sick pervert!"

You scowl at her and say, "No bitch. She was innocent you had no call to do what you did to her. Now as for me, I happen to like feet, I think once I take your little troop squad out I'll hump your feet while your unconscious!"

"FREAK!"

"Takes one to know one," you childishly taunt back as you continue your steady advance. Unfortunately her verbal goading was just designed to distract you. Amy had gotten her wind back and had crept up behind you and then lashed out with a strong kick right into your unprotected privates.

You are now stronger and tougher but even the toughest man will scream like a girl when he is kicked full force into his manhood. You are no exception and you crumple to the ground clutching your aching testicles. The three young women pounce on you kicking and stomping. They are used to working together and now they are pissed. Can you fight them off after suffering such a terrible blow?
12131121122112112212.title: At the old abandoned cookie factory(alt)

choices: Block It!!!!
Too Late!!!
121311211221121122121.content:
One second.
That was all it took. One second for the Troop Squad to regain their footing, one second to put the boots to your momentous comeback story, one second to change things from bad to worse. And one second, to be re-introduced to an old friend: pain.
The entire flow of the impromptu brawl, and your subsequent comeback, came to a screeching and quite abrupt halt as soon as Amy’s foot stomped down in a sloppy yet devastating attack.
Her gargantuan foot connected hard between your eyes, ripping off a new bandage of searing pain. The new throbbing bruise materializing was only complimented by the equivalent of a giant migraine, one that made your cries of protest seemed like slurred together letters of the same word. Your world instantly went into a dazed whirlwind as soon as the kick cracked off the left side of your cowl, almost instantly rendering you limp on the ground.
In between that kick and your resistance, there was a brief moment of respite, for you at least. Out of your peripheral vision, you could make out the ringleader, Alice, exchanging sly glances with her two “helpers”, Darla and Amy. Her seemingly natural smug face soon contorted into a sinister grin, one that was completely replicated by the other two.
What occurred in the next minute would be the equivalent of being stuffed in a cannon and fired through several cactus fields.
Without warning, the trio capitalized on your downed state, attacking you with the ferocity and mentality of a pack of rabid wolves. Their bare feet soon became the tools of your imminent deconstruction, the objects that jerked you out of your idealistic, altruistic fantasy, and back into a nightmarish, agonizing reality.
“Oomph!” That was only the first of many sounds to escape your bloodied lips as they began working your body neck down with brutal punt kicks and excruciating stomps. Even though your new and improved body armor cushioned much of the impact, you could still feel every kick that connected slowly chipping away at your previously sky high morale.
Your face began resembling a squashed potato as Amy and Darla began caving your nose in, with alternating kicks. Darla’s kicks were more methodical, more precise, always pausing to pinpoint her target before unleashing a new wave of pain on your vulnerable facial features. Amy, in sharp contrast, was much more brutal and unforgiving, her giant soles beginning to resemble bricks as they pounded your face and throat.
Any attempts at warding them away with your forearm were rendered meaningless by Alice, who simply added to your inevitable hospital bill by launching her pedicured foot into your jugular, nearly causing you to choke off your own blood!
“Aarrgh! Aargh!” You sputtered out loudly, clutching your bruised windpipe in pain.
“What’s the matter, freak? No air to breathe?” she spat mercilessly, absolutely relishing your pained screeches.
You started to curl into the fetal position, but Darla lashed out with a punt kick to your spine, eliciting another shriek from you.
Now standing over you, Alice cocked one hip to the side before planting her right foot firmly on your throat, taunting you by this point.
“You….bitch!” you spat resiliently, only to be rewarded with your defiance by Alice grinding her heel into your throat, eliciting a high-pitched squeal from you.
“Takes one to know one. And by the way, you won’t be the only one,” she sneered, before gesturing not-so-subtly towards your mother, who was still restrained by the mountain of socks.
Enraged at this, you tried wrestling her foot off, but clearly anticipating this, Alice merely pressed her sole even harder into your jugular.
“Don’t worry, hero. You’ll get yours soon enough,” she purred, rubbing her pedicured toes against your chin condescendingly.
Narrowing her eyes at your wounded state, Alice turned to Darla. “Get the chains. We wouldn't want Hawk Man to just fly away and miss all this, would we?”
Nodding eagerly, Darla soon disappeared further into the factory, leaving Alice to turn to the powerhouse of the team, Amy.
“What about those brats he always hangs out with?” Amy asked in that slightly masculine voice of hers.
“What about them? After we send Hawk-Brat back to the retirement home, and make his mom our own personal bitch, the Mayor would be shaking in his big boy trousers before going after us,” Alice sneered in that smug, self-serving tone of hers.
But oblivious to her, you weren't done yet.

Substituting her brute strength with strategic might, you easily ducked the blow, before springing back up with a swift uppercut of your own.
Her head snapped back as your gloved fist rattled her jaw, forcing her back a few steps.

Just as your fist was about to etch your initials into Amy’s cheekbone, she suddenly straightened herself out of her “wounded” state, and hooked your forearm underneath her armpit, outsmarting even you.
Your eyes bulged in surprise, but before you could wrench away, she rammed her right elbow into your mouth, forcing you to taste the warm, coppery flow of your blood yet again.
As you stumbled back groggily, she grabbed your hooked forearm with her other arm, and twisted upward, locking you in an impromptu kimura lock. You grunted in pain as she continued twisting forward, forcing your head down towards her midsection.

What happens next?

Eyes narrowing, you moved in to take her down to the ground and land the coup de grace, but Darla surprised you once again.

Twisting her body like a pretzel in mid-air, she quickly maneuvered her hip counterclockwise towards you, while simultaneously lifting up her free leg. This feat could be considered worthy of Olympic-esque recognition, but Darla was pulling it off with ease.

Still feeling the effects from the gargantuan mass of humanity that was Amy, your eyes still stared blankly into the ceiling light even as Darla’s shaky footsteps grew nearer. Out of your periphery, you could make out Darla’s slightly pompous strut towards your fallen form, almost taking her time.

"Now speak bitch, say the words."

"You own me Darla, I'm a bitch and will do whatever you say." The fight was gone from you, you didn't even hesitate. You realized you were her bitch, a pathetic animal that only lived because she deemed you amusing.

"I'll let you look at me this time, lift your face up and look at your Goddess!"

You obeyed and arched your back a bit to force your face upward. You looked up at your owner only for her to hock a mouth full of saliva right into your face. Some of it even got into your eye. As you blinked painfully you never saw the devastating kick from her left leg. Pain radiated from your cheek as you hit the ground.

"Fucking piece of shit! That's for hitting me early, every time you serve me I'm going to kick you or stomp you or somehow hurt you. For the rest of your miserable pathetic life! Now move on to your final owner!"

Your body ached terribly but you managed to muster the effort to squirm your way to Amy.

"Flip up so your on your back worm boy, I want to rest both my feet on your face."

It was a struggle but you managed to do so. Both her feet descended on your face, she immediately began rubbing them vigorously over your features, pushing Darla's saliva that was still on your face all around. You felt sick to your stomach, you loved feet but you didn't like their spit. She abused your visage for awhile before demanding you open your mouth and extend your tongue.

Amy was far more active in the experience. Instead of you licking her feet she made you keep your tongue out so she was rubbing your tongue with the bottom of her foot. Occasionally she would grab your tongue between two of her toes and pinch it painfully, other times she would wiggle her toes in your eyes, painfully drumming them on your eyelids.

"Maybe we should blind him too!" She remarked. You had no idea if she was serious or joking but you were utterly terrified of her.

After serving them diligently you again had to proclaim you were owned.

"You own me Amy. I am your bitch."

The three cheered. Darla pushed her foot over your face again.

"How is the taste of defeat?"

You weren't sure what to say. So she slapped your face with her foot.

"Well? How does DA-FEET taste like?"

You had to say something. "It... it taste's good."

The Troop Squad had defeated you and now... you were their slave!
1213112112211211221211113.title: The Troop Squad Makes Hawkman Their Foot Bitch

12131121122112112212111131.content:
Your life began as their slave. To control you they did a couple of things. One was to put a dog collar on you that would create a painful and debilitating electric shock. It responded by remote control or by activation by their specific voice tones. It also would activate automatically if you left their hideout unless they inputted a specific command.

"Come on Hawky, come rub my feet!" Amy called out playfully. You quickly crawled from where you were and rushed to her. You had learned that they didn't brook any hesitated from their new pet. And a pet is exactly the way they treated you. "Hawky" was their nickname for you. They called you a variety of other demeaning terms but Hawky was a favorite, especially by Amy.

Judging from the workout clothes attire it looked like Amy had just finished a run. You really loved her feet but your stomach did a few back flips, when she worked out she went hard and now down her socks were drenched in sweat. You didn't have a choice, you were their slave, their pet foot bitch.

As you had been instructed when you greeted her you crawled right to her feet and kissed the tops of her shoes. You then gently removed each shoe and put it aside. That done, you kissed the tops of her socked feet. Her white socks were completely damp with sweat, you could smell the heady scent that both made you lustful but also slightly nauseated.

After completing the ritual greeting you looked up at your owner and awaited her next instructions.

"Keep my socks where they are and begin your massage Hawky. And do a good job if you want food in your bowl tonight!"

All of the Troop Squad enjoyed making you eat dog food. They were 'kind' enough to mix in vitamins that a human needed to live off of as well but the taste was beyond awful.

You knelt before her and lifted one damp sweaty foot and began to rub it. Your thumbs pushed into the arches of her foot and she gave a sight of pleasure.

"What a good little foot doggy. Keeping you alive as our slave foot worshiping toy really was the right decision!"

Silence was the only accepted response as you diligently continued your duties. She sipped from her drink and played on her phone as you devoted all of your attention to giving the perfect massage. All of them insisted on lengthy massages and before you were done your hands began to cramp out. Doing your best to ignore the pain you pressed on until she snapped her fingers indicating that the foot massage was done.

"Now remove my socks and set them next to my shoes. I need you to clean my feet, make sure you get every bit of sweat off of them!"

The socks stuck to her sweat drenched feet and once they were off you got the full brunt of her foot funk. The smell sickened you a bit as you did your best to hold your breath as your tongue began to snake out and clean her feet. Her foot sweat was salty and the aroma of sour cheese and vinegar soon invaded your entire body inside and out.

As you continued to lick and worship her feet you heard a door open and close. It was Darla she had returned home. Her outfit wasn't workout gear though she was dressed in a more office type attire. You think she had gone to make a bank deposit from one of their latest heists in her civilian identity. Her sensible heels and pantyhose were topped by a black skirt and white blouse. A very different look from her Troop Squad outfit.

"Aw you're using Hawky right now? I wanted my massage!"

Amy stuck out her tongue. "Oh wait your turn he won't be much longer."

Darla sat down in a huff as you finished completely licking clean every bit of perspiration from Amy's feet. When you were finally done Amy gave you a mischievous smile and then looked at Darla.

"Hey Darla you wanted a foot rub right? So you won't mind if I occupy his mouth with my socks?"

Darla shrugged. "Eh its cool, He's going to be massaging them for at least an hour before I want my own tongue bath."

Amy picked up her socks. "Open wide Hawky!" She mocked and you let out an involuntary whimper. You hated having your mouth completely stuffed with socks. They tasted nasty, they made your mouth go dry and always parched your throat.

Darla let out a very unladylike burst of laughter. "Our little foot dog actually whimpered! Hahaha not letting him speak actual words is making him even more canine like, this is fucking hilarious!"

It was true, you weren't allowed to use human words anymore. You could whimper, you could bark, you could grown but any actual words led to a brutally painful shock and then even more punishment at the hands and feet of your owners. It was a nightmare because you actually felt like you were regressing.

And still you opened your mouth and made no other sound of protest as Amy stuffed her sweaty workout socks deep into your mouth, coating your tongue with fresh sweat. Your cheeks bulged out as they accommodated the drenched socks. She patted your head.

"What a good doggy, I'll take you for a walk around the back later so you can get your exercise!"

She left to do whatever a villain did her free time and left you alone with Darla who quickly had you rubbing her pantyhose covered feet. You appreciated the texture of her nylons, they were soft and silky as your massaged her. It was exhausting, you had already spent so much time on your knees that they were starting to ache almost as bad your poor hands.

Thirty minutes in you slowed down a bit, you hadn't even noticed but Darla had. She brought back her foot and abruptly slammed it into your nose, almost breaking it. You howled and whimpered in pain as you fell backward.

"Don't slow down you stupid mutt! Fucking loser slave bitch! You want me to get shocked again?"

You shook your head in terror and whimpered, thankfully she was amused enough that she didn't carryout the threat of shocking you. Those electrocutions were so incredibly painful that you would do nearly anything to avoid suffering one.

And so you continued the lengthy massage for Darla as Amy's socks continued to stew in your mouth. You were now incredibly thirsty and each swallow was painful for you. Your stomach felt sick at the putrid taste of those socks. When you had finished the massage that had actually lasted for more than an hour Darla snapped her fingers and you knew it was time to take off her pantyhose.

"Spit out Amy's socks, and then you get to give my toes a nice tongue bath. Oooh but lets make this a bit more interesting my little bitch."

You spat out the nauseating socks and tried to get some of the dryness out of your mouth so you could worship Darla's feet properly. After removing the pantyhose from Darla's feet she took them and wrapped them around your head so the smelliest part of them were right on top of your nose. Every breath you took out of your nostrils were now filled with her overpowering scent.

The once great hero "Hawk Boy" and then "Hawk Man" was reduced to being Hawky, a pet foot licking slave for one of those evil group of women the city had ever known. As you licked Darla's soles, sucked on her toes and worshiped slavishly you wondered just how ruined the city was by now without you patrolling. How many innocents had suffered because of your weakness?

Darla stretched and leisurely. "Enough loser. Go ahead and put Amy's socks back into your mouth and keep my pantyhose around your nose. Go put on your leash and wait by the door for Amy to take you for your walk."

You whimpered again as you forced back the sweat and now saliva drenched socks back into your mouth. As you crawled away on all fours Darla gave a surprise kick to your balls and you shrieked and collapsed on the ground.

"Oh don't look at me like you want to ask why you stupid bitch. I like hurting you, that's why. You deserve to suffer for your owners you weakling. Letting yourself get beat because you are obsessed with feet? What a joke. Now get, go on, crawl away Hawky."

Hawky, the slave of the Troop Squad, that was your fate.
