121311211221121122121111312.content:
You wait there next to the door like a good puppy. Your mouth is stuffed with Amy's socks while your face is covered in Darla's used pantyhose. It is deeply unpleasant and you want nothing more than to throw away the socks and pantyhose and gulp down a big glass of water. Take a shower and forget that you are a slave of three bratty villains who were turning you into an obedient animal.

You waited, and waited until finally Amy arrives.

"Aww look Hawky is ready for his walk! Well let's go then."

Amy took the leash in her hand and opened the backdoor that you took out outside to the large field. Fortunately for you their hideout was relatively remote and there wasn't other people. Or perhaps it was unfortunate since it meant that there was no chance someone could save you from this fate.

You had to crawl on your hands and knees, there was grass which cushioned your knees a bit but it was still painful, especially after having been on your knees so long serving the Troop Squad earlier in the day!

"No slowing down now Hawky, you don't want to be a bad puppy for us do you?"

You hated not being able to speak. All you were allowed were whimpers and barks. It was breaking you down, you wanted to speak to another human, anyone really. Amy picked up the pace a bit and pulled on your collar choking you as you desperately scrambled to keep up by crawling after her.

When she arrived at the tree you had a fresh humiliation. You flushed a deep red as you lifted your leg and let go of your urine on the side of the tree.

"Marking your territory like a good doggy. Hawky knows better then to make messes inside the house. Who's a good do? You're a good dog!"

You wanted to weep in shame. Amy loved using that giggly school girl voice as she humiliated you. You actually preferred Alice's cold and harsh cruelty over this faux kindness.

After finishing your "business" the walk was finished. But you weren't done.

"Oh look doggy walking through the grass dirtied my sneakers, better get them clean before we go inside!"

Looking on the bright side, at least you got to remove Amy's dirty socks from your mouth. But the taste of vinegar and sweat was soon replaced by dirt and grass. Your tongue had to go deep in between the crevices of her shoes in order to get all the dirt and filth off of them.

Once complete she rubbed your head affectionately. "Good boy!"

As a reward you were allowed to remove Darla's pantyhose and were given a chance to rest before Alice returned. You lapped up water from your doggy bowl and then curled up in a fetal like position on the small circular rug that was your bed. You lay there bored and miserable.

You must have nodded off as you woke up in agony as the collar was electrocuting you. You screamed as you opened your eyes seeing Alice loom above you.

"What the fuck is wrong with you? You stupid wretch, why didn't you come when I called you? Do you like having your brains fried by that collar you fucking piece of trash?"

The current was finally turned off, ever nerve was in pain as you sobbed and whimpered. You pressed your lips to the tops of her boots in apology since you weren't allowed to speak. You heard her spit and felt the saliva hit the top of your head.

"Worthless maggot, crawl over to the couch I want my boots cleaned and then my feet worshiped."

Her boots were quite dirty and it took a long time to get all of the grime from them. All the while her cold eyes bore down on you and you quaked under their stare. Hadn't you just thought that Amy's bratty comments and baby voice were worse than this? You didn't think so anymore, Alice was terrifying.

"Good enough bitch, take them off and worship."

You removed her boots and were hit by the powerful odor from her bare feet. She hadn't worn any socks when wearing the boots and they had clearly gotten very warm. It actually dripped off her bare feet and you let out another involuntarily whimper as you began to tongue clean them. The salty residue mixed with the fumes of her feet were turning your stomach.

Alice was more active than the others while you worshiped her feet. She liked using her other foot to scratch your face with her toenails, rub your head and even force her feet further into your mouth or pull them away so you had to work to get to them. All the while keeping that same cold expression as you struggled to serve her.

It took far longer to completely clean her reeking feet this way and between this and all your other earlier efforts you were hopelessly exhausted. Your knees and back ached and you wanted to do nothing more than return to your nap.

"That shock was to wake you up. Your actual punishment is still to come! Want to be used as my punching bag? Or maybe I should do my aerobics workout on your body? What will give me more pleasure, because that's all I care about. I don't care how much it hurts, because you deserve it you worthless foot freak. You'll die as our pathetic dog, Amy loves playing with you and Darla enjoys your massages but me? Me I can't wait until we've fully broken you, gotten bored of you and then finished you off."

You believed every word she said and again you whimpered, it had become conditioned into you to whimper when in pain or hearing something awful. It was pathetic and you really hated yourself for responding that way but it just felt so... natural.

How did Alice choose to punish you?

Reader's Choice
1213112112211211221211113122.content:
Alice contemplated for a few moments, you weren't sure if she was seriously thinking about it or if she just wanted to make you squirm. Either way she ended up choosing to use you as a workout mat.

She had you lay face up on the floor and turn on some music she then did stair steps where instead of using a step she used your body to step up and then back down! Step up, then down. Step up, then down. Alice wasn't heavy but the repeated steps right on your sternum were beginning to hurt. She was tremendously fit and was showing no signs of slowing as she alternated legs back and forth.

As she began to perspire her feet began to give off a strong odor that made your torment even worse. You felt like you were going insane from the steady beat and the fresh smell of sweaty feet. You whimpered like a dog, this was too much you couldn't take being their slave, their dehumanized dog.

"Warm up is done, try to avoid making too much noise or I'll gag you."

That was a warm up???

Sure enough it was, Alice gracefully jumped up onto your stomach and began jumping up and down like she was using a jump rope. Each little hop was on the balls of her feet and each jump caused her full weight to land right on your unprotected stomach. This was something that most guys could handle for a few jumps... but the continuous non-stop jumping on the same spot was becoming excruciating.

You did your best to avoid making noise as you hated being gagged by stinky socks but it was proving to be a horrible challenge. You gritted your teeth as the pain mounted and your abdominal muscles broke down from the relentless pounding. Soon you weren't able to even clench them and her bare feet were bruising your insides.

Tears leaked down the side of your face as you want to beg mercy but your conditioning prevented you from even speaking. Instead you cried out in agony and pounded the ground with your fists, the pain was too much, it was too much!

"Shut the fuck up cur, I can't hear my music over your howling."

You tried your absolute best but it was too much you cried out again, it felt like she was slamming your internal organs into your spine. With a vindictive stomp to your guts you doubled over as she grabbed her socks and cruelly stuffed them into your mouth.

"They stay there until morning unless Amy or Darla needs to use your disgusting tongue. Now back to my workout!"

You don't know how you didn't go mad from pain, she must have jumped up and down on your battered stomach at least a 1000 times. When it was finally over you curled into a ball of agony, you were left alone with your muffled whimpers and tears.

You knew the reality was that you couldn't survive much more of this. If you stayed longer you were going to be utterly destroyed, body and mind. The collar prevented your mistake but there had to be a way out... there had to be!

**** **** ****

It took a couple of days to figure out a plan. It was daring and dangerous but you had no choice. The collar was obviously electrical, you were going to get it wet and jam a fork into an electric socket. It would electrocute and possibly even kill you but people had survived that types of shocks before and with the collar wet and electronic it would short circuit it and you could then escape the house.

You waited until the three members of the Troop Squad were out doing whatever villainous deeds they did together when you made your move.

Taking in a very deep breath and praying you didn't kill yourself you wet the collar went over to the plug and jammed the fork into it. Instantly you flew backwards as the voltage seared through your cells. Smoke was rising form the collar as you twitched. It took several minutes for you to gain control of your limbs but you did it, the collar was fried! You quickly took it off and stumbled for the door. You open it and shakily look around.

It was a rural area and you weren't exactly sure where you were. Looking to the east you saw the city skyline. If the Troop Squad had some sort of alarm they would be coming from that direction. But there was nothing out West, just more farmland, no residential areas. Not sure what to do you split the difference and headed north, hoping to come across a rode that you could hitchhike and get someone to send police help.

You had hope... but it was a foolish one. The Troop Squad did have an alarm and they were coming. Before you even got to the road they caught up with you.

"N-no... stay back. Stay away from me!"

Amy laughed. "Awww poor Hawky was trying to get away!"

Darla snarled, "You dare speak? You know you aren't allowed to do that anymore."

Alice advanced a cold stare in her eyes. "I guess the bitch does want to be neutered. We'll also have a doctor cut your vocal cords. Clearly we've given you too much freedom. You'll be chained tot he ground away from everything but the couch. When we don't need your hands for a massage they'll be in mitts that don't let you grasp anything. This is the last time you'll ever be outside breathing fresh air."

You panicked. This was a fate too horrible to contemplate. You ran but the days of being forced to eat nothing but dog food and the repeated beatings and stench treatment had weakened you. Your limbs were still not coordinated form the massive electric shock. It was pathetically easy for them to catch up to you.

Darla got there first and simply side kicked you hard, bruising your ribs and sending you tumbling. Amy ran up and stomped down on your balls and you shrieked in pain. Alice was next, she was wearing boots and her boot brutally smashed your ankle, you felt the delicate bones break and you knew you were done.

They weren't though. They spat on you, kicked you and stomped you into the ground.

"Bad doggy!"

"Piece of shit."

"Sub human trash!"

"Animal!"

"Loser!"

"Hawk-WORM!"

On and on the abuse went as they mocked your pathetic attempt at escaping. You realize you had utterly fucked up. You should have slit your throat with a butter knife. They were going to chain you up. Rob you of your voice. Destroy any hope of escaping their vicious abuse. Yes you loved feet but not like this, it wasn't worth having your humanity utterly stripped from you.

But that's what was going to happen. You sob as you are battered, partially from the pain but partially from the ultimate horror that your life was going to be from here on.
1213112112211211221211113122.title: Does aerobic exercise on your body.

12131121122112112212111131221.content:
One Year Later...

The Troop Squad had conquered the city. The entire city had actually lined up and kissed each of their pretty toes. It had been an incredibly long line, the paying of homage to the cities new Goddesses had taken days. They had conquered on gotten everything they wanted out of life.

You on the other hand were a hopeless shell of a man. Your legs had been cut off at the knee. You could only crawl now. Your teeth had been removed in one night of endless agony with no pain relievers. Your vocal chords had been cut, it was impossible to actually speak now, only high pitched whines and even that could only be done briefly. You were collared and chained to the center of the living area. It was rather high tech as it could be enclosed with a push of a button to allow an ice cold shower to clean you off when it was necessary.

You had actually been neutered and that had taken any joy that you once had out of being enslaved at the feet of the Troop Squad. Your hands were still allowed to massage them but only when they wanted it. Otherwise the high tech mitts that covered your hands would force them into a fist and then be covered to turn you truly into a dog.

You had no freedoms, no sources of entertainment. You weer just a pet for them. You had to lick and worship their feet daily, a task that brought no joy since you had no sex drive. Their stench was just horror now. Even your nights weren't free from abuse as your mouth was always stuffed with nasty corroded sweat filled socks. Your dreams were just nightmare versions of your reality and soon you began to lose track of your oldest memories. Your school friends, your heroic exploits, your family. All were now a dull haze.

They mocked you but soon language stopped making sense to you. You knew their commands, heel, lick, worship, open but complex thoughts weren't really easy to grasp anymore. Your mind retreated and you truly became Hawky, a complete and utter loser who's every waking moment was living hell.

The Troop Squad had won and conquered your body, mind and spirit. Welcome to the rest of your miserable life.

Loser.

THE END
12131121122112112212111131221.title: The End of Hawkboy: Epilogue

1213112112211211221211113123.content:
"Actually you know what? I think I'll give you a chance. One last opportunity to escape your miserable fate. Would you like that doggy? Would you? Bark if you want a chance."

You barked. You would do pretty much anything to escape what these girls had in store for you.

"Haha what a bitch. Don't worry I'm not lying, I will give you a chance. I'm going to go get changed and I'll allow you to recover a bit from the shocks. I want it to be fair you know. Then I'm going to come back and you'll have your hands and feet free and we are going to wrestle. If you can beat me, you are free to go. Bark if this makes you happy.

You barked and barked.

"Silly bitch. You aren't going to win but it's so much fun to see hope in your eyes. Because destroying it will be so much fun!" The brat giggled and went to get changed.

She was right, you had hope again. All you needed to do was win, you were weak from the abuse but you were still someone who had once been a hero. You could save the day again, you had your old skills, you could beat her!

Some time passed and Alice came back down dressed in black pantyhose. You could tell they were dirty by some of the stains on them and you knew if you lost she would make you sniff them. It gave you further incentive to escape this hell they had put you in.

The other girls were there too but they promised not to interfere.

Alice grinned. "I don't need help making you my bitch. I'm going to let you talk now like a human, but remember if you lose its back to being our puppy. I think I'll also snip your vocal chords so you'll never be able to speak again in the future."

The thought horrified you but gave you even more anger and determination.

"You" *cough* your voice hadn't been used to speak and it was a bit of a struggle. Alice laughed in your face as you cleared your throat and tried again.

"You're going down."

Her bratty laughter and eye roll made you see red and you nearly charged at her right then and there.

"All right, time to take your hope away!"

Darla did a countdown and the battle was on!

You immediately closed in to grapple with her. Your locked arms around each other and strove to get the upper hand.

"You actually think you can win? Hahahah, how sad and pathetic. You are going to be our dog until you die!"

"Fuck you!" You scream in a rage. But she just laughs and suddenly shifts her body weight to the side while rotating you at a downward angle. You fall to the ground with her on top of you. You instantly try to buck her off but she just rides your attempts with ease.

"Awww done already?" She takes the time to gather saliva in her mouth and then slowly drip it down on your face to emphasize your helplessness. You actually whimper a bit as you realize the constant debasement had weakened you so much.

"I'll tell you what, I'll let you up if you tell me what a loser you are and that you'll never beat me at anything. Then I'll let you up and give you another chance."

The words were so shameful but this was your only hope! With great reluctance you did as she commanded.

"I am a total loser Alice. I'll never beat you at anything."

"That's right because you are a loser!"

She brought up her knee suddenly slamming it into your testicles. You cried out from the pain but she honored her word and got off of you. You fought against the pain as best you could and stumbled to your feet.

"Try to last more than 10 seconds this time!"

You steady your breathing and then charged forward! You threw yourself at her hoping to spear her to the ground. She spun to the side and you flew past. You quickly tried to scramble back to your feet but she was already on top of you. Her arm looped around your neck as she put you into a sleeper hold. You knew from your martial arts training that it would only take her seconds to knock you out!

Thinking fast you tried to roll on the ground to get her to release but she just giggled and tightened her grip.

"Ready to go nighty night Hawky?"

How had she manhandled you this easily? It wasn't fair. You saw stars in your vision as she constricted your artery cutting off the flow of blood to your brain. You struggled and then.... you looked up in confusion. Alice was on her feet, shit you must have passed out.

Darla commented. "That was the most boring and shortest wresting match I've ever seen."

Amy giggled. "Hawky isn't cut out for fighting he's too wimpy!"

You had lost. "Please one more chance." You begged.

Alice stalked over and pushed her smelly pantyhose covered foot in your face.

"Why? Why should I bother? You didn't stand a chance and you never will. It wasn't even an interesting fight. You are too much of a loser to stand up to me. You lost, you stupid bitch."

Your hands came up to try to remove her foot but she just flexed her leg muscle and you couldn't dislodge it.

"See how easy this is you stupid loser? You are pathetic."

Hot tears streamed down your cheeks. This was it, your last and final chance to escape. Alice never bluffed, they were going to cut your vocal chords. You would never be able to speak like a human again.

"Awww look girls he's crying."

Amy rushed over. "Ooh I want to see the wittle cry baby cry."

Darla walked over as well. "Hah you are right he is crying. Some hero."

Her disdain sent you over the edge into full blown sobs.

Alice shook her head in disgust as she cruelly rubbed her foot all over face, smearing the tears all around.

"You the big strong, hah, well not really strong, man got beaten by a girl! Literally three girls without any super powers of fancy gadgets took you down. This so pathetically sad. You were never a real hero just a loser playing pretend."

"Let's put him to sleep girls and then call over the doctor to take away his ability to speak." Alice suggested and they all agreed.

You tried to fight back but Alice could easily pin you by herself. Darla stepped on your hand and then shoved her foot on your neck and pushed down hard. Amy stood on your other hand and used her other foot to pinch your nose between her toes. Alice kept the pressure on your mouth not letting it open up.

Your oxygen was now completely gone as three feet stopped your breathing completely.

"Loser!"

"Suffocate!"

"No talkies for Hawky!"

"Hahah"

"He's still crying!"

"Ewww my feet are wet with his tears."

"Wimp!"

"Foot bitch."

Their taunts echoed in your ears as you suffocated. Hope drained from your eyes and you saw Alice throw back her head in laughter as it died. Hawk Boy or Hawk Man, either name was no more. You were now Hawky their pathetic foot licking dog!
1213112112211211221211113123.title: Something Else Happens

12131121122112112212111131232.content:
You woke up in an unfamiliar place? Your head was woozy and as you looked around you realize that you were still in the Troop Squad's home. This must have been one of the rooms you weren't allowed to go in.

"You know Hawky you were so pathetic fighting me. We wanted it to go on longer and instead you lost in seconds." She laughed in derision. She clearly thought you were pathetic.

"Amy and Darla wanted to have some fun too. Right now they are changing into pantyhose and then you get to wrestle both of them at the same time! Hahaha you couldn't even beat one of us but now you have to fight two at once!" Her laughter was starting to grate on your nerves. It wasn't fair at all but she found it amusing.

The two girls came down in crust looking dark pantyhose and you backed away. Noticing for the first time that you were actually on a fighting floor mat. You doubted it was for your benefit but you were thankful for small mercies.

"Hawky its time to sniff my pantyhose! But we'll be fair." She laughed, there was nothing fair about this. "So if you do manage to pin us we won't make you sniff these pantyhose, we'll actually let you watch as we burn them so you'll never have to smell these. 121311211221121122121111312321.content:
About a year had passed. Fortunately the Troop Squad had not forced you to only bark like a dog or do worse. The brats were all a rather flighty group of villains, their whims changed from day to day. In that year you still hadn't given up hope but you had to endure a lot.

"What do you think Hawky?" Amy giggled when she had shown it to you.

"If you like it then I like it Princess." She laughed and made you kiss her stinky feet. It was always better to say what you thought they wanted to hear rather than your true feelings. You hated the photo because it shown your face to the world. Not that you really could be counted as hero anymore... but still old habits die hard.

It was getting close to the holiday and the Troop Squad had to decided on an outfit change for the season. Amy an Darla had started wearing green pantyhose while Alice wore red. Their shapely feet and legs looked lovely and since these were new outfits they weren't quite as horrible as the old pairs of pantyhose they liked to wear when they abused you.

That wasn't the only part of their outfit that they changed up on. Amy and Darla wore elf ears and festive green sweaters while Alice wore a Mrs. Clause outfit. The dastardly villains wore those benign costumes while they were out doing all sorts of horrible crimes.

You were waiting on your knees where you had been left when the Troop Squad came in. They were carrying bags of loot and cash.

"Haha did you see that Mall Santa after I kicked his teeth in?" Alice was bragging to her two partners in crime.

Darla winced. "Oh it was brutal his stupid teeth went flying out!"

Amy shared her own exploits. "That was fun but I really enjoyed stealing all those presents they had picked up for the orphanage. Little brats don't get any Christmas this year, hahaha!"

You felt sick. These villains were monsters!

Alice snapped her fingers. "Hey dumb-ass get over here and massage our feet. Its been a long day!"

You obeyed instantly. "Yes Princess."

You quickly removed their foot wear and kissed each of their toes reverently. You then began to give each member a long foot massage. Amy liked making you sniff one of her feet while you worked on the other, while Darla liked to stuff her foot in your open mouth. Each of them had different preferences for how they wanted to be served, and you had made sure to memorize them as best you could.

After at least an hour of foot rubs Darla suggested a game. "Let's make our pet see how well he knows us! Here let me blindfold you."

Scared and nervous you didn't resist. It never went well when you resisted.

"Now you have to sniff our feet and guess which foot you are sniffing. Get it wrong and you are trouble!"

You swallowed nervously. You really didn't want to mess up. You blindly approached the first girl. You sensed they had moved around so as to not make it easy for you. You found her foot and began sniffing it. You inhaled her smelly foot heavily and knew it had to be Alice. You hated her damn guts, her smell had been imprinted on your brain and you knew it by heart.

"It is Princess Alice."

The stocking foot began to rub all over face.

"What a good and loyal bitch!" She laughed. They shuffled around again you tried another stocking. This one was harder. You sniffed, and sniffed and sniffed but you couldn't figure it out. It wasn't Alice so you took a guess and said Amy.

"WRONG!" Darla yelled and stomped on your face with her foot.

"I'm sorry ma'am! Please ma'am, please, I'm sorry." You begged rather pathetically.

"Too fucking bad loser, time to take your punishment. You get to get spanked by all of us!"

They undid your blindfold and you had to lean over Darla's lap. She took one of her flats and began laying into your ass. They let you keep your thin underwear on but only so that your dick wasn't touching them. It did little to protect your butt as she slammed her shoe over and over into it.

"Stupid loser! How do you lose at every game you play? Every thing you do?"

*SPANK* *SPANK* *SPANK* *SPANK*

"I'm sorry ma'am." You cried out in pain as she continued to let loose on you.

"Worthless loser! That's what you are, nothing but a stupid loser!"

After what must have been a hundred strokes she threw you to the ground and spat on you. Your punishment wasn't over yet though! It was Amy's turn.

Amy began spanking. "Are you sorry for failing you naughty little boy?"

"Yes Princess I'm sorry."

"No, don't call me princess right now, call me mommy."

You didn't want to say it but you had to.

"I'm sorry mommy I'll do better in the future."

Amy picked up the pace blistering your already painful bottom. As you cried out she shushed you, putting a finger from her free hand over your mouth.

"Shhhhh."

She continued spanking and despite her command you couldn't help but cry again.

"Shhhhh baby."

"I'm sorry mommy it hurts."

Darla and Alice were laughing up a storm at your expense.

"Oh we'll be here forever if you keep stopping to shush him Amy!" Alice declared. "Let me give his mouth something to do instead of cry."

With those words she shoved her red stockings into your face and commanded you to lick. Obeying you licked her feet through the pantyhose as Amy continued to spank you.

"See baby just needed his pacifier. Aren't feet just so yummy? Isn't aunty Alice so nice to you?"

When you tried to speak Alice just shoved her stocking clad foot into your mouth while you continued to lick, tears kept streaming down your face. This was so mortifying and humiliating. You hated them so much. Finally after an extraordinarly long spanking session Amy was done with you.

"I think baby has learned his lesson. Now thank mommy."

"Thank you mommy."

You could hear Alice snicker from behind you.

"All right bitch, its MY turn." She told you. She was the one you feared the most. You whimpered a bit as you got on her lap. Both Amy and Darla placed their green clad feet into your face and told you to kiss while you were being punished. And then Alice lit into your ass like the 4th of July.

"Stupid fucking wimp! Why can't you stop crying you man baby? You've been worshiping at our feet for a year and you still can't tell our feet apart by scent? You wretched cur, I can't believe you could be this moronic."

You wept freely as she wailed on you. Her words cut deep. You even started to believe them. You were a loser. You were kissing the feet of villains while being spanked, what kind of moron gets themselves in that situation!? And she didn't slow down her spanking one bit, in fact she hit you harder and harder as she verbally abused you.

After what seemed like an eternity she angrily shoves you to the floor as you weep. Amy lifts your head up and tries to 'comfort' you with her baby talk.

"Aww poor baby, was Aunty Alice too rough on your little bum bum? Next time baby should do a better job, shush now, shush little baby."

Her words just grind into your soul even worse. She wasn't treating you like a respected opponent, or a defeated worthy foe but like a childlike helpless child. After several minutes of this she says. "There, there almost done for today. Down you go onto the floor, that's right look up at mommy now."

Three feet, two red clad and one in green rub around your face. They smoosh your nose, and mouth, pull on your cheek and rub your forehead. They laugh at you, they laugh at how pathetic you are. Alice is the loudest, her bratty laugh puts the others to shame but they are also annoying. They think nothing of what they have done to you, how they have destroyed your self-esteem completely.

"All right time for baby to take a nap." Amy said as they removed their pantyhose. Amy's green pantyhose went into your mouth, Alice's red went into your mouth, fully filling it, while Darla's was wrapped around your eyes.

Their victorious laughter still echoed through the house and you knew you had been totally defeated by them. They had destroyed you. Even after a year of service and abuse you could still feel worse and they had taken you there. You were now more defeated than ever and all you could do was cry yourself to sleep like a pathetic loser.

Alice flips out her telephone and starts recording as you swallow what last vestiges of your pride you had left and did as you were told.

"I'm sorry mommy I was a bad boy and I wet myself. I won't do it again mommy."

More laughter from Darla and Alice. Now they were the ones with tears on their cheeks but unlike your tears they tears of pure laughter and joy at destroying and debasing you.

You fearfully rained down kisses on her fishnet stockings as the entire group of villains laughed at your plight. They were now arrogantly ignoring you, it made you so frustrated! They used to fear you (well not really but in your mind you thought so).

But one more arrival was joining the group. Jester! She was dressed as a cute jester as normal though this time her socks were red and white and went up to her knees.

"Oooh am I the last arrival? I want to hog your little loser here for a bit. Come on Hawk Boy, lick my socks!"

You bent to the humiliating task as she mocked you.

"Yeah you like that? You like being a foot wimp? Loser!" She made an L with her hand and put it to her forehead. "LOSER!"

The rest of the villains laughed as Jester continued her verbal berating.

"Honestly you were always pathetic but this takes the cake, you've been locked up and serving the Troop Squad as a foot bitch for an entire year?? How many kisses on their toes have you given? How many gallons of foot sweat have you devoured? And all because you wanted to try to be a hero. Hahahaha."

Alice grinned. "Hey girls you want to see something funny? I recently video taped this loser's one last shot at freedom..."

No! She couldn't! I made a whining sound but they ignored me and began to play the tape of Alice destroying me.

Amy grabbed you and put you on her lap. "Now don't cry Hawky, be a good boy and watch with the rest of us."

You try to protest but she covers your mouth. "Shhh."

Jester rolls her eyes. "You are getting babied by someone your own age. Fucking loser!"

Tears start to roll down your face as the evil women all watch you being utterly destroyed. Their taunts ring in your ears and you squirm in Amy's grip but she just holds you tighter and whispers into your ear to shush.

"Let everyone see how Aunty Alice put you in your place Hawky!"

More tears more shushes from Amy.

Gales of laughter make their rounds as the video finally comes to a close. Alice says, "Hey want to see Hawky try again?"

Alice wasn't even wearing proper wresting clothes. She had on a black dress and white opaque pantyhose. This makes it all the more humbling as you are forced to fight her. You try to grab at her dress to take advantage but she easily spins around you and catches you by the waist. In a feat of strength she lifts you with one arm around your torso and slams you to the ground. Her foot covers your face and everyone laughs and taunts you.

Jester jumps out of her chair. "I want to play too!"

You had no chance before now it was even worse. They toyed with you but you never got an opening. They pinned you beneath their feet, but with two people they got creative with their poses. Jester would get you in a head lock while Alice lay on the ground and pushed up with her feet into your face. Another time Alice stood on your arms while Jester stood on your face forcing you to inhale her stinky socks!

"Every time you fight a villain you lose!" Jester remarked. "Say it, tell us that you can't win and we will always defeat you."

"I can't win... you'll always defeat me." The words weren't even hard to say anymore. The reality had been pounded into your skull over and over again.

Jester laughed her maniacal laugh and made you get up and try to fight again. This time Jester put you in a leg lock while Alice had you in a camel clutch. Their arrogant laughter was temporarily drowned out by your screams of agony as Alice painfully forced your face into her pantyhose.

Jester smirked. "You are too loud!" She took off her knee high red and white socks and stuffed one of them in your mouth! Because the sock went up to the knee there was a lot of material and it really filled your mouth. She used the second one to wrap around your mouth and tied it behind your head.

"There we go no more annoying screams!" Her bratty laughter hurt your ears as you had to fight them again. Another painful arm bar combined with feet on your face. You noticed Darla was once again video taping and all you could do was sob. You were done, you couldn't fight anymore.

Both girls posed on you, foot on face while the others took photos of you. After that was done Jester reclaimed her socks.

"Kiss our feet and tell us you are a doggy foot bitch on camera!"

*KISS* "I'm a doggy foot bitch." *KISS*

"Now say you love toe jam!"

"I love toe jam." You were sobbing with ultimate humiliation as they captured all of the footage they wanted of your debasement.

While the evil women all had fun they did have other business to get to. You were made to kiss each of their feet and thank you for coming over.

Jester grinned. "I hope they let me borrow you soon. Ta Ta loser!"

You were emotionally destroyed. You wept but Amy carried you to your room shushing you.

"Give me a nice massage Hawky, kiss my feet and show me what a good puppy you are. There, there, don't cry while my toes are in your mouth, hahaha!" Her bratty laughter just made the tears come down harder. Why did she have to do this to you? Why?

After a long foot massage where she continued to mock you she finally yawned.

"All right Hawky, go cry yourself to sleep my little weenie baby. Honestly you are such a little cry baby, its cute but gets annoying sometimes. Get some rest because we have a lot more fun things to do tomorrow!"

And you did that, wept and curled into a ball trying to get the scent of their feet and the sound of their laughter out of your ears and nose. How you hated them all!

1213112112211211221211113123212321.content:
You wore woken up the next day, your face sticky with your dried tears.

"Get your ass in here Hawky!" Darla yelled from across the house.

You quickly rushed to comply. When you arrived you saw Darla in her workout clothes, she had built up a sweat. Clearly she had gone on a morning run.

'Attend my feet you lazy bitch."

You quickly obeyed and did what had become routine for you. And while it was routine it was no less horrible. You quickly untied her shoes and gently pried them off of her sweaty feet. Her white socks were soaked with sweat and the odor caused you to wince. Darla's feet weren't the worst normally but when she got a good workout in... the pungent aroma was like a weight on your chest.

"Socks stay on this time foot boy."

"Yes Miss Darla."

You knelt below her and lifted one foot up to your nose. You inhaled deeply as you began to rub her soles strongly. Darla always insisted that you put your hands and face to use while serving her. You had to rub them firmly while sniffing, it never took long for your hands to start cramping up and your sinuses to become clouded with her stench.

After the massage she would make you lick and suck the sweat from her socks with your tongue. The salty taste was putrid and always threatened to make you sick. Fortunately you had long mastered the ability not to actually sick up. The horrid beatings on the rare times it had occurred had taught you well.

As you were finishing up Amy came out of her bedroom.

"Good morning Darla! And oh look our good little puppy is already serving. We have another surprise for you today Hawky!"

Great... another surprise.

"Oh now don't make that face my wittle good doggy, you don't want to make mommy mad now do you."

"No mommy, I'm sorry mommy."

She laughed that bratty laugh that grated on your nerves.

"No you don't. Your surprise is that you get to play with Jester again today! Yay!"

Fuck. You hated that demented clown. She was way too into humiliating and abusing you yesterday.

"No frowney faces now! You don't want another spanking do you?"

"No mommy, please, I'll be goody."

"Yes you will Hawky, yes you will my good little doggy!" Her faux sweet voice was so deeply humiliating and emasculating that you wanted to weep in frustration. How you hated these arrogant brats!

Darla was done with you so you crawled over to Amy who just had you lay there as she rested her white opaque stockings on your face. This was a newer pair so didn't have quite the stench as the others had but her natural foot smell wasn't a field of flowers either so this wasn't pleasant for you.

After enjoying your services as a foot rest the doorbell rang and the damned clown waltzed in.

Amy and Jester hugged and you glanced at what Jester was wearing. Her outfit was her more traditional attire, instead of red and white socks she was wearing red pantyhose that led up to black panties. A fitting color for the legs of a demon!

"Come kiss my friend's feet Hawky!" Amy demanded and you did so with trepidation. The odor coming from her pantyhose let you know that these hadn't been washed since the last time they were worn.

"Hehehe, hahahhaha, what a good little doggy! But you know kisses like that or so tame, I want to play with him a different way."

"Oh what did you have in mind Jester?" Amy asked.

Her eyes became slightly crazed. "I want to see if he can help me with a magic trick!"

I shuddered. What insane plan did she have?

"Oooh magic, won't that be fun Hawky, he volunteers of course!"

"I want to see if he can make my foot disappear, so come on you stupid dog, open your mouth as wide as you can!"

Amy laughed, her loud bratty pitch must carried throughout the house because Darla and Alice came down to see what was going on. Jester explained again and they loved the idea. You soon found yourself with your arms handcuffed behind your back and sitting in front of the couch in front of Jester. Darla attached a lease around your collar and handed it to their guest.

Amy knelt behind you and whispered in your ear.

"Why are you shaking? You know mommy isn't going to let anything too bad happen to you. Aunty Jester is just going to shove her foot in your mouth, and then shove it deeper and deeper until she can't see anything but her ankle. That won't be so bad, you just have to be a big boy and say Ahhhhhh."

"Please mommy I'm..." You were going to say scared but she put her finger over your mouth.

"Shhh, shhhh, don't embarrass us in front of the guest. Be a good boy and open your mouth and get ready for her foot!"

Jester snickered. "Yeah Hawky, listen to your mommy! My foot isn't that scary, is it?"

She waved her foot in front of your face, not alleviating your fears in the slightest.

"Open up!" Alice snapped and you obeyed. Jester slowly pushed her foot forward. The toes entered your mouth and you tasted the dirt and salty dried sweat. Her toes and sole glided over your tongue as it slowly made its way to the back of your throat.

"Such a good boy, open wider my wittle sweetie pie." Amy whispered in your ear. You lowered your jaw, trying to appease your mommy.

The toes continued their inexorable advance. They now touched the back of your throat, you gagged a bit convulsing slightly but Amy gripped your hair steadying you. Jester grinned, her smile far wider than appropriate as she pushed her toes into the back of your throat. You gagged again but you had no where to go and she continued pushing.

You were drooling down to the floor as she wedged her foot into your mouth gagging you. Her toes were meeting resistance as your throat angled downward. She yanked on the leash hard and you gave out a muffled cry of pain as the stockings slammed the back of your throat.

"I can still see my foot! Don't be a bad doggy! Make it disappear!" She demanded.

Tears were streaming down your cheeks. You sank slightly lower on your knees to give a better angle for her toes to lodge into your windpipe. Amy let you move so you can better take Jester's foot.

"Such a good obedient boy, so close Hawky, just a couple more inches."

A couple more inches??? You could barely breathe now, your nose your only means of air but the toes were now partially constricting the passage. Jester laughed arrogantly, enjoying your terrified distended facial expression.

They wormed deeper and deeper, feet had never gone this far down your throat. You retched but had nothing in your system to spit up. The air was diminishing even more now and Jester grabbed the leash with both hands and gave a mighty yank!

Pain wracked your throat as her stocking shoved all the way into the back and then pushed down into your windpipe. The outline of her foot could be seen inside your throat! All air was impossible as all four of them cheered and laughed. In their bratty arrogance they didn't realize that oxygen was now completely impossible due to the full obstruction of your air tubes!

You gagged and struggled but Jester's foot was actually wedged into your throat!

Darla first noticed. "Oh hey Jester I don't think he's getting any air in now..."

"GOOD! I want to see him turn blue for my next trick!"

Tears of agony and mortal terror rained down your cheeks as your eyes sought out Amy's. You begged her, you pleaded her with your eyes. Please mommy, please mommy save me is what you begged mentally to her. What was Amy going to do?

12131121122112112212111131232123212.content:
You were absolutely terrified and Jester was just laughing at you! However Amy saw the danger and granted mercy.

"All right Jester get your foot out of his wittle mouth, I don't want my Hawky passing out on us."

"Awww boring." Jester said but she extracted her foot from your mouth and and pushed you away.

You gasped for air and then coughed while the girls laughed at your helplessness. When you got your breath back you meekly rained down on kisses on Amy's feet.

"Thank you mommy, thank you, thank you so much."

She ruffled your a hair with your foot. "Such a good little Hawky, don't you worry I'll always make sure you are safe so you can stay with me forever and ever!"

Darla rolled her eyes. "He really is a pathetic loser, needing Amy to protect him. Hey I'm bored let's see how weak he really is. Let's make him arm wrestle us so he can see what a weakling he is."

They all agreed and since it was Darla's idea she was up first.

You grasped her hand and began to push down but she didn't move even a fraction of an inch.

"Pathetic."

Then she slowly inexorably pushed your hand back down the other way. You strained every fiber of your muscles but the living conditions you had suffered through for over a year had made you pathetically weak. Stopping her was like trying to stop the rising of the sun, it was impossible. With a smirk she pushed your arm fully down winning the match.

"Like I said pathetic. Now kiss my feet and tell me how superior I am to you."

You obeyed kissing her stocking clad feet.

"You are superior to me Darla, you'll always beat me in everything."

Jester thought this was just too funny and her laughter rang around the room.

"You girls have really broken this bitch! Look at how well trained he is, look at how pathetic and sad he looks, what an absolute fucking loser!"

Your eyes were downcast, you didn't blush or have any other physical reaction, your shame had become a constant, a fact of life, an immutable reality.

"My turn." Alice replied and instead of toying with you she just slammed your arm down as soon as the arm wresting match began. She grabbed your jaw and brought her face close to yours, her eyes boring into you.

"Weak trash like you should have never even tried to become a hero, now worship my feet."

Kissing and licking Alice's feet was a daily occurrence but the sheer power and domination she had just displayed made you extra servile this time.

"Thank you Alice, your feet are divine, thank you for putting me in my place, I love them and worship them, I am such a loser for daring to challenge you, thank you for letting me serve."

The over the top statements brought another round of bratty laughter to the group.

Jester wanted to go next and as the match began you felt yourself starting to win. You redoubled your efforts as you slowly pushed Jester's hand back. Her smile grew broad and then manic on her face as you slowly brought her hand down.

Just as it was about to touch the table she laughs in your face and pushes your hand all the way back to the starting area and then down to the other side! She had been toying with you the entire time!

"You.. you... why would you do that! Why would you make me think I could win." You say stunned at her unsportsmanlike conduct.

"Hawky! Shush!" Amy angrily replied as she covered your mouth with her hand. "Don't treat our guest rudely."

Jester laughed. "Yeah don't be rude... bitch."

"Now Hawky you will apologize and then pay homage to Jester's feet, do it now or you'll go to bed hungry tonight!"

There was no winning of course you had to do what was required and so you abased yourself and apologized profusely while humbling yourself at Jester's feet. Who of course mocked you the entire time.

"Yeah you better apologize, little foot boy, little loser who can never win. Hahahhaha, hahahahha!"

Mommy... err Amy was next and she grabbed your hand and you got ready to begin.

"Now sweetie, you can fight back if you want or you can prove what a good little boy you are and just pull my hand and make yourself lose on purpose. You know you can't win and I won't punish you if you try but it would be nice if you started to learn that you shouldn't even try to fight back against Mommy and her friends."

You trembled. You felt that this would be a significant surrender on your part if you didn't even try to defeat her. But she had saved you from Jester's foot so... you couldn't resist her request. You pulled her hand until your hand touched the table signaling your surrender and her victory.

"Wow, how the fuck are you this pathetic!?" Darla demanded. The other girls thought it was funny but she seemed really angry at what a loser you were.

"He's such a good obedient little Hawky for us Darla, don't be so angry." Turning to you she says in that faux sweet voice, "Now come worship my pantyhose and tell everyone how much stronger I am."

"Yes mommy."

You worshiped her pantyhose and went on about how strong and beautiful and powerful she was. How weak you were and how you could never defeat her, how you shouldn't even try. Each statement you made cemented your lowly status and led to rounds of bratty laughter from the group.

"Such a good pet, now lets have another contest, who had the best smelling feet. Let's blindfold our Hawky and see who wins!"

You were quickly blindfolded and you heard some shuffling and then you had to begin sniffing their pantyhose and socks. You could tell some must have changed what they were wearing as they weren't matching the scents from earlier. You sniffed and evaluated how bad each one was and picked the least bad version.

"The best smelling feet were the third one..."

They removed your blindfold and you saw Darla smiling triumphantly.

"I guess my feet are the best!" She grins.

Alice and Jester don't seem to care but Amy is pissed.

"You disloyal pathetic dog! How dare you like another's feet more than mommy's! Time to to punish you, you naughty boy!"

Oh shit... you couldn't see who it was you would have picked her feet if you had known. Now mommy was going to be angry with you. You shrinked back but she easily manhandled you and put you over her lap.

She begins to wail on you.

"Naughty!"

"Ungrateful!"

"Spoiled!"

"Pathetic!"

"Bad doggy!"

Her verbal abuse and spanking started to make you cry.

Alice took a seat on the couch and propped her feet up in your face.

"Shut up and take your medicine, but be useful while you get spanked. Worship my pantyhose covered feet, get your tongue to work instead of crying like a useless baby."

You try to stifle your sobs but you can't quite do it due to Amy's trashing. But while you are crying you still manage to get your tongue to work as you glide over Alice's sweaty and worn pantyhose. You end up having to lick up your own tears from her pantyhose as they continue to come out as Amy reddens your backside.

Jester is beside herself howling with laughter.

"Your spanking him like baby!? Like a baby! Hahahaha, hahahha, what a fucking loser! You thought you could be a hero but your sucking on toes like they were a pacifier while you are getting spanked! Hahahha, hahahha!"

The arrogant laughter of Jester made you sob with emotional pain to match the physical agony you were in. They treated you like you were a useless and worthless child. Like a pet, like your feelings didn't matter. It was horrible and constant. You were so broken down by this continuous treatment you were starting to actually believe you were truly worthless and this was your justified fate!

Finally the spanking came to an end and Amy had you kiss her feet and apologize. But is your punishment done? Or is she still mad and wants to punish you in some other way. You wait on trembling knees before your mommy as he decides your fate!

121311211221121122121111312321232122.content:
You had just been humiliated and then punished for picking someone else's feet other than Amy's as the best smelling feet. You were still sore from the vicious spanking you had been given but you could see that Amy was still not satisfied with your pain and debasement.

"Stupid naughty Hawky, your spanking was just the first part of your punishment! I don't think you are a sorry enough yet."

You cringe away from her but Jester grabs you by the hair and laughs right in your face, her mouth inches from your ear.

"HAHAHA, You really gonna get it now!"

"Please mommy no, please I'm sorry I didn't know."

"You didn't know? You've been at my feet for a YEAR, and you still don't know? I'm so hurt by you, your like my little baby who I love and protect and you don't know my feet? You are such a stupid doggy!"

"I'm sorry."

But your apologies weren't enough, she wanted you to suffer.

"Stand him up girls I'm going to show him how angry my feet are!"

They forced you to stand and held your arms. Amy told you to spread your legs and you knew what was about to happen. You began to beg and plead, which just led to all of the girls laughing as t hey arrogantly denied you any sort of mercy. Once your legs were spread... Amy began her punishment.

First she pulled her leg back and sent what looked like a powerful kick to your nuts. You were already wincing from the blow and even closed your eyes and prepared for agony. But instead she pulled the kick and only lightly tapped your testicles. You opened your eyes in relief and then her leg snapped back and then kicked full force into you!

You howled in pain as her sexy foot slammed into your body. You felt your insides twist and the bratty laughter once again howl around you.

*WHAM*

Another kick.

*WHAM*

Another.

You felt would you collapse but the girls held you up. You once again began to cry and Jester came around from behind you wrapped one arm around your neck while the other she used her hand to shut your mouth.

"Shhh mommy is punishing you, don't make so much noise. Oooh that hurts, ssssshhhhh, no more screaming you loud little boy."

Jester was acting as the surrogate mother since Amy was now the disciplinarian.

After several more kicks they finally let you collapse onto the ground. Amy came up and drove her stocking foot into your face. Her scent enveloped your nose as she stood in a classic victory pose over you.

"I think I've been too nice to you Hawky. You clearly don't know the meaning of loyalty. You are a weak and pathetic dog, no not a dog, you are a worm. A slithering literal worm. But even as weak and useless as you are I chose to be kind and nurture. Maybe I should stop, maybe I should kill all the maternal instincts inside of me and really destroy you.

"Please," you cry from underneath her foot.

She lifts her foot and lets you speak.

"Please mommy, I love you, I'll be your good doggy, your good baby, please mommy don't stop nurturing me."

At some point you didn't know if you were saying that to appease her or if you were saying that because you really wanted her nurturing. Everything had become too confused. Darla and Alice never showed you any kindness but Amy did, even if it meant having to serve at her feet and listen to her baby talk.

Jester decided to break the sweet moment where you were looking at each other by jumping onto your stomach.

"Wheee its like a trampoline, lets stop worrying about all the heavy stuff and bounce up and down on him. You can talk about boring feelings later!"

Darla agreed. "Hell yeah, lets trample this loser. Feel free to baby him after we have our fun Amy, or not I don't care."

"Fine, but we aren't done with our talk yet Hawky."

"Wheeeeee" Jester cried as she started to jump and down atop of your belly. Alice came by and decided to physically stand on your head. You gave a muffled cry but no one cared. Darla meanwhile decided your testicles hadn't suffered enough and started to try to step on them but they kept squirming away, still she had fun trying.

Alice tuned to the jumping Jester while still standing full weight on your face and head.

"Jester this is all fun and games, and you are welcome to use this useless doormat anytime you want but we need to talk more about the future of the city. The police and "heroes" can't stop us anymore. But we know how greedy criminals are and once the law it out of the way we'll start to fight each other. I don't want that, I want to be friends.

Jester had just finished a mighty jump your stomach that actually slightly lifted Alice up off the floor as your body involuntarily tried to lift up and curl into a ball.

"I'm with you but who do you think is going to try to fight you?"

Alice stepped off of your head and you breathed a sigh of relief. You looked up at the veritable goddesses speaking to each other and you realized that int his impromptu location the fate of the city was being decided.

"Plenty of people. Frostbite and her family really want to rule this place, Madam Reich believes her race is superior which puts her at odds with several other villains. I'm trying to convince the Troop Squad that maybe, just maybe offense might be better than waiting for someone else to start something."

"Ehhh I dunno I love my sister villains." Jester said this while marching up and down your chest and stomach like in a marching band.

"Well think about it but let us know before you leave what your decision is." Alice told her and then she proceeded to step on your neck and balance with one foot so all of her weight was on your Adam's apple.

You started to turn colors as Jester laughed. Darla finally manage to trap one of your testicles and your agony reached a crescendo. Before you passed out you saw Amy tell Alice something.

"Oh fine, but you really are babying him too much, get off of his nuts Darla, Amy thinks our little toy needs a break."

Oh sweet mercy, you thought. You pathetically crawled over to Amy and kissed her stockings in thanks.

"See Hawky? I do care for you now lets go to your room while Alice and Jester talk. Your little body is all worn out!"

She takes you to your room and takes off her pantyhose and wraps it around your nose, leaving your mouth free to kiss her beautiful toes.

"Hawky you know I think we are getting a closer connection. I was mad with you today but I think you do love me more than the rest of the Troop Squad. And that's important to me... for a variety of reasons. I know you are pretty dumb but you used to be a decent fighter. And what's going to happen next in the city, well I actually think you might be of some small use."

You perked your ears. Was she saying what you think she was saying?

"Here suck on my big toe like its a pacifier, yes, that's the way such a good boy."

"In the potential coming war of us female villains you might tip the balance, even as a distraction. But would you do that Hawky? Would you finally give up on heroism and turn to the 'dark side' would you? Would you do that for your mommy?

You thought carefully, this could literally change the fate of the city, a wrong move here would be bad. And you were starting to having feelings of love and a desire to always be with Amy. But it was wrong... but it felt so right. You were so conflicted. What was the future going to be like?
121311211221121122121111312321232122.title: She decides you need more, ball busting and tra...

Frostbite - she's making things worse.

1213112112211211221211113123212321222.content:
You had to tread carefully. The Troop Squad had full physical control over you and you realize that the way things are going you would never escape their clutches. But here was an opportunity.

"I... I can try mommy." You tell Amy what you think she wants to hear.

"Awww my sweet little boy, my Hawky, yes you will try and you will help your mommy and aunties very much. You'll even get to go outside again and wear your silly little costume. Won't that be fun to play dress up again?"

"Yes mommy!" You eagerly cry, inwardly cringing at how pathetic it sounded.

She smiled at you and had you worship her feet for another hour before letting you drift off into sleep. You were grateful for this chance, this chance to one day escape the clutches of the Troop Squad!

******* ******* ****** Three months later ****** ******* *******

You had continued to serve as the foot slave of the three members of the Troop Squad and of Jester. However in addition to hours spent worshiping their feet, their stockings and socks you were also allowed to be retrained in fighting. You were given meat and other proteins, you had a chance to exercise properly with weights and soon you were putting on muscle mass and returning to your old fighting self.

True to Alice and Amy's predictions, the law capitulated to the villains. A new order was given out to never interfere with any of the villain's business. Unaffiliated crime, domestic abuse, petty theft and the like were still monitored but the police refused to even fight villains anymore.

And that's where the trouble began, without even the nominal check of a police force to keep the desires of the evil women of the town in check they began doing everything they wanted. Robbing banks, taking over homes of the rich, attacking people for amusement. And then one night Madam Reich attacked FireWire and all hell broke loose. Reich nearly killed her but Frostbite came and saved her and then Reich made her proclamation that she would begin exterminating any non-white villain in the city.

Soon it became an all out war with various factions and the Troop Squad was drawn in.

You were worshiping Alice's red colored pantyhose as the Troop Squad were discussing the latest events.

"Unbelievable, the city is being torn apart. The racist bitch started this but the others aren't helping." You continued to worship as she angrily spoke.

"Well what are we going to do about it?" Darla asked.

Alice sighed. "I don't think we should fight directly and make ourselves involved but I do think we need to stop the war. The police wont' curtail anyone so its time for Hawk Boy to return."

You felt a thrill of adrenaline flow through you.

Amy frowned. "Just him? He's my little pet, I don't want to risk him against other villains. He's stronger now with our training but he's still weak."

Darla agreed. "The little idiot will get himself killed fast."

You didn't like their disparaging remarks or the bratty laughter that followed.

Alice agreed. "You are right of course which is why he needs help. In the form of the Hawk Chicks! We'll dress up as his side kicks and help keep him out of trouble. No one could possibly think we are the Troop Squad with our costumes changed completely and our face covered in bird masks. To add to it we'll put a 'bounty' on Hawky's head for escaping from us. No one will suspect a thing!"

They all agreed while you continued to suck smelly pantyhose feet.

Alice kicked you lightly and motioned for you to stand.

"You understand what your role is? You'll be going after the most dangerous villains but we will help you. You still need to follow instructions EXACTLY. You will do what we say when we say it. Understood bitch?"

"I understand I'll follow your instructions. I'll make mommy proud."

Alice looked at the group. "Now who do we go after first?"

12131121122112112212111131232123212221.content:
"We should take down Madam Reich," Darla suggested. "Maybe the city can calm down with her put down."

The group was agreed and you were allowed to suit up in your old Hawk Boy costume. You were excited, you were going to take down a villain again! You were going to be a hero again.

The girls got into their new Hawk Chick outfits. They involved opaque pantyhose that served as leggings that went up to their green shorts. From there a form fitting body suit covered the waist up which included a set of gloves. Each of them also wore a bird mask of some sort that hid their features.

You were ready to roll out when Alice stopped you.

"Before we begin let's make sure you remember your place Hawky. Kneel before us, bow down, kiss our pantyhose and tell us what a loser you are."

You felt so heroic just moments before as Hawk Boy and now... now it all came rushing back. You were their pet, their toy and their slave. You kissed the tops of their opaque hosiery and repeated those galling words.

Darla laughed along with the others in such a bratty fashion. "Oh this loser won't forget, he knows underneath that suit he's just a pathetic foot boy."

Your humiliation complete - it was go time! Time to bring down the Germanic tyrant!

You and your owners arrived at the docks where she was overseeing her gang looting a boat full of merchandise. There were a lot of them, at least 15 but most of them look liked laborers and not enforcers.

Madam Reich was wearing as usual, a leather SS uniform that could have been painted onto her body, as tight as it is. A few buttons on the jacket are undone, allowing you to get a good look at the busty female's cleavage. The leather trousers are just as tight. You can see absolutely everything as she walked around.

You swung down and nearly took her down with a swooping strike. The Nazi dodged at the last second and glared at you.

"Worm! Have you not been taught your lesson yet?"

"No foul villain! I escaped the Troop Squad and now I will bring order back to this town."

"You little fool! I am not like those girls, I am a full grown woman. They ended up not even being able to hold onto you... I must say they will always have a place in my heart for introducing me to the wonderful world of pantyhose. My feet end up reeking after being in hose and my boots and it is oh so much fun to torture weaklings with the stench! You'll soon find that out!"

As you spoke you saw the Troop Squad swing into action and start fighting Madam Reich's men. You took a deep breath, time to see if your training had paid off!

You launched forward again this time with a strong jab to her face. Madam Reich dodged and returned with a powerful kick to your chest. The blow hit your sternum and you flew backward. She was so strong! Fortunately your acrobatic training paid off and you did a flip in mid air and landed on your feet.

More wary now you feinted in one direction and she bought it, off balance you managed to kick out her legs and she fell to the ground on her back. You tried to capitalize on the attack but her powerful leg kicked out at you and you were forced to back away or get knocked down as well. She grinned at you and stood up.

"Not bad boy, but lets see how you fight this!"

She bent low and zipped down her jackboot and removed it! You were confused at first but then she hurled it at you. You managed to dodge to the side but as the boot trailed past you, you caught the noxious scent of it! Her boots had been bad before but now they were beyond putrid!

You gagged horribly and doubled over in a cough only for the next boot to hit you in the shoulder and spin you around as more of her noxious fumes surrounded you. Falling to the ground you stared up in horror at Madam Reich who loomed over you with squishy wet pantyhose feet! Her dark hose emanated a stench beyond belief and you desperately tried to back away but you ended up pressed against one of the warehouse crates.

"No where to run now little bird!" She laughed maniacally.

You hyperventilated in fear... what was going to happen to you?

121311211221121122121111312321232122211.content:
Without hesitation Madam Reich pressed her sweat drenched pantyhose into your face. They were warm and moist and the texture on your face disgusted you. You tried to hold your breath but even without inhaling the smell permeated through your body and you felt sick to your stomach.

"Weakling! Remember when I broke your back? You were so easy to defeat and yet you dare try to face me again? I am the future fuhrer of this world, none can oppose me, least of all you!"

Her words rang true, what made you think you could win? What made you think you could defeat an opponent who had so easily bested you in the past? You were a fool, a weak pathetic loser!

You were finally forced to inhale air and with it came the toxic stench of Madam Reich's sweaty pantyhose. You gagged and almost retched from them. They were so much worse than the Troop Squad's feet and footwear. This was a toxic miasma that you had never experienced before!

"Ah yes quail before my feet bird brain. You weak little worm, this is the fate of all who oppose the rise of the Reich!"

You try to push her foot away but her leg is too strong and your arms are too weak. She smooshed her foot all around your face, contorting your features. Your mask had long since fallen off and her sweat filled the pores of your skin. Her power was absolute and you were utterly helpless against her strength.

"I should kill you here and now but you really do amuse me with your misplaced idealism. No matter how often I break you, you still think you can win. Now admit it, admit that I am your superior in every way!"

The accursed foot left your face leaving you free to gasp for relatively clean air. You breathed it in and then looked up her harsh face and curvy body. Yes you were weak but you won't admit it to her!

When you didn't speak for a few moments she shook her head. "You stupid avian freak, you must love my feet!"

With that she pushed her sweaty hose back into your face and pinned you firmly to the back of the wall. This time she increased the pressure and you felt immense pain all across your face.

"Admit it! Admit how weak you are!"

Your arms flailed and soon you were trying to speak and admit your failures before her. She kept you pinned for a few more moments before releasing you.

"Yes I admit it! I'm sorry, you are superior. I am weak! So weak!" You were babbling in fear, all you wanted to do was appease this Germanic bitch. Her powerful leg nearly crushed your face and god the stench was still playing havoc with your lungs and body. You just wanted to get away.

"Good! You are beneath me aren't you."

"Yes, yes I am beneath you."

She grabbed your leg and pulled you back away from the wall so you were flat on the ground. Grinning viciously she stepped on top of your prone body. Her pantyhose feet now walking all over your super hero costume.

"Now you are both literally and figuratively beneath me, just where you belong!"

Her weight was heavy but not unbearable. You had taken worse when all three of the Troop Squad would stand on you for example. It was galling how easily she was trampling the symbol of your heroism. But then it got worse. She marched up onto your chest and balanced all her weight on one foot while placing the other on your lips.

"Kiss it little birdy. Kiss my foot and show me you know your place."

You wanted to resist, you wanted to push her away and defeat her, but you knew your place was one below villains like Madam Reich and the Troop Squad. Your ego was drained, the long 18 months of servitude had made you brittle and weak. You sobbed and planted kisses on her sweaty foot.

"Ahahahah you have no fortitude, you are such a feeble creature. Where is your pride? Where is your heroic strength?"

You sobbed, her words stung because they were true.

"Look at you, crying! CRYING! What weakness has diversity brought to this country. When even its heroes cry like babes. Admit it to me, admit that you will never defeat me!"

Lungs slightly straining from the pressure on your chest you obey. "You will always defeat me. I can't beat you Madam Reich you are superior to me in every possible way."

"Yes, you know your place and inferiors should serve their superiors, yes?"

"Yes."

She grinned and then removed her foot from your face and jumped up and then crashed down with your sexy ass smashing into your stomach and ribs. You cry out in agony but she simply plops both of her sweaty pantyhose covered feet onto your face.

"Inferiors should serve their superiors, so serve me by licking my pantyhose clean! Do a good job and I might let you live."

You were still blinded by pain but you felt her feet touch your face and you knew what you had to do. You opened your mouth and stuck out your tongue, pressing it against warm and wet fabric of her hose. The taste was salty and cheesy and all around awful. You wanted to cringe away from it but you couldn't as you had no where to escape to with her butt crushing your stomach.

"Yes, that's it. Worship me like the Goddess I am!"

And you did, you licked her feet, you sucked on her hose, you rained down kisses an attempt to save your own wretched life. You did this for at least 15 minutes.

"So enjoyable but really I can't allow heroes who keep challenging me to live. Goodbye Hawk Boy."

With that she pressed both of her feet down onto your face with amazing strength. The force kept your jaw closed as your nostrils were pinched between her two big feet. You couldn't get any air at all. She looked contemptuously down at you as you suffocated. You began seeing stars as the pain in your lungs grew ever greater.

This might be the end for you... but it wasn't since out of no where Madam Reich had to block a flying kick! The block was successful but the force was enough to dislodge her from your body. She rolled away and came up into a fighting stance. You looked around and saw one of the "Hawk Chicks" squaring off against Madam Reich.

"Hahaha you have other heroes wearing your bird motif now? You'll die under my foot just like the original!"

Madam Reich charged forward and the Hawk Chick dodged and a fast moving martial arts duel soon took place. It soon became apparent that Madam Reich had an advantage in strength, was soon driving the Hawk Chick back and landed a nasty blow to her stomach that left her dazed and gasping. Madam Reich raised her foot to stomp down but another Hawk Chick swooped in and drove her foot into her breast.

The fascist was rocked back and fell to the ground and the two Hawk Chicks circled her.

"Ganging up on me, how heroic! She charged at one girl who dodged away... and Madam Reich kept running!

"Fools I know when the odds are stacked against me but just wait until you see my super soldier women of the Reich that will soon be ready to fight, then we'll see who the numbers favor!"

At this point Madam Reich was about to get away... or was she? Where was the third Hawk Chick, was she there waiting to take down Madam Reich as she fled?

And more importantly to you, what would the Troop Squad do with you now that you had demonstrated once again how inept you really were?
