1213112112211211221211113123212321222111.content:
Madam Reich thought she was in the clear but what she didn't realize it that there were three Hawk Chicks! The final one swooped down and caught her with a flying kick to the head! The big busty German villain got hit hard and stumbled off her feet. As she tried to clear her head the Hawk Chick smashed down on her shoulder.

"Filthy vermin!" She cried out and blocked the next stomp and got to her feet. Unfortunately for Madam Reich that meant the other two Hawk Chick's caught up and began to strike in near unions. You knew just how deadly the Troop Squad could be working together and now you actually got to see them in action in a situation where you were rooting for them!

Madam Reich grew worried as the fight continued, she couldn't block them all at the same time and soon she had been punched, kicked and thrown tot he ground. Darla, Amy and Alice were brutal and took delight in stomping down on the voluptuous enemy.

The proud woman was down, she had several bruises, a black eye and abrasions.

"Please... no more. Let us work somezing out."

The Hawk Chicks grinned, this was going to be fun.

You recognized Alice who gave one last kick to Madam Reich's ribs, flipping her over onto her backside.

"You want mercy you deranged lunatic? Fine, but you have to earn it. Our boots got dirty fighting you, clean them with your tongue."

"No... don't do this to me, I have my pride, I am part of the Master Race!"

"We could always kill you instead." Darla had stepped up and placed her own boot on Reich's breast."

The super villain grew pale and her eyes looked down. Wow, you really couldn't believe your eyes. The Troop Squad was going to make Madam Reich their bitch! This was great, not only because she deserved to be humiliated but for once you weren't going to have to be at their feet!

Seeing her give in Alice shoved her boot into her face and the would be world ruler was soon lapping at them.

"That's right get the grit and dirt off."

"No don't spit it out, swallow it. Swallow it foot whore."

"Do a good job or we'll stomp you to death."

"Loser!"

"You can't beat us!"

"Hahahah look at her gag on the dirt!"

The process was repeated with Darla and then came Amy.

"Is your tongue tired yet? Poor baby girl, such a silly wittle foot slut."

All three of them let out bratty laughter as Madam Reich was forced to clean every single bit of dirt and grime off of their footwear. This made you ridiculously happy, for once you didn't find their laughter super annoying. After what Madam Reich had done to you it sounded like music to your ears!

Alice smiled when the cleaning was done.

"Good job shoe cleaner, but you aren't done. Time for you to become a foot wipe. Take off our boots and then get to licking I want my sweaty feet completely clean."

Madam Reich's eyes bulged in rage, she so badly wanted to tear them apart but she was too wounded to fight, she was also grossly outnumbered.

"Yes..."

"Hmm say Yes ma'am, I want to hear respect in your voice."

"Yes ma'am, I will lick your feet."

Alice dropped her ass onto the other woman's stomach and then propped her feet up onto Reich's face.

"Go ahead take them off, give my feet a big sniff and then start licking."

You could tell Madam Reich hated every second of it. As soon as the boots came off you could see the twist in her features as the nauseating smell threatened to overwhelm her.

"Aww don't like the smell? Too bad! Loser's have to deal with it, get your ugly nose right in between my toes and sniff. Sniff harder! Hahahahha look at you gagging, worthless bitch. Enough sniffing, stick out your tongue, become my foot wipe!"

Madam Reich was shuddering from the awful smell and the ultimate humiliation. You well knew how bad Alice's feet could get and she had really gotten a work out taking care of the goons and then Madam Reich herself. Even though your tongue wasn't currently tasting her feet it curdled in your mouth at the many memories of when you had to service them.

The foot worship went on for some time until Alice was fully satisfied, of course she wouldn't be the only one getting her feet cleaned! Amy was next and her regular baby talked continued, you watched with an incredible erection as someone else now suffered Amy's particular brand of psychological torture.

"Awww does baby want a treat? Make a cooing sound and you get my foot. Come on baby otherwise I'll put my boots back on and maybe knock some baby teeth out."

Madam Reich made a cooing sound that turned her face bright red.

"Ahh haha so baby was hungry for mommy's foot sweat. Here you go then, eat up and grow big and strong!"

Madam Reich was mortified, she had never been brought this low before. You saw her fist clench in absolute rage but she dared not try to strike, instead she meekly lapped up the foot sweat and played Amy's cruel games.

"Now open wide and say Ahhhhhhh" Amy giggled and Reich obeyed. Amy took the opportunity to stick her entire foot in her mouth gagging her.

"Does my sweet little girl like her pacifier? Isn't that much better, you are so docile and obedient, such a good girl!"

More bratty laughter rang out and you could see Reich's eyes glistening, she was about to sob from the degradation and humiliation. Amy played with her a bit more and then Darla took her turn.

"All right you stupid bitch, you need to learn a listen. You are weak, we are strong. You are a worthless loser and we are natural born winners. Say it, say you are a loser!" Darla demanded.

"I am loser, I am weak." She said tears now cascading down her cheeks.

"That's right bitch, you'll never beat us. Now lick the feet of a superior being!"

Darla planted her feet firmly on her mouth and rubbed them around vigorously, twisting her facial features painfully. You winced at the strong motions, it must be hell under there right about now.

"Lick faster whore!" Darla demanded, not letting Madam Reich have any rest. She redoubled her efforts and licked between Darla's toes, then sucked the toes and then licked every inch of her soles. She made sure all the sweat was good and gone.

Darla stood up and placed her freshly cleaned foot on Reich's face.

"That's where you belong, under foot!"

The three girls laughed at how broken their rival looked. Her hair was all messed up, tears, saliva and sweat covered her once pretty face.

"Loser!"

"Bitch!"

"Foot lapping dog!"

"Little crybaby!"

The verbal abuse rained down as they held the dominant victory pose over her. They had crushed her will under their feet... what was going to happen next?

1213112112211211221211113123212321222111.content:
Madam Reich had been utterly and completely humiliated by the "Hawk Chicks." Her will was near broken as they made her do all manner of degrading and humbling things. But eventually the grew bored and left with Hawk Boy. In their minds Madam Reich had been utterly decimated, her organization in tatters and her self-esteem and confidence must have been fully shattered.

They were wrong. Madam Reich wasn't beaten yet, and they should have taken the chance to finish her off then and there. But they didn't and now Madam Reich nursed a kernel of hatred so pure and vindictive that its fiery rage pushed out the shame she felt at being humbled. She would get her revenge and they would rue the day they crossed her.

But it would take time. Whens he struck it would be in one decisive blow that would allow her complete triumph. And for that she needed to plot, plan and prepare but one day she would return!

Meanwhile back the Troop Squad base...

Darla snarled at you. "Weak pathetic loser! You let Madam Reich beat you again!"

"I'm sorry." You could only plead while on your knees.

Amy shook her head with pity. "You know he tried Darla, it isn't his fault that he's such a little weakling. Our little baby birdie tried."

You felt shame at Amy's words, you almost preferred Darla's crude anger instead. Amy's soft and sympathetic tone was laced with barbs that seared your soul. You didn't like being called a baby birdie, you didn't like being considered weak. Your thoughts were broken apart as fiery pain crashed into your ribs, delivered by the shoe of Alice.

"You utterly incompetent nitwit! How could you let her beat you so easily after we trained you for months? Ugh get down on the ground and beg for mercy because I would love to stomp your brains out on the floor!"

Terror seized you, you didn't think Amy would let that happen... but you never could be 100% sure where you stood with the Troop Squad! You quickly obeyed and frantically pleaded with her while you kissed the tops of her shoes.

Amy laughed. "Aww don't scare the little birdie so much, he's shaking like a leaf. Here come on take off Aunty Alice's shoes and make her feet feel nice with your tongue. She might calm down a little if you do a good job!"

You did as was commanded and prayed that Alice would show mercy on you. You removed her shoe to reveal pungent sweaty socks. Since all of you had recently been in combat they reeked far more than normal. Stress and excretion had combined with heat to make them literally drenched in them. You struggled not to cough as the smell made your eyes water.

"Come on my little birdie, get to it with some relish if you want Aunty Alice to forgive you."

Alice rolled her eyes. "He's not a baby Amy he's just a miserable pathetic sub human worm. I won't be forgiving him, the only reason I don't stomp his brains out is that he might still prove marginally useful in drawing out any enemies." She paused for a moment. "And I suppose I wouldn't want to deprive you of your pet."

Amy hugged Alice. "See Hawky? She does have a soft side."

Meanwhile you were trying to muster the necessary passion to make it look like you enjoyed worshiping her nasty socks. Your tongue licked the cloth and the texture was soggy and gross. Licking a sock was never pleasant but a sweaty salty one like this was particularly foul. Especially since you had so recently wore your costume and fought evil... to be reduced back to this was maddening.

"Hurry up with the socks, I want your tongue on my bare feet!" Alice demanded and you obeyed like the good Troop Squad slave bitch that you were. You redoubled your efforts and when you felt it met her satisfaction you used your teeth to pull of the sticky and camp socks from her pretty but smelly feet.

Amy backed a way bit as the sock popped off. "Oh gee Alice your feet do reek, I'm going to go grab a snack. Hawky by the time I get back your tongue better have licked clean all her sweat and toe jam because that stench is just too strong."

Amy walked off and Alice smirked at the bit of terror that entered your eyes as your "protector" left the room and left you alone with Darla and Alice. Neither of them seemed to care what happened to you like Amy did. Darla was often very physical but Alice was surgical in her cruelty and you knew she was the more sadistic of all three of them.

"Now you pathetic wretch, clean my feet of all sweat! Do it!" Alice demanded.

Darla laughed at seeing how you scurried to obey the task. The terror plastered across your face was plain to see by both girls.

"That's right you little sniveling coward, lick my feet! Lick the feet of your superior! Losing after all the training we gave you? How? How can you be so pathetically worthless? You make me sick!"

The verbal abuse hurt, you had tried, you had truly tried to reclaim the hero mantle and bring Madam Reich to justice but instead you had to be saved by the very villains who had enslaved you. It was pathetic, you were pathetic. You licked and licked until her feet were sparkling clean.

"You may have finished cleaning my feet but you aren't done yet. Go fetch the pantyhose that I have in the bottom drawer on the left dresser."

You quickly obeyed and found the item as you picked it up you realized the pantyhose had not been washed in... well you had no idea how long but the odor that emanated from them soured your stomach. Fear still motivating you, you quickly return them to Alice.

"Now put them on me and then prepare to suffer! I like to workout in these and get them extra, extra stinky."

Soon her pantyhose was on and you founded yourself underneath her feet again as she rubbed your face, driving her stink into your skin. Every breath of air was befouled by the overwhelming scent of her sweaty hose. You couldn't help but cry a little as your nostrils burned from the foulness of it.

"That's right 'hero' sniff like a dog! You were never worthy to actually fight by our side. If it were up to me you'd never wear a costume again, you'd stay right in our hideout good for nothing but licking feet and being our bitch. Sniff louder!"

Obeying you continue to inhale the foul aroma. It must have been a full ten minutes of painful stench abuse before she had you started licking her hose clean. The taste was even worse than her socks and you wanted to gag on it but dared not do something in front of Alice.

Her pantyhose clad foot smeared your saliva on your face and then she pushed her toes into your mouth and then leaned forward, driving her foot deeper in until it was pushing past your tonsils.

"Suck it, whore. You're just our foot whore, not a hero, not a person, just a pet whore for us to use and abuse! Know your place, scum!"

She fucked your mouth and in that moment you felt like a cheap whore. Like some piece of meat that people could hire to use for their pleasure and satisfaction. It was degrading, it was embarrassing, it was mortifying. You were nothing but a tool to be used by the Troop Squad. Not a hero at all.

The worship went on for some time and then you also had to serve Darla but your ordeal wasn't done.

Amy returned. "Well my sweet little birdie, I think you've suffered quite a bit at Alice's stinky pantyhose but we still need to proper punish you. I promise to try to make sure they don't do any permanent damage to you... but well Alice is very upset."

You were confused for a moment by the comment and then they struck. All three of them lashed out with kicks, stomp and painful knees to your body. Your face was kicked, your ribs were stomped on. All the while they rained down abuse with their bodies they also insulted you and demeaned you.

"Worthless!"

"Pathetic!"

"Useless!"

"Weak!"

"Loser!"

True to her word Amy stopped Alice from full out stomping your head, instead your ribs and chest took Alice's heavy no mercy strikes. The beating lasted awhile and soon you were bruised from head to toe, fortunately nothing was broken.

You lay in a shattered wreck, utterly destroyed and mentally devastated.

1213112112211211221211113123212321222111.content:
“Amy you won’t let me really fuck your pet up but I don’t want to leave it with just this humiliation and a beating. I want him to suffer.”

You shivered in fear, Alice was truly a monster. Hadn’t you suffered enough?

“I’m not going to let you cripple or kill him, he’s mine.”

You felt a sudden sense of helplessness, love and loyalty toward Amy. Literally she was your protector, if it was not for her your body would be broken by Alice and Darla would probably help. How could you feel adoration for the woman who enslaved you and reduced you to this low standing? Your feelings were so mixed up that you failed to hear what was said right after that but your attention was returned when they mentioned your costume.

“Oh, you want us to get rid of the costume, that’s a good compromise Alice.”

“Wait… but I thought you wanted me to help fight villains?” You said confused.

Amy smiled sweetly at you but then stuck a knife through your heart. “Oh, poor Hawky, you really aren’t cut out to be a hero, didn’t this prove it? You were worthless, you’re just my little baby pet.”

You shook your head as tears welled in your eyes. You were a hero, you were!

Alice snickered with amusement. “Look at this loser, he’s actually going to cry.”

As she said those words the tears that had been welling up began to cascade down your cheeks. Your shame and embarrassment redoubled; these bitches had turned you into a pathetic crybaby!

“Aww is my wittle wannabe super hero sad? You should know better by now Hawky. Now go ahead and kiss Auntie Alice’s feet and thank her for such a wonderful idea.”

You wanted to object, to tell them that you were a hero but instead you sank to your knees and planted kisses on evil Alice’s toes.

“Thank you for… for… coming up with the idea of burning my costume.”

It was sheer torture to say those words.

“Fuck, did one of your loser tears actually drip onto my foot? Lick it up dumbass!”

You hastened to obey, quickly licking up your own salty tear. You wanted to curl up into a ball and die of shame. Was there any way you could actually fall further?

Alice sneered as she looked down on you. “You truly are a wretched creature. You better hope Amy continues to enjoy babying you and keeping you around. Because if she ever tires of you, I will smash your pathetic face in and end you. Do you understand that bitch? I will fucking kill you.”

“Y-yes.” You believed every word she said.

“Auntie Alice can be so mean but don’t you worry my little Hawky, I’ll always love and protect my little boy. Now let’s go take a nice bath and clean you up, we’ll have a little ceremony where we can burn your hero costume afterwards.”

You went with Amy who actually helped bathe you. It was quite humiliating to have her do this but you couldn't deny that it also felt... good. It felt right. Her babying you, admonishing you to wash behind the ears. It felt so very peaceful. But all too soon it was over and Amy made you wear your special pantyhose underwear.

And then it was time for the moment of truth. You were led to patio where the other two members of the Troop Squad had gathered some wood logs, a lighter and some gasoline. You let out rather pathetic cry of denial but Amy shushed you.

"Say goodbye to ever even pretending to be a hero again!" Alice laughed as she threw your costume onto the pyre and then in one swift motion lit the gasoline that Darla poured over it.

"NOOOOOOOOOOOOOO!" You scream! Your precious heroic symbol. How could they... how could they!?

Without even thinking you charged at Alice screaming like a lunatic with massive amounts of pure rage and adrenaline pumping through your system. You crash down upon Alice who easily redirects your momentum with a judo toss. You fall to the ground and the air bursts out of your lungs. Rolling over you get up, anger still boiling.

"Alice! There will be a reckoning. Fight me one on one! Don't let the other girls help and you'll face justice."

Alice began laughing at you. "Sure why not, let's make it a third time that I utterly humiliate you. Darla, Amy do you mind keeping score?"

You look at your opponent who is wearing black tank top and opaque white pantyhose. Before you begin Darla tells you both to take it to the main living area so that she could sit on the couch and watch. You both go back inside, away from the stench of your burning costume and prepare yourselves.

Still boiling with rage you charge at her but this time you stop your charge and try to kick her. She nimbly backed up, your kick missing her by inches. Off balance it was easy for her to spring forward and kick you in the chest sending you backward. You manage to remain on your feet but she came in hard and fast with a vicious rising knee to your solar plexus.

Your chest aches as you double over and she jumped into the air and basically slammed her ass onto your back, forcing you to the ground with her weight atop of yours. The blow stunned you for a moment and that was all she needed to put her legs in position and force you into a perfect camel clutch submission hold.

Darla laughs. "That isn't good enough, keep him in the hold until he says I'm auntie Alice's foot bitch!"

Alice released her hold as soon as you said those words and you groaned in pain. You slowly got back up to your feet as Darla announced Alice had won the first round.

"This is too easy! What a total loser you are Hawky. Come at me again!" Alice taunted and you bull rushed her again.

She rolled to the side and sweep your leg as you went past, again you fell to the ground. Instead of pouncing on you she just loomed over you and as you went to get up she kicked you hard in the face. She grabbed your wrists and pulled them up as you were flat on the ground. She then lifted her pantyhose covered feet and slapped your face over and over again. You couldn't get leverage to escape and while the foot slaps weren't terribly painful they were humiliating. You could hear Amy and Darla laughing as you got slapped over and over again.

Not able to take anymore of this humiliation you again cry "I'm auntie Alice's foot bitch."

The score was now 2-0. And on it went, you kept trying to strike a blow, any blow on her but it was all for naught. She trapped you in a painful head scissor one round and arm bar in the next. One extremely awful round had you being forced to say you were a pantywaist loser who was born to serve feet.

The most painful one was her arching your back like the "Walls of Jericho" from the WWF, but this one involved her slapping your balls with her foot while maintaining the hold.

"I'm auntie Alice's foot bitch."

"I'm auntie Alice's foot bitch."

You screamed over and over but she just laughed.

"Tell me you aren't a hero! Tell me you deserve to be a foot licking slave!"

"I'm a foot licking slave, I don't deserve to be a hero, please, please, stop!" You cry as tears stream down your cheeks. She finally relents and you lay there in an utterly defeated heap.

She pushed her white pantyhose feet into your face. "Now say it again, over and over that you are my foot bitch."

"I'm auntie Alice's foot bitch."

"I'm auntie Alice's foot bitch."

"I'm auntie Alice's foot bitch."

"I'm auntie Alice's foot bitch."

You said it dozens of times before she was satisfied. She got up and high fived her partners in crime. Darla gleefully announced the score.

"16-0, complete massacre!"

"That's three matches I've destroyed you in, how pathetic. Evil will always triumph over worthless heroes like you."

Amy giggled again. "Hawky thank Auntie Alice for teaching you that she was much stronger and superior to you in every way, do it now."

You say those humiliating words. And sadly you now knew them to be true. She easily defeated you each time you fought. She was superior, she was stronger. After being completely broken down and shamed you were made to serve all of their feet. Darla and Amy had black socks on and you had to worship the cloth material. Worse than that you also had to worship the pantyhose on Alice's feet. They were now damp with her sweat and the taste was utterly putrid.

Finally they were bored with you and Amy physically picked up your battered body and took it to your room. You begin to speak but she just says shushes you.

"This was a fun experiment, having you pretend to be a hero again but it really is a waste of time. You are simply too weak to play that role anymore."

"But..."

"Shhhhh, no talking now Hawky. You really need to understand your place. It is beneath our feet. The sooner you realize that you are as helpless as a baby the sooner you'll be happy. Stop worry about what is right and wrong and just be a good baby bird for me."

"I really..."

"SHHHHH" Don't speak. Now give me toes a kiss good night and look forward to another day as our little obedient foot slave.

Silent now you plant your lips onto her toes. Your days of being a hero were over. Your costume was gone. You were their slave, their foot bitch and Amy's pet. This was your life now.

1213112112211211221211113123212321222111.content:
That morning it was time to serve your owners. They enjoyed waking up leisurely but you had to get up and be prepared to serve the cruel girls in anyway they choose. The first one up was Darla. She was wearing a slightly oversize white t-shirt with sheer red pantyhose.

"Come sniff my pantyhose feet while you massage them. I want to eat my breakfast with my feet being pampered."

You obeyed and with your hands you rubbed her aches and her soles; while you did that the other foot that wasn't in your hands was in your face and you had to sniff. Long experience had taught you that you couldn't just breathe in regularly or sniff silently, Darla liked hearing you sucking in her foot stink.

She relaxed and enjoyed life while you served and grew slightly nauseated at the cheese-ish odor of her pantyhose covered feet. After breakfast you had to kiss her feet lovingly and thank her for the privilege of being of service to her. By the time you were done both Amy and Alice were up.

Amy was wearing white pantyhose while Alice was wearing black pantyhose. Amy was your protector, almost like a sick and twisted version of a guardian angel, while Alice was the dark demon that wanted to devour you. You were soon kissing, licking and sucking at both sets of pantyhose as the two got ready for their day.

"He's such a stupid doormat. I grow tired of looking at his face but I have to admit I do like the foot service he provides. He at least can do that much." Alice commented.

Amy giggled a bit. "Aww I knew you would come around. We know Hawky is a bit useless but through our training he can be the best foot bitch the world has ever seen!"

Your face grew red as you continued your service. It was embarrassing to be talked about like you weren't even there. How you longed to win back your self respect but you had gone 0-3 in matches against Alice, it was absolutely futile. All you could do is stay silent and worship their feet. Worship the white and black pantyhose that represented their inner souls.

You tongue snaked over Amy's feet and she purred in contentment. You found yourself constantly go back to her foot more frequently than Alice's feet. It just seemed right, you feared Alice and you were beginning to love Amy despite her constant mockery and abuse.

"Hey foot bitch, I'm barely getting any service here." Alice angrily demanded as she kicked out catching you in the side of the head.

"Sorry." You reply and give some attention to her feet. But as the morning went on and they talked about other things you again started to drift naturally back to Amy's feet. Her white pantyhose, her beautiful feet and her maternal view of you. It was instinctual, natural even.

"That's it, you pathetic little shit! Get out from under the table, its punishment time!" Alice yelled down at me.

"Alice what's wrong? He seemed to be doing a good job at worshiping my feet."

"I'm sure he did because he spent almost no time on my feet! This fucker is going to get his testicles rearranged by my foot!"

Terrified you clutch at Amy's feet and whimper.

"Aww look at poor Hawky he's so scared. Have a bit of a heart Alice, he just can't get enough of my feet. After all I'm the one who takes care and babies him. He just loves me more than you two. "

"What the fuck Amy? He's all of our slaves not just yours."

"Yeah, yeah he's all of ours but he clearly loves me more so don't punish him for being my good little baby."

Alice was pissed. And you were very scared.

"WHAT THE FUCK!? I will punish my slave anytime I want. And right now he's going to get as many damn kicks right to his fucking useless balls until I'm satisfied that he'll never disobey me again. Now get your ass over foot bitch!"

You started to move but Amy placed her foot on your back and pushed you to the ground from where you had been kneeling.

"Stay Hawky."

Caught between a rock and hard place you weren't sure what to do.

"Are you fucking serious? I want my feet pampered and I want it to happen now. Why are you being such a bitch Amy. He's all of our slaves, you can't hog him."

"I can and I will, he's my pet, he's my baby Hawky. I get first dibs, but I'll let you have him later today."

Alice gave out a shriek of rage and went to slap Amy but Amy blocked.

"You really want to throw down over a slave Alice? Really? We're the troop squad and we have been together since we were little kids. I can't believe you would raise a hand to me."

"YOU ARE THE ONE WHO IS BEING A CUNT! We all agreed we would share this super loser and now you are digging in your hooks and deciding when and how he serves. We share everything, including him. Now let me fuck him up."

Amy was resolute. "No. You wanted to kill him yesterday. Why do you even care so much?"

"It is the principal of the matter. Now hand him over or I'll make you."

"You think you can take me? Really? Oh its on and..."

"HEY!" Darla interrupted. "What is going on?"

Amy and Alice both talked at once and for a moment it was confusion but finally Darla got the story.

"Hmm well I sorta agree with Alice BUT we are the Troop Squad and we handle things by fights. We should have a battle. Alice vs. Amy, the winner gets to decide. If Amy wins she gets full control of Hawky, she will let us use him at times but gets to decide how much damage we can do. However if Alice wins then Hawky is fair game, up to and including kill him off if he disobey us. However I do like his foot massages in the morning Alice so don't be a bitch about it without at least getting us a replacement!"

Amy and Alice both agreed and the fight would take place that evening. You were terrified. What if Amy lost? It would not go well for you, you were sure of it. Your thoughts of what could happen in the fight were interrupted by Amy asking you to come into the bedroom with her.

"All right my wittle baby Hawky, you should know how much I love you now. I'm willing to face Alice in a straight up fight. You should know that she's very cruel. Just like she did with you, if she wins she will humiliate me. I don't plan on losing but those are pretty high stakes."

"I'm very grateful Amy and I'll be cheering for you."

"You had better! Now take my pantyhose off and let me feel your tongue on my bare feet."

You obeyed and snaked out your tongue on your protector's feet. The slightly salty taste of her foot sweat no longer bothered you as much. These were Amy's feet. They were the greatest feet in the world. You still didn't want to be licking feet but if you had to lick someone's feet it would be Amy's feet. She cared about you, she loved you and protected you. She would be up against Alice all to defend you.

Yes, you were falling in love with her. Your tongue slithered in between her toes, cleaning them out perfectly. You had become very good at being a foot pet for her. For hours you helped her relax before the big fight. You hoped your tender dedication to her feet would give her the edge!

All too soon, your hours with Amy were up. It was time for the fight. Amy and Alice wore more or less the same as before. Light and Darkness would war with each other.

Darla announced the rules. "First one to 10 wins will be declared the winner. If someone is knocked out it will count for two wins, submitting will count as 1. Furthermore I will not interfere with what the winner does to the loser afterwards. If y'all want to fight know that the stakes are high."

Amy suddenly looked nervous. "What do you mean you won't interfere what does Alice want to do to me?"

Darla shrugged her shoulders. "That's between you and her, she obviously has something planned but she didn't go into specifics."

Amy looked a bit nervous while Alice was smirking.

This wasn't good... Darla hesitated and said, "Not too late to back out now Amy. In fact as you friend I suggest it. You hogging Hawky isn't right, we are a team. But your choice I won't help Alice win either."

Amy looked at you and then at Alice... decision time!

1213112112211211221211113123212321222111.content:
"I'm not backing down. Hawky is mine to do with as I please. Y'all would have crippled or killed him without me being here demanding you not break him. You gave up the right to make demands on my toy when you don't care enough not to break it. I don't need to hesitate for a moment Alice, you are going down!"

Alice rolled her eyes. "Do you forget who has always been the better fighter? This is going to be embarrassing for you. And afterwards you'll lick my feet and beg me to fuck up the stupid bitch instead of torment you further with my stinky pantyhose. Let's go!"

You felt a wave of hope at Amy's words and another wave of fear at Alice's. You really hoped that Amy could beat her because if she didn't you were going to be in a world of hurt! But not just that... you also felt incredibly loyal toward Amy. Yes she belittled you and treated you like a baby but she clearly cared enough about you to defy her friends in order to protect you. She was so kind and beautiful and in her white pantyhose she looked like a literal angel.

The fight began and Alice quickly stalked forward with a kick that Amy barely blocked. Amy countered but Alice easily dodged and pushed her in the ribs. Amy grimaced but caught her opponent's wrist as it was receding back from the punch and pulled backward sharply forcing Alice to the ground as Amy rolled her her over.

Alice gave a grunt of frustration as Amy quickly wrapped her legs around her midsection and gave a mighty squeeze. Alice struck back with her fist but she had no room to gain enough striking distance to do more than do light damage as Amy continued to squeeze and shield her face with her arms against the ineffectual strikes.

"Yeah! Go Amy go!" You cheer on.

Darla rolled her eyes. "How pathetic, you need a girl to protect you. What a big strong man huh? You really are a sniveling worm aren't you. Shut the fuck up already."

You quickly clicked your teeth shut, fearful of Darla. Not just because she could hurt you but because she might take her anger out on Amy and somehow help Alice win. Looking away from Darla you saw that Amy was crushing the air out of Alice's lungs. It went on for another 30 seconds before Alice angrily submitted.

"Fuck, you got lucky bitch. Next time your ass is going down and I'll make you smell my feet."

Amy was breathing heavily and didn't bother replying.

"Round two!" Darla announced and Alice lashed out with an explosion of strikes. Her fists were flying and it was all Amy could do to defend. She got popped in the face a few times but gamely continued to guard until Alice's rage and energy began to deplete and her punches slowed. As they did Amy counter attacked and with an unexpected rising knee to Alice's jaw. The sheer force and surprise of the attack knocked out Alice for a second and Darla called that round.

"Three to Zero, knock out counts as two points."

You gave another cheer.

As Alice regained consciousness Darla looked down at her and then back at Amy.

"You should know Amy that Alice wanted there to be foot worship between the rounds. If you want to take advantage and make he lick your pantyhose feet right now I'll allow it."

Amy grinned and eagerly decided to do just that. She sat down on Alice's stomach and placed her feet in her now half conscious opponent.

"Wakey wakey little baby squadie, you have some feet to lick! You were very naughty and didn't tell me the little rule agreement you made with Darla."

"Fuck you..." Alice tried to speak but Amy shoved her white pantyhose clad foot in her mouth effectively gagging her.

"Does baby want a pacifier?"

You couldn't help but laugh which drew all eyes on you.

"S-sorry I just like seeing Amy happy with winning the round."

You saw something in Amy's eyes, they looked different as they searched yours. After a pregnant pause she stood up and let Alice to her feet.

"Let's finish this Alice."

Alice was now fully recovered and the next round began. Alice was more cautious now and conserved her energy. As they cautiously exchanged blows you could see that Amy often loss out on those quick exchanges. Alice was definitely faster and looked to be a little stronger. Amy was being smart though, not letting her gain an advantage. After another quick back and forth Alice pressed the advantage and Amy had to put up her guard, at that exact moment Alice dropped to the ground and quickly swept the legs from her opponent.

Amy crashed down and Alice quickly put her in a head scissor.

"Ahaha, you are mine now, you fucking cunt! Time for payback, you are going to lick my sweaty feet! Submit!"

Amy futilely grasped at her opponent's legs but of course leg muscles were stronger and she couldn't budge them. Alice squeezed harder and you could see Amy's body shudder in pain.

"Don't give up Amy, you can do it!"

A second passed and then amazingly Amy grabbed Alice's legs, instead of pulling at them she pushed them up ward while using her stomach muscles to kip upward. Alice was physically lifted off the ground, legs still around Amy's head but now off the ground. Amy than got her feet under and jumped with both of their body weights combined and angled her fall so Alice landed first. The impact loosened the grip of the stunned Alice and Amy quickly capitalized with a brutal stomp to her opponent's face.

One stomp, further stunned. Two more stomps and Alice's head hit the mat and she was knocked out.

Darla whistled appreciatively. "How the hell did you mange to lift her like that?"

Amy smiled, still very red faced from the nasty scissor hold and replied, "I guess I just needed some motivation."

Alice took a bit longer to come to, her eye was swollen and she seemed dizzy. Once again Amy made her lick her pantyhose covered feet. After a few minutes she was allowed to rise and Amy winked at you. What did that wink mean?

The next round was completely one sided. Alice was clearly suffering from the two concussions and this time it was Amy who dominated the round from start to finish. A flurry of punches and some kicks and Alice was down again.

The rest of the rounds happened just like that. Alice could never seem to recovery her composure or her ability to effectively fight back and Amy seemed to get a second wind every time you cheered for her. Soon it was over, a devastating victory 10-0.

Amy made Alice lick her sweaty pantyhose clean and then made her massage her foot that had knocked her out in that decisive round.

"Rub the heel a bit Alice, your stupid forehead might have bruised it."

You saw Alice seethe with rage but a match was a match and she obediently did as she was told. You enjoyed seeing the arrogant girl taken down a notch. You tried to seer the image of an angry Alice with Amy's toes in her mouth into your memory. It was immensely satisfying.

When it was over Darla helped Alice up and to the bath to help her with her wounds while Amy took you to her room.

You entered and congratulated her but Amy looked at you and then kissed you on the mouth.

"Oh Hawky I'm so sorry about how I've treated you. I enjoyed trying to break you but it was wrong, so very wrong. Fighting Alice and realizing I could be at the other end of someone's foot shocked me to my senses. I can't keep treating you like some sub-human animal who is just there to be abused."

You felt your heart soar. "A-A-my, I, I think I love you."

Amy hugged you and whispered into your ear. "And I love you Hawky. I promise to treat you better from now on."

You thank her.

"But Amy, what about the other two."

"Damn you are right, we need to get you away from them. Ugh I've loved them like sisters for so long but they are bad news. They won't understand if I don't allow them to abuse you at all. We need to come up with a plan."

You think about the options.

"Well... if we run they may go after us. Maybe we should bring them to justice?"

Amy frowned and thought it over.

"I understand they are bad but I don't want them in jail... there has to be some way we can be safe and get away from them."

You talked it over and schemed. In between that you kissed and hugged each other. Amy still called you Hawky but it was now with more affection and love than in debasement. You loved your angel and you didn't want anything bad to happen to her. But the rest of the Troop Squad was still a problem, you needed a solid plan in order to make sure they didn't seek vengeance on you or more importantly the love of your life, Amy!

Amy lashed forward with a quick kick that Alice ducked under. Alice replied with a punch that was guarded and then the two descended into a rapid exchange of blows. Both members of the Troop Squad seemed evenly matched for about 30 seconds and then... Alice smirked.

Moving faster than you had ever seen her move Alice sped forward and hit Amy with a vicious punch to the ribs. Amy doubled over crying out in pain and you mirrored her cry. Alice followed it with a vicious downward elbow strike to Amy's back. The blow struck right at the top of the spine.

She had just tried to protect you and had to endure this torture. Right when it looked like Amy was about to pass out Alice loosened her grip and Amy was able to suck in much needed air... only for Alice to re-tighten her grip again!

You could see what Alice was doing. She was suffocating Amy until the brink and then letting her breathe. The next time it happened Amy tried to speak out the words "I submit" but Alice was too fast. This happened over and over again, you could see the fight leaving Amy as she feebly clutched at the suffocating legs.

"Haha you want me to finish you off, knock you out and try another round? Well only if you agree to lick my feet in between rounds each time you lose! I figure you can lick my sweat off and then my feet will just get sweaty again and you get more fun salty tasty treats!"

Darla and Alice both laughed which only made you cry all the harder.

Amy was completely miserable as she finished up licking clean Alice's feet.

"Regret sticking up for our shitty slave?"

Amy snarled and threw a fist at Alice who only barely dodged in time, even so it clipped her jaw a bit and she was furious. "The ref hasn't even called for the round to start you cheating whore!"

Darla agreed with Alice. "Don't push your luck Amy, try that again and we'll double team your ass. Now, Alice is up 2 to 0 time fo round three!"

You hoped that Amy would bounce back but as you watched her fight it was clear the prior blows and the prolonged suffocation she had suffered had deeply harmed her ability to fight. It didn't take long before Alice had her down on the mat again. A camel clutch, followed by a Boston Crab and finally a brutal arm bar that almost broke her arm. Each time she had to submit and each time she had to lick the grime an dirt that got collected by the black pantyhose of her opponent.

Her powerful feet would cause you so much torment and there was literally nothing you could do to prevent it from happening. Hell at this point with the score 7-0 it was clear Amy couldn't do anything to help you either!

"That's it such a good little girl licking the feet of your superior. You really showed how weak and pathetic you are today Amy. Honestly I think me and Darla should look for another member for the Troop Squad and have you joined Hawky over there as our slave. Amy looked like she wanted to puke while Alice looked utterly triumphant.

You weren't sure how serious Alice was. Was she making a joke at her opponent's expense? Was she trying to scare Amy but really wasn't going to go through with it? Or was she dead serious about making her friend and partner into a foot licking submissive slave like you were? You didn't know and you didn't think Amy knew either.

The next round Amy surged forward with a battery of kicks. Alice actually had to be careful to avoid them, the threats had lit a fire under her, but unfortunately Alice was too good to be caught by Amy and soon counter attacked with a knee to the midsection after pushing away a kick.

"Nice try but you should know by now that I'm way better than you'll ever be!" Alice taunted as she pulled Amy's hair up ruthlessly and kneed her stomach twice more before letting her collapse to the ground. Alice pressed her foot into Amy's face smooshing it into the mat.
