1213112112211211221211113123212321223.content:
You felt yourself drawn to Amy. Objectively what she had done to you was horrible but for some reason you started to feel love and a desire to be with her. You wanted her to protect you, to care for you. It was almost an overwhelming desire to serve and be her devoted... something. Pet? Slave? Partner? Baby? Comrade? It wasn't something you could put into words. But you wanted to be with her in some capacity.

However... at the core of your being you were a hero. A hero had fallen and failed over and over again but you were still a hero and you couldn't go again your ideals. You couldn't serve evil no matter how sweet the packaging was.

"S-sorry I can't mommy. I am a hero."

Amy's face held such disappointment.

"After all this time? You really believe you are a hero?"

Your face heated up in shame as you think back to all the perverted and degrading things you had been forced to do. Would a hero really do that?

"Maybe I'm a bad hero but I'm still a hero. I... I can't fight for you."

Amy pushed her foot back into your mouth. "Suck on my pacifier my silly baby. You aren't a hero you never really were. You'll learn your place one day and you'll be so much happier. Letting mommy make all your decisions and looking forward to only serving me and my friends. That's right just suck on my toes. One day you'll wake up and realize what you are and what you were born to me."

You felt tears trickle down your cheeks. In your soul you felt such terror that Amy was right. That one day you'd give up your heroic ideals and become her... creature forever. The part that scared you the most was that it sounded tempting. To no longer have to struggle, to no longer have to think, to let her just run your life. No ethical dilemmas, no planning for the future just sweet servitude to her beautiful bratty feet.

With that thought you drifted off into a very conflicted sleep.
1213112112211211221211113123212321223.title: You refuse, you can't betray your ideals or...

choices: Fart on his face while he's asleep, get him addicted and reward with farts!
Punish him with farts next time. (Fart on his face, food, drink, etc)
12131121122112112212111131232123212233.content:
As her baby drifted to sleep sucking her toes, Amy scrunched her face up in thought.

What am I going to do next? She thought. Foot related stuff would only bring her so far, heck, it's clearly already gotten her as far as it could get her at this point. There wasn't really anything to do with feet that she could do anymore. Stomping? Done. Licking? Check. Sniffing? One of the first things done. Footwear? All of the Troop did that already.

The tomboy of the three girl squad screwed her face into an angry yet thinking pout. What could she do, what could she do that the other girls wouldn't--!

GRUMBLE

The red head almost jumped at that sound, only to quickly recognize it as her stomach, and gained a big broad smile.

Of course! Farting! Out of all the troop squad she was the best farter, mostly because she was most unabashed about doing it than the others. It was perfect!

But then her smile fell into a grumpy thinking face.

But what to do with her gas? Fart on his face? No, that was too vanilla, and already done with the fart torture game they had done a long while back.

Hm, what to do, what to do with her gassy ass?
12131121122112112212111131232123212233.title: Amy wants to do something different.

choices: You Went After Your Next Victim: Madam Reich
121311211221121122121111312321233.content:
# Hawkboy’s escape.
They humiliated you and left you here to sleep. But you couldn’t sleep that night. You sat on the floor and thinked about how you got here. “Where did i make my first mistake?” You asked yourself. First everything was great. You was fighting crime and saving people. But then you couldn’t resist to Madam Reich’s feet and she used them to completely brake you. Then troop squad came and they tortured you and your mother. “They tortured my mother.” That sentence was echoing in your brain and you couldn’t stop it. But you kept thinking. Then they dragged you here and they made you their bitch. And why? Because you couldn’t resist the idea of their feet connected to your face. So you let them kick you in the face. And because of they know that you wouldn’t stop or dodge their kicks. They always used their feet to defeat you. So everything that happened causing you ending up here happened because you had a foot fetish. Well maybe you didn’t considered that when you first became a superhero or maybe deep inside, you was wanting the villaines to use their feet to defeat you. You didn’t know. It was so blury right now. The echo’s sound was rising by the second. “THEY TORTURED MY MOTHER!” . Your head was aching because of the sound and you couldn’t stop it. You always had a code: Never kill anyone. But that code just dissappeared. You always had fought with dignity and honor. But maybe you had to fall in to their level inorder to rise again. You find yourself a wooden stick. You sharpened it with precision and patience for 3 days. For 3 days you obeyed their every order and be their little puppy. But the voice never left your brain. “They tortured my mother.”. At the third day’s night you fake screamed in agony in order to drag one of them in your room. Darla opened your room to check you if you were finally dying. You were on the ground and she was behind your back. You finally stopped breathing. She came closer and turned you with her feet to check if you really died. As soon as she turned you, you stabbed her in her leg twice. She fell down in agony. You crawled to top of her and stabbed her 3 times in her chest. She finally stopped moving. You quickly hide behind the door and waited you next victim. When Amy entered the room she freezed at the sight of the dead body of Darla. You almost lost all of your human feelings. Even your hands wasnt shaking after you killed and human being. That was because you wasn’t seeing them as humans anymore. They were scumbs. They were a piece of shit to you. And you took advantage of that to sneak behind Amy and stabbed her in her throat several times. The blood spilled all over you. Smelling her blood was giving you joy. When you made sure she was dead too, you let go of her body down and you walked out the room covered in blood. When Alice finally get there, she was too late to save them. She screamed in agony and started shouting at you saying “I am gonna kill you and everyone you love you son of a bitch! How could you kill them? They were the only family i got! You like feet yes? Then be prepared to get killed by them!”. You just laughed and said “Ok.” She charged at you and she was obviously gonna try to hit you with a missile dropkick. Time slowed for you. You didn’t focused on her feet. You focused on her eyes and the sounds. Once she jump to the air you closed your eyes. Because if you looked to his feet you might have let her kick you in the face. And that would be the end of everything. But you closed your eyes and listened the sounds. As you feel and heard that she was so close to your face you crouched and swing the sharpened wooden stick up. You felt resistance at your hand and heard her screaming at the same time. When you opened your eyes you saw Alice stabbed in her back and bleeding on the ground. You moved closer to her. You gripped her head while she was still struggling. And you put her out of her misery. When she too stopped moving, the voices in your head were finally gone. You walked outside. You took a deep breath. The breath of freedom. You were a different man now. And you obviously wasn’t the hawkboy.
121311211221121122121111312321233.title: Rise of the Hero

choices: "I want to fart on your face again, and hear you scream from my ass stench!"
"I want to hear you cry as I torture you with all my smells."
12131121122112112212111131233.content:
You woke up in a room, one that was clearly still in the Troops hideout given the walls, but with a pile of dirty laundry, a bag filled with junk food wrappers and boxes, and a bin full of soda cans.

Oh and a bed that you were chained to, that was there as well. Clearly only one person could have stayed in this room.

A massive belch reverbed throughout the room from the open doorway as the red head tomboy of the trio entered the room with a soda can in hand.

"Oh, you're awake." She said noticing you were once again conscious. "Happy you kept your voice?"

What!?

"What!?" Your hoarse voice cried much to your surprise.

"Yeah, it took licking Alice's feet and sucking her toes, but I managed to convince her to let you keep your voice." Amy said before finishing the soda, letting out a content sigh, and crushing the can before tossing it into the bin.

"Why would you do that?" You asked hopelessly confused.

Amy smiled. "Because..." She started.
12131121122112112212111131233.title: Amy has you now!

choices: You're not finished yet!
121311211221121122121112.content:
“Well, answer me!”
Darla’s sudden interjection whisked you back to reality, her pompous grin now mere inches above your forehead. You could tell by her relaxed posture and arrogant sneer that she had figured that you were done, beaten and broken by her hand, or rather, her feet. But oblivious to Darla, you were just beginning.
“Earth to loser! Are you even liste-arrgh!”
Your right fist quite emphatically slammed into her cheek, wiping the grin off her face and giving your battered body some much-needed adrenaline.
She nearly tripped over your ankle as she stumbled backwards, now on the receiving end for once. Her celebration now ended, Darla was at a complete loss for words, instead eliciting several high-pitched whimpers.
Jumping to your feet, you felt almost revitalized by your sudden epiphany as the Girl Scout was sent reeling, her eyes still widened in shock at your sudden recovery.
“Yeah, I heard,” you growled, your fists balled as she blindly stumbled back, completely taken aback by your new aggressive attitude.
“You’re not supposed to do that,” she spat out, before trying to continue her advantage with a low kick to your groin, attempting to shut you down before you even get started.
And as she swung her leg in between your legs, you almost gave in, but your instincts fought back. You fought back.
Catching her foot mid-air, you once again pinned her ankle underneath your armpit, causing her to hobble once more. Only this time, the outcome would be much different.
“You never learn, do you?” She spat, before leaping into the air and aiming another enziguri towards the back of your neck.
You could feel the air whistling past your neck as you ducked the kick, keeping her right foot pinned underneath as she rather unceremoniously flopped to the floor.
The back of her skull cracked against the pavement as she landed, her enziguri finally counteracted by your own resilience.
Now on the ground in an ironic role reversal from just minutes ago, Darla was now on the receiving end of humiliation, while you couldn't be more confident.
“Actually, I do,” you retorted as she continued to wince heavily, still holding onto her leg.
Before she could began kicking out at you, you yanked her leg towards you, bringing her within striking range. After flipping her over on her back, you swooped down to deal the final blow, but Darla also showcased her resilience.
In a desperation move, Darla thrusted her knee into your groin, causing you to groan audibly and prevent you from finishing the job. Several pain-induced grunts escaped your lips as you bent down, buying the brunette some time.
With a cry, she reared the same leg back and sent it flying into your face, kicking you away with a well-placed kick. Tasting the coppery taste of your own blood once again, you were forced to stumble back, as Darla clambered to her feet, trying to once again regain control of the situation.
Her mouth bloody and her nose even bloodier, the defiant Darla lifted her leg just as you turned back towards her, maneuvering her leg into one last desperate roundhouse kick. Her bare foot accelerated dangerously close to your temple, surely signaling the end for you.
But not today.
Your right arm instinctively shot up, blocking her kick in mid-air. Her hubris once again dissolved to horror, she could only gasp as you hooked her ankle underneath your armpit.
Only inches away from your ear, you shot her a sly grin as you prevented from from connecting, and this time, she wouldn't have time to counterattack.
With a grunt, you barreled into her with a savage forearm to the face, absolutely clotheslining her. Her agile body quickly grew limp as your forearm collided with her nose, every ounce of your willpower behind that one final blow.
The back of her head cracked off the floor in another sickening thud as her body deflated, her momentum completely broken in two. Now towering above her body, your eyes narrowed as a new capsule of blood exploded in her mouth, streaming down her mouth.
Staring bug-eyed into your new and improved form, Darla was literally a shell of her former self, breathing up and down in sheer fear of your new ferocity.
Not waiting for her to retaliate, you straddled her beaten body, before grabbing a handful of her raven black hair, and jolting her barely conscious form forwards. Cocking a fist above your shoulder, you took a moment to bask in your literal ‘rebirth,’ finally overcoming your sexual fetish to overcome the absolute evil that was the Troop Squad.
Without hesitation, you struck her clean across the temple with a solid right cross, rendering her unconscious within seconds of impact. A line of blood drooled down her lower lip as her head rolled to the side.
Standing up, you almost casually adjusted your gauntlets as you looked at the more agile of the trio, the unpredictable Darla, her arms and legs sprawled to the side as she remained limp.
You would've basked in the glory even longer, had your ears not picked up on some familiar muffled noises to your right.
Snapping your neck behind you, you quickly realized that your mother was still buried beneath the mountain of socks. Even though she was buried neckdown in filth, she still shot you an almost proud look as you finally overcame her captors.
Not taking any chances, you turned the unconscious Darla over on her back, and quickly fastened two handcuffs around her wrists, making sure to hear the familiar clink before doing the same to Amy, who hadn't moved an inch since Darla inadvertently kicked her.
Normally, you’d be worried that she had brain damage, but considering Amy, it would be shocking enough to know that she actually had one.
After breathing once in relief, you turned to your mother, and raced to her aid. Your cape flailed wildly behind you as you knelt by her side, and began pushing the pile of clothing off her frail, battered body.
Within seconds, your mother was free of her putrid restraints. You pulled her from her sweaty prison, grabbing onto her arms and dragging her off like there was no tomorrow. Peeling the duct tape from her mouth, you almost immediately recoiled in disgust as she nearly vomited, after depositing a single sock that the depraved criminals had evidently stuffed in her mouth.
The saliva-drenched sock was shamelessly deposited to the side as your mother took several much-needed breaths to filter through the sweat and foot stink. After panting heavily, your mother leaned on you for support.
“Honey, you’re walking!” She exclaimed after finally getting a good look at you, just as shocked as the Troop Squad was. Her surprise was expected, but welcome nonetheless.
“I got a second chance to make this right, Mom! Noone else is going to hurt you,” you reassured, as she steadily rose to her feet, her legs almost numb from the pressure.
The quintessential “soccer mom,” your mother was dressed in a simple white shirt, absolutely drenched in foot sweat, khaki pants cut off at her ankles, and worn brown ballet flats, which you regrettably sneaked a quick look at.
“I’d be more worried about you hurting them,” she breathed out, gesturing at the now restrained Amy and Darla, who were still unconscious.
Wrapping her arm around your neck, you let her simply catch her breathe for a few moments, and let her simply soak in the glory of her now fallen captors.
“For what they did to you, I would've shoved every single one of those socks in their bloated mouths. Are you okay?” you asked, much more worried about her well-being, not only physically but psychologically.
“Trust me, I’ve been through worse, dear. Let’s just get out of here before I decide to ‘repay’ the favor,” she said, almost brushing it away as you turned towards the exit.
“Uggghhhh!”
The rusted crowbar nearly dented your skull as it connected square between the eyes, knocking you down before you even realized what was happening.
Landing hard on your butt, your eyes widened as you glared at Alice, the “brains” of the three. She was a complete mess! Even though her blonde hair still in disarray, she seethed at you with eyes hateful enough to stare down a demon!
The color completely drained from her beautiful face as the blood from her now broken nose trickled down her mouth, Alice was so livid that you yourself were a bit taken aback. Her clothes, tainted by crimson, were more reminiscent of a scene from Carrie.
“I think you missed a spot, Hawk Boy!” she snarled venomously, brandishing the crowbar in one hand before lunging in for the kill.
You instinctively raised a forearm in defense, but predicting that, Alice cracked down on your elbow with one clean, decisive strike, putting every single ounce of hate behind it.
Howling in pain, you quickly grabbed at your now limp arm, your fractured elbow causing another wave of nearly insurmountable pain. Your face distorted into the proverbial haunted mask as you continued writhing in pain while on the floor.
Now cradling your sprained elbow, you were completely defenseless as Alice drove the top of her foot into your exposed midsection, immediately knocking the fight out of you.
She raised the crowbar to deal the finishing blow, but a sudden voice to the right caught her attention.
“Get away from my son, you bitch!” your mother yelled, throwing herself at Alice despite it all.
And while Alice was briefly taken aback, she quickly regained control of her senses and lashed out at your mother with the crowbar, inevitably striking her across the face as the sound of metal against flesh echoed throughout the warehouse.
With a shriek, your mother faceplanted on the floor, and didn’t move.
Her pure hatred almost radiating from her body, she looked poise to finish the job on your mother, but decided to settle with you instead.
Glowering up weakly, you could only stare futilely as Alice flipped the crowbar over on its blunt end, wearing a vengeful snarl.
“Noooooo,” you murmured aloud weakly, as she brought it down.
121311211221121122121112.title: Refuse to Yield!

choices: The aroma is too much for you to handle! Accept de-feet!
Sudden Intervention!
1213112112211211221211121.content:
No!
A sudden shot of adrenaline coursed through your muscles, giving you the boost you needed to fight back, and end this, once and for all.
Lightning instincts forced your hands to spring up in that crucial moment, catching the blunt weapon before it could connect between the eyes. Your fingers quickly wrapped around the crowbar, pushing back against the ringleader’s more relaxed grip.
The victorious grin that Alice wore quickly dissolved into an almost exhausted groan as she realized that you weren't going down that easily.
Before she could think of an alternative, you let loose with a brutal, unrestrained frontal kick to her jaw.
The usually vocal Alice was completely stumped by your desperation move, her body slackening in the immediate aftermath. The crowbar clanged to the floor noisily as she staggered backwards drunkenly, trying to regain her balance.
In the few seconds after your steel-plated boot had thundered against her jaw, you could see, in slow-motion nonetheless, two front canines knocked clean out of her guns, and flying straight out of her mouth.
“So much for her perfect yearbook picture,” you couldn't help but think to yourself, before clambering to your feet.
“Ow-you bastard!” she whimpered, almost a complete shell of her former self. You could tell that her former condescending tone was completely nonexistent, instead replaced by a more uncertain whimper that recoiled in the sheer thought of the beast that she had now unleashed upon herself.
“Takes one to know one,” you snarled back, using her own words against her.
As you stalked towards her, Alice was undeniably on the defensive, and as such, sought to use her vulnerability against you.
Just when you were about to grab a handful of her hair, Alice suddenly twirled around her heel, suckering you directly into a desperate roundhouse.
It would've connected in fact, had your sheer willpower not overpowered your sexual tendencies, but this time, there would be no easy out for Alice.
Ducking the roundhouse by an entire foot, you patiently waited for Alice to finish twirling a complete circle before coming to a dazy halt in front of you.
Lashing out before she could cover her tracks, you easily knocked her back with a swift right cross across the cheek, striking her with such ferocity that her entire body slackened in the aftermath of the blow.
Staggering back groggily, Alice was as vulnerable as she had ever been, her arms swaying back and forth limply, and her legs struggling to keep her balance. To say that she fallen from grace would be a gross understatement.
Just when her legs were about to give out, you struck her across the face one last time with a swift axehandle, your fingers intertwined as you clubbed her with all of your might.
The emphatic blow sent Alice spinning into a full circle, before nearly tripping over a pool of her own blood, her feet now tainted crimson by the blood flowing out of her mouth. She was in a completely different state of mind, and you were as focused and vigilant as you ever could be.
This was the time to make Alice pay, to make her feel your pain.
Your fists clenched as you stalked towards the groggy Troop Leader, aiming to finish her once and for all. You had had enough of her mind games, and now, you were going to take her down, for good this time.
Even if it took a part of you with her.
“You tied me up. Humiliated me. Made me regret even being alive.” Taking one step forward, you struck her square across the cheek with a staggering left, sending her tumbling to the floor.
“You forced my own mother to be your own personal doormat. Tried to suffocate her under a mountain of your own filth,” you snarled, your words giving you a boost of energy everytime your fist clenched.
“She...she deserved it,” Alice murmured blankly, as she clambered to her feet clumsily. Her voice was almost whimsical, completely devoid of any direction.
“Who made you the judge of that? Who gave you the right to make our lives a living hell? Was it to inflate your ego, or was it because the only way you can feel good about yourself is to tear other people down?” you snarled, punching her once again.
As she stumbled forward blindly, her arms completely limp, you twirled around on your heel and launched a jumpspin kick into her chin with ferocity, snapping her neck downwards.
Her head smacked across the concrete in a resounding thud, her body rolling over. Her Girl Scout uniform was now completely tainted by her own blood. Without a doubt, you had "branded" Alice.
“No….please....,” Alice was begging, pleading you now. Just like how your mother had begged when she dragged her out of her own home. Just like how you had begged Madam Reich for mercy.
Raising your boot to break one of her ribs, you were about to stomp down, when you just stopped, and looked at the whimpering mess that used to be Alice.
Just to see her now pitiful, pathetic state was almost worth everything that she had put you, and your mother through. Stopping almost to amuse yourself, you couldn't help but grin savagely as you noticed the large gap in her mouth, courtesy of her own weapon used against her. As twisted as it was to think about, it almost gave you...pleasure knowing that you had taking away something from Alice that she’ll never get back: her image.
Your bloodied lips curled into a satisfied grin as you came to this conclusion, and put your foot down.
“Please...stop! You win….you...win,” Alice pleaded groggily, her words completely slurred because the blood in her mouth prevented her from talking clearly.
Your eyes narrowed beneath your cowl. “No, not yet. Not until you feel what I felt every second of the past two weeks. Not until you know pain.”
Kneeling down next to her, you savagely grabbed a handful of her blond hair, before violently slamming her head against the concrete, cocking your fist above your shoulder.
“Payback’s a bitch, Alice. You two share a lot in common,” you snarled, making sure to make eye contact with her.
The fist raised behind your shoulder, you almost relished the fear in her eyes as you prepared to further mutilate her face, completely oblivious to the fact that Alice had one more trick up her sleeve. Oblivious to you, Alice had quietly reached into her back pocket, and yanked out something, something that you were too smug to notice in the heat of the moment.
Just as you were about to let loose, Alice suddenly snapped her leg forwards in an act of pure desperation. Her foot connected right between your eyes in a startling blur, catching you off guard while buying Alice some time.
Stumbling backwards blindly, you almost tripped on your ankle while trying to shake away the cobwebs, your back now to her.
Uttering a feral roar from behind, you started to turn back towards the sound of her voice, before a large weight suddenly collided against your back.
Alice literally hopped on top of your exposed back, wrapping her long legs around your torso in a slippery yet firm bodyscissors, serving you weaken you up for her “signature” maneuver.
Just before you could pry her crossed ankles away from your waist, her wrist suddenly snapped forward in one lightning-quick motion, clamping a foul sock against your mouth.
“Noooo-uuuummph!” Your furious protests were muffled beneath the sock, the damp end of the cotton pressed firmly against your nose.
Her battered yet agile body snaking around your much bigger physique, she let her legs do all of the work, squeezing rapidly against your already bruised midsection, capitalizing on the groundwork set by her fellow Scouts.
Wheezing loudly, you found yourself unable to fend off the weary Troop Leader, your arms flailing about wildly as you attempted to grab her hair. In that one crucial moment of indecision, Alice strengthened the hold.
Even more ruthless than before, Alice had abandoned her wounded mannerisms, instead focusing all the attention on pressing the sock against your mouth. On the other hand, you were begging to see spots, which is never a good sign.
A mixture of pure unfiltered sweat, actual dirt, and a dizzy aroma that could only be scraped off the heel of Alice’s foot attacked your nostrils, rendering your vision blurry and your head dizzy. In fact, the aroma was so strong that you couldn't even fight it.
Your gloved hands furiously clawed at her hand, but Alice held strong, grunting heavily to hold back some choice words when your talons raked against her knuckles, drawing fresh blood. As much as you hated to admit it, the smell was almost...intoxicating, perhaps amplified by the fact that the depraved Girl Scouts had already familiarized your senses with the smell of your feet.
In fact, the sock itself was like an amalgamation of the trio’s signature smells: Amy’s pure sweat and adrenaline, Darla’s faded nail polish, and Alice’s intoxicating aroma, creating a foul if not outright arousing flavor that you couldn't resist inhaling.
Somehow sensing your defenses weakening, the dizzy aroma finally breaking through your mental barriers and flowing through your nostrils, Alice hooked her forearm around your neck, while gradually pushing you down to the floor.
Her toes touching the ground first, your back was beginning to spiral downwards as well, the aroma simply getting the better of you.
A downright demonic smile crossed her bloodied face as she watched you continue to squirm and struggle, knowing that the end would come all too soon. The sock still clamped firmly around your mouth and onto your nose, you gave her a look that spoke a thousand words, but Alice held firm.
Soon, sheer fatigue began wearing away at your resolve. You had literally survived the gauntlet, but this might be your Achilles heel.
Your eyes began drooping groggily, your muscles beginning to slacken. Sooner rather than later, you were beginning to succumb to Alice.
“Who’s the bitch now?” she hissed vehemently into your ear, as your world darkened.
1213112112211211221211121.title: You're not finished yet!

choices: The Interrogation!
The Interrogation! (Alt)
12131121122112112212111212.content:
SMACK!!!!
That was the sound of Alice’s skull smacking against the concrete.
Music to your ears.
You had went through quite possibly your most physically as well as mentally draining crucible in your entire crime fighting career. Without a doubt.
The past two weeks for you had been an emotional roller coaster, filled with ups and downs. You had truly been through the proverbial winger, and your mettle had been proved at every turn. No matter what adversity you faced, you always did it alone. You persevered solo, and soared above your obstacles like your superhero namesake.
However tonight, you weren't doing it alone.
As soon as Alice’s vindictive sneer drooped into a startled yelp, you knew that something was up.
Your world had already darkened to the point where your eyes were beginning to roll to the back of your head. Your vision was blurred, and the one thing endorsing your untimely slumber was the aroma of the sweaty sock, still pressed against your nose. For all intents and purposes, you were defeated.
But today was not that day.
The sock peeled off of your skin just as you were about to lose consciousness and succumb to the smell. And just like that, the world reluctantly came back into focus, and you breathed fresh air for the first time in (presumably) minutes, finally free of her foul torture device.
Panting loudly into the floor, you rolled over on your stomach as you felt Alice’s weight stop pressing against your leg. Inhaling loudly, you sucked in as much air as possible, your face distorting into a relieved gasp.
After about ten seconds of simply breathing, you turned over on your stomach, and stared at the ceiling light for a moment. Sure, it was nothing special, but just looking at it seemed to evoke a sense of hope, almost triumph for you.
“Honey, are you okay?” Your eyes widened as you quickly pinpointed the sound of that voice, and clambered to your feet groggily, still feeling the aftereffects of the sock.
Standing up on wobbly legs, you were once again taken by surprise as you saw your mother, towering above her former captor. She was absolutely incensed, her body seething as she breathed heavily at the now face down Alice.
And as a further shock, you noticed that she was wielding the same crowbar that Alice had previously used. Holding it so tightly that her veins bulged in her left hand, your mother looked so angry that she probably could’ve impaled the girl through with it!
“Mom?” You spoke almost hesitantly, as she turned towards you.
She almost immediately dropped the crowbar, letting the metal clatter to the ground harmlessly next to Alice's barely stirring body.
Without words, without any type of signal or warning, you both ran towards each other, and embraced.
There was just something genuine about the way that you two hugged, a certain bond between you two. It was the type of bond that no outside force could break, and no matter what, it was the bond that lasted the test of time. It was the bond between the mother and her son.
Stroking the back of your head affectionately, your mother nearly melted in your arms as you continued to hold her. She was sporting a wide gash just above the forehead, trickling down her hairline and mixing with her tears. No doubt the handiwork of Alice.
Finally, you broke apart, as she wiped the tears from her eyes.
“You did it!” she breathed proudly, referencing to the absolutely decimation of the Troop Squad, once the most feared faction in Footropolis.
“No,” you told her, before turning to Alice. “We did it.”
Despite it all, you attempted to feel sympathy for Alice. But honestly, she deserved everything that she got.
Still lying face down in a pool of her own blood, Alice hadn't moved an inch since your mother had clubbed her in the back of the head. If she was lucky, she would only have minimal brain damage, if she was lucky.
“You didn’t...kill her, did you?” you remarked finally.
Despite the circumstances, that off comment still managed to get your mother to laugh, if only to spite herself.
“Gee, I hope not. I’d hate for you to get a blemish on your superhero record,” she joked back, as Alice finally came back to life.
Still groaning pitifully, she started to push up on her elbows, her blond hair now streaked crimson. Knowing your mother, who wasn't naturally athletic, it was only a concussion. Maybe. However, you wouldn't blame her if she put a little extra...energy into the blow.
“What did she do to you? Before I came,” you asked tentatively, as your mother rubbed her hairline, trying to apply pressure to the open wound.
“I’ve been through worse, honey. Trust me, I’m fine. If anything, this reminds me of a time in college when I was going through this phase at my-” Your mother started to reminisce, before Alice’s groaning and moaning grew louder.
Still fighting back her multiple injuries, Alice still managed to bring up a knee, and somehow start to crawl away. How she managed to conjure up the strength still baffled you, but not as much of your mother.
Fixing Alice with a cold stare, your mother started towards her, but you held her back with one hand.
“She’s not worth it. As soon as we tie them up, the police can deal with whatever’s left,” you pointed out, but your mother gave you one of her looks. She was not going to be denied this.
“You’re sweet honey, but this isn’t over. Not until she says it is,” your mother reassured, patting you on the shoulder before suddenly bending down and bringing up her leg.
You were about to ask her who she was alluding to, but in a startling sight, your mother removed her left flat, unveiling her bare foot.
Almost ironically, you were transfixed by her freshly bared Size 8 foot, now leaving a sweaty imprint on the concrete. As she wiggled her toes anxiously, you could make out dark red nail polish adorning each toe.
“They were working for someone. Someone who “Little Miss Perfect” is going to tell us if she doesn’t want to eat through a tube for the rest of her life,” your mother quickly explained, weighing the flat in one hand.
Biting your teeth, you fought the urge to...relieve yourself upon your mother's bare feet. Obviously, that would be wrong. So you decided to take a more reasonable approach.
"Nice nail polish, Mom," you quickly stammered.
"Thank you honey," she smiled sweetly, before she focused on Alice.
Finally, as Alice begin lifting herself up to her feet, your mother swooped in, and grabbed a handful of her hair.
“Smell this, bitch!” your mother snarled angrily, before quite emphatically slamming her shoe into Alice’s face, spurting even more blood into the air while using Alice’s own words against her.
Easily wrapping her forearm around Alice’s neck, you could tell that your mother was clearly restraining herself, trying her hardest not to snap her neck. Or at least not for now.
After clamping her ballet flat against Alice’s already broken nose firmly, you could see that Alice’s confidence was gone, never to be returned again. Her pawns had been defeated. Her aura of invincibility was no more. Alice, the condescending rich girl, was gone.
As a result, she didn’t even struggle against her fate. Your mother had ironically enough been empowered by her time in bondage, and no amount of Alice pulling feebly at her hair or scratching at her knuckles was going to change that.
Breathing almost out of relief, you enjoyed every second of it. It was revenge in its purest form. What goes around comes around, and all that.
Alice was finally getting what had long been overdue.
Humility.
Finally, the sound of Alice’s breathing reached your ears, as did your mother’s. She was now openly smelling your mother’s unfiltered foot aroma. Her struggles nonexistent, and the sinister glare in her eyes gone, all Alice could do was surrender at this point, and without her entourage, no one else would take the fall.
Her arms hung down limply from her sides as she began inhaling the mixture of oxygen with your mother’s damp shoe. Her legs were literally a step away from buckling, and her eyes were drooping groggily. But your mother was more alive than ever before!
Forced to smell someone’s shoe was humiliating enough, but you couldn't imagine how much it took out of her ego to smell the feet of someone who she had been dominating for the past couple of days. If anything, it completely broke any aura of confidence around Alice, reducing her to the foot slave that she had tried to convert you and your mother into.
“I guess its true what they say,” you said to yourself as Alice was now willingly sniffing through the shoe in order to breath.
“What comes around goes around.”
After taking one last breath, Alice’s eyes closed and she slumped to the ground, unconscious. Her face was a crimson mask, and her entire body was tainted by blood, sweat, and best of all, humiliation.
A satisfied albeit very demented look crossed your mother’s eyes as she turned back towards you, finally overcoming her tormentor.
“You did it,” you told her simply, as she dropped her shoe to the floor plainly.
“No hon, you did it! I’d probably still be eating off of their feet right now if you hadn't came in like you did,” she breathed wearily, as you raised a surprised eyebrow at her comment.
“Long story.” She waved it off, as you walked towards her.
“So now what happens??” you said, nodding towards Amy, who was still face down in a pool of her own blood, and Darla, who was still staring up at the lights.
“They were working with someone. I managed to eavesdrop on one of their conversations before you came,” she told you.
Your eyes narrowed in disgust of the thought of someone depraved and sadistic enough to sic those hounds on you and your family.
“Did you catch a name?” you asked, only for her to turn back to Alice, a coy grin crossing her face.
“No, but I do know someone who did.”
12131121122112112212111212.title: Sudden Intervention!

choices: Elsewhere...
121311211221121122121112121.content:
“Go to hell.”
Honestly, you expected worse.
You had already chained Alice’s arms around the broken conveyor belt, preventing her from making any “escape attempts.” Despite your mother’s protests, you had wrapped gauze around the injury to the back of her head. She had already lost enough blood. If you didn’t apply the pressure, she would start losing brain matter.
Well, any more than usual.
And despite it all, Alice was still lying on her back, with a steel chair propped up on top of her, which your mother just happened to inhabit, and she was still defying you.
You sighed out of sheer exasperation, but decided to give her one more chance.
“Someone hired you, Alice. I don’t know how much she’s paying you, but believe me, whatever she calls a bonus won’t remove the memory of what’s about to happen to you. Tell us who she is, and maybe you can still have some dignity,” you said, crossing your arms irritably.
She wore a resilient scowl. “Confidentiality, dumbass! Lock me up, and she’ll have me out on bail before you the end of this week. You think you’ve got problems now, Hawk Boy; just wait until my family hears about this.”
Your mother glared up at you, giving you a single look. Her eyes spoke of one word: please.
You nodded.
You had (reluctantly) given in to one of your mother’s most persistent demands, which was Plan B in case Alice refused to tell you straight-up. This was Plan B.
“And for all I care, you and your whore of a mother can go fu-” she started to retort, before your mother shut her up, for good.
A single sock, plucked straight out of the mountain, was stuffed roughly into her mouth before she could finish the retort. It was perhaps one of the foulest-smelling ones, and the amount of sweat dripping off the cotton was almost nauseating. So naturally, it made a perfect candidate.
After finding a roll of tape in Alice’s right pocket, your mother had remorselessly stretched the duct tape out to accumulate her mouth, before slapping it over her skin, right after she had stuffed the sock inside.
When Alice realized what was happening, you could see the fear, the panic radiating off her body. She was fearful of her life.
Your mother, on the other hand, had sat down comfortably on a wooden chair, placed strategically atop Alice’s body. The legs of the chair came down on either side of her face. Her forehead had already been bandaged, preventing the open wound from getting infected, but you could tell that your mother clearly needed medical attention.
Alice, on the other hand, was a complete shell of her former self. Forced to not only smell but taste the sock had taken the fight out of her. She didn’t even struggle, or curse at your mother, or do anything to resist her punishment.
She was utterly "de-feeted."
But of course, that didn’t stop your mother from rubbing it in. Ignoring Alice’s pleading eyes, your mother taunted her by dangling her flat above her face, an act that (admittedly) aroused you.
Her shoe bobbed up and down expertly, almost toying with Alice. Again and again, the shoe came off with a convincing pop, almost in a seductive manner, before dangling for a few seconds, her toes clinging to the shoe as it dangled in the air. It was almost breathtaking, a true beauty if any other. She would occasionally balance the heel on her big toe, only heightening the tease for you.
“Wow Mom….nice shoeplay,” you remarked breathlessly, completely captivated by your mother’s sudden prowess of the art.
“Why thank you honey. Something I picked up out of college. Figured it might come in handy one day,” she smiled at you, rubbing your cheek lovingly before turning back to Alice.
Finally, your mother kicked off the shoe, unveiling her fully bared foot. Rolling her ankle clockwise to showcase every centimeter of her perfect arch, you could tell that this was much more than revenge by this point. It was arousing for her as well!
Alice’s eyes told the entire story: full of pure, unadulterated fear.
Her head shook from left to right as your mother teasingly lowered her foot down, relishing every second of Alice’s plight. Silencing her muffled pleas with a condescending toe pressing down on her taped lips, your mother gently rested her bare foot against her face.
Alice squirmed almost comically beneath your mother’s bare foot, her face distorted into a disgusted grimace. If only to further rub it in, your mother continued to smear her sweaty footprint all over Alice’s very vulnerable face.
Tears began freely trickling her cheeks as she was having her own medicine delivered to her, in spades. Her face was now the proverbial footstool, with your mother’s bare foot placed dominantly over her nose, maneuvering her nostrils in between her big and medium toe to maximum the intensity of the aroma.
Alice’s urgent cries beneath the duct tape failed to garner any sympathy from you. To her, this may “overkill,” but for your mother, and to everyone who she had humiliated beneath her own feet, this was karma coming back to say hello.
Inevitably, your mother kicked off her other shoe, and planted both feet on Alice’s face, her giant Size 10 soles nearly swallowing Alice’s face whole.
Your mother’s lips curled into a vindictive grin as she watched Alice squirm beneath her soles, completely defenseless to stop it.
“Smell!” came your mother’s surprisingly authoritative command, which finally snapped the dominant streak in Alice.
At that very moment, a moment that you would cherish forever, the same girl who had forced your mother to lick her heels was now willingly inhaling through your mother’s bare feet, while sucking on someone else’s sock.
You heard the distinct sound of heavy breathing, and so did your mother as well. Alice, completely fearful for her life, began smelling your mother’s feet.
As her toes flexed comfortably in between Alice’s nostrils, she breathed in, and out. She had become the thing that she hated.
As soon as Alice’s eyes darted to you, you knew that the Alice that once tortured you and your mother in the house, the same Alice who tried to downright murder you, was no longer there.
It was over.
You placed a hand on your mother’s shoulder, prompting her to slowly peel her bare feet off Alice, the sweat and dirt still smeared all over her face.
Kneeling down, you casually ripped the duct tape from her mouth, eliciting a pained whimper from the former ringleader, and took out the now saliva-drenched sock, and tossed it to the side.
“You were saying?” you smirked sarcastically, as Alice took several deep breaths.
“Sherri….Dawson,” she choked out shamefully, causing you to raise a puzzled eyebrow initially, before the realization hit in.
Sherri Terri Dawson. Entrepreneur. Influential figure in Footropolis. Founder of her own company, “Fountain of Youth.” Not to mention city-renowned criminal.
Before Reich had temporarily ended your superhero career, Action Girl was investigating a lead on her. She ran a conglomerate of false advertising, several “methods” destined to make an insecure women look half her age, as long as the money was still green. She sold makeup products, expensive spas, just about anything that could attract any naive, insecure women. Not to mention funded created several “nonprofit” organizations that made her out to be a saint, while pocketing the funds in order to build her monopoly.
But she also used it as a front to head several other….professions. While Action Girl failed to garner any specifics, you knew for certain that she had dabbled in the world of meth and other mind-altering drugs. Her brand of beauty did come with a price, and you were meaning to shut her down.
“Keep going,” you growled.
“After Madam Reich….put you on the shelf, she hired us to make sure you didn’t try a comeback or anything. She figured that with you out of the picture, she would have free reign on the market. No more capes to bust up her operations,” she explained hesitantly.
The slits on your cowl narrowed to diamond slits as you finally began to grasp the severity of this revelation. You always knew that as long as you wore the cape and cowl, you were a walking bullseye. But this took it to a totally different level; this was personal.
“Look, I’m so sorry about what happened with your mom,” she also tried to say.
“No, you’re not,” you told her simply, before stuffing the sock back into her mouth, and taping her lips back together.
You stood up purposefully, and began adjusting your gauntlets.
“Honey, maybe you should leave this to the police. You’ve already been through hell tonight. Why go through it again?” your mother tried to point out.
You turned back to her with a newfound confidence. Before, you had let your fetish get the best of you, and look what happened. One jackboot through the shoulderblades, and you were paralyzed for life, or so you thought. Your mother had paid the price for that moment of weakness. Now was your chance to redeem yourself. To prove the naysayers wrong. To prove that this old hawk still has one last fight in him. To save the day.
This wasn't about being Hawk Boy; this was about redeeming yourself. Mask or no mask, you were taking her down.
You gave her the look that required no more words. The bond between you two was simply so powerful that she knew that arguing would only slow you down.
“Be careful out there, Hawk Man. I just got my son back; don’t want to lose him again,” she sighed reluctantly.
“I’ll come back home, Mom. I promise,” you smiled, before offering your hand.
Instead, your mother stood up and embraced you, proud of the hero that you’ve now become.
“I know you will, honey. Now go kick her ass for me,” she whispered into your ear, before tearfully letting go.
Giving her with one heartfelt smile, you turned on your heel, and fled into the night.

1213112112211211221211121211.content:
Bare feet padded across the empty hallway, striding across purposefully with a certain gravitas to them.
It can be said that a lot can be said about a woman out of the way she walks, and with this display, you could write an entire book on it!
Mature in appearance, the pair of feet were definitely feminine, indicated mainly by its pedicured attraction as well as nail polish adorning each individual toe. A layer of dominant orange nail polish was painted on each toenail, only adding to the allure of each foot. Veins popping slightly from the skin, it can be said that attractive feet would belong to an attractive person, and it couldn't be ever more evident in this case.
The woman was almost Amazonian in stature. Towering at only a few inches below six feet, she was a natural redhead, and her body was the epitome of a Playboy magazine. Sporting the famed hourglass figure, she sauntered through the hallway with such confidence, such cockiness that it was almost like a strut through the runway of a fashion show. Constantly swiveling her curved hips from left to right, she was dressed only in a pitch black pencil skirt, which perfectly highlighted her beauty. In contrast, she wore a white blouse on top. The dress stopped a few inches above her knees, showcasing her long, slender legs.
From the neck up, she bore the face of a goddess. Her strawberry hair flowed down freely from her shoulders. The face itself was without any blemishes, not even a bump. Despite her tantalizing figure, and her implied age, she was truly the spitting image of what a model would look like. Not a hair of gray littered her hair. Despite that, no one could possibly mistake her for middle-aged. Her naturally cold blue eyes stared out in front of her, her crimson lips curling into a smile, reminiscent of a vampire.
The house, or more accurately, mansion that she was walking through perfectly reflected her own personality. On her left and right, sophisticated artwork, portraits from centuries long past, were hung with pride. The furniture was Victorian in appearance, giving it a certain timeless edge to them.
Finally, she came across the main chamber of the house, the living room. A circle of polished wooden chairs sat in perfect harmony of each other, with a glass table at their radius. A rug created from the carcass of a bear welcomed her feet as they walked across it, the fur offering some comfort against her soles. There was a single fireplace behind the rug, the flames licking hungrily at the charred wood.
Walking behind her work desk, the woman gently sat down, crossing her legs in an overtly sexualized pose while reaching for a pitcher of champagne. Running a tired hand through her auburn hair, she poured herself a full glass of the celebratory liquid, before delicately holding the cup up to her lips.
A pleasurable moan escaped her lips as she drank the glass nearly half empty, before abruptly placing it down on the cable and reaching down towards her left ankle. With urgency, she began rubbing her sole, massaging her foot only to elicit another satisfied moan.
Pressing her thumb down against the back of her toes, she was in almost ecstasy, until she was suddenly interrupted, and pulled back to reality.
“Hmmphh Hmmphh.”
The sound of intentional coughing caused the woman to glare upwards irritably, only for her scowl to suddenly melt into a smile.
The woman standing before her radiated a sudden aura of intensity about her that she could’ve easily had military experience underneath her belt. Glasses shielding her stern eyes, she was a natural brunette. Dressed in a black business coat with matching white shirt underneath along with a thin black pencil skirt underneath, she definitely sported a lean albeit very muscular build. Her height was bolstered by a pair of sleek black stilettos pointed so sharply that it could’ve cut through metal.
“Good evening, Mrs. Dawson!” she greeted, in such a deadpan tone that implied that it was almost anything but.
“Mercy! To what do I owe the pleasure?” Dawson responded back, in a tone so sincere and rehearsed that it could almost be interpreted as condescending.
Nevertheless, Mercy did not reciprocate that same enthusiasm.
Understanding the severity of the situation by eye contact, Dawson dropped the act, and crossed her ankles, rubbing slightly against the chair leg as she attempted to relieve the itch.
“Did you watch Channel 5 news?” Mercy asked simply, vocalizing her natural-born English accent.
“Why, am I being recognized for the Humanitarian of the Year award again? It’s a prestigious award, don’t get me wrong, and I am honored. But you’d think they’d consider other people. For example, I can personally vouch for Mrs. Vanderb-,” she started to go off on a tangent, before her assistant cut her shut.
“He’s still alive,” Mercy stated plainly, her eyes showing a flicker of apprehension, and rightfully so.
Sherri froze mid-sentence, and gave off a look of both disbelief and anger. Her naturally beautiful face was suddenly marred by an ugly scowl, one that caused the almost robotic Mercy to slightly tremble under her gaze.
“What?” she deadpanned, her voice devoid of her usual cheer.
Mercy took a deep breath before continuing, “The police found their bodies in some abandoned candy factory a couple of miles north of here. They were still alive, but it wasn't pretty. From the initial medical reports, they all had concussions, possible broken bones, missing teeth, and a certain inability to remember their first names, and why they were even there.”
“Amateurs,” Sherry mumbled bitterly, completely oblivious to the fact that they had been mutilated beyond recognition.
“Well, I did advise the cyrokinetic, Frostbite,” Mercy replied, her voice trailing off as Sherry gave her a look.
“You know he’s coming for you, Mrs. Dawson. Even if he is as dumb as his costume, he’ll be able to piece the puzzles together. The Girl Scouts are still in ICU as of this very moment; I fear what he might do to you and me both,” Mercy confessed, venting her hesitancy to Sherry who was now reaching underneath her desk.
“This is what I get for sending girls to do a woman’s job,” she continued to grumble bitterly, before her face suddenly lit up in an evil grin.
“If you want something done right….” she smiled lightly, before dramatically revealing a pair of black sling back high heels. A single strap went around the Achilles heel, allowing for a more relaxed posture within the shoe. The shoe itself exposed her arch and most of her foot, only covering her heel and toes. Polished to a tee, the shoes glimmered sharply against the light emitting from her table lamp.
“Mrs. Dawson, with all due respect,” Mercy started to warn, before Sherri cut her off.
“With all due respect, Mercy, just call me Sherri,” she snapped irritably, before starting to wiggle her slender foot into the shoe. With ease, she wiggled her painted toes through first, before sliding her sole against the leather.
Mercy swallowed loudly, clearing her throat before continuing. “I think it would be in your best interest if we find a more logical solution to this problem. I mean no offence, but this boy left the Troop Squad begging for mercy through broken teeth, and breathing through punctured lungs. I doubt that you’ll fare any better.”
She went to work on the other shoe, sliding her heel in with ease.
“Of course you don’t mean any offense, Mercy. And that’s sweet of you, but I did not become the CEO of the most profitable company in this city because of my drop-dead good looks, and I will certainly not lose that distinction thanks to the actions of some punk kid dressed up like a bird,” she declared firmly.
“And besides, I know what his Kryptonite is,” she purred in a sultry tone, rubbing her arch almost sensually, much to Mercy’s (admittedly) visible pleasure.
“You’re going to seduce him? After everything that those Girl Scouts did to him?” Mercy pointed out, raising a slightly puzzled eyebrow.
“Make no mistake about it, my dear. I would not lower myself to appease his little foot fetish. I will merely break down his ego, and reduce him to a shell of the man that he never was. If he thinks that beating up some girls makes him a hero, then he will find out that I’m far too woman for him to handle. This will merely be an exhibition, nothing more," she declared confidently.
“And besides, I’ll have you by my side, if he does foolishly attempt to resist me,” she added.
“And if he decides to bring his friends?” Mercy pointed out again.
“I know men, darling. And I will know that his ego would never allow him to allow those brats to help take me down. He wants to have that honor himself. And that shall be his undoing,” she smiled, grinning from ear to ear.
Finally, Sherri’s hubris began rubbing off of Mercy.
“What do we do with him, afterwards? The housekeeper is coming tomorrow, and I doubt it’ll be a welcome surprise if she finds a teenaged boy dressed only in his undergarments in one of your closets.”
“I still owe Josey for that ‘unfortunate’ fire that burned down her spa. I’m sure Hawk Boy would do just fine,” she purred devilishly, the true extent of her madness almost alarming.
A sudden beeping prompted Mercy to reach into her coat, and pull out a circular device. It was obviously an alarm.
“He’s here,” she told her.
“Excellent. Deactivate all security countermeasures. The electric gates, guard dogs, everything must be off,” she ordered excitedly, absolutely ecstatic to humiliate the hero at his own game.
“Yes Mrs. Sherri,” Mercy nodded, before rushing off to deactivate the alarm, her high heels clattering excitably as she disappeared around a corner.
Pivoting around on her chair so that she could stare out of the moonlit window, an evil grin crossed her face.
“Are you ready, my love? Do you think you can handle me?” she purred, her taunt directed towards one person: Hawk Man.
“Come and find me!”

121311211221121122122.content:
Amy stomped your head into the ground. Normally you would have received a concussion from the vicious stomp from the athletic criminal, but the blow still dazed you. Darla kicked you in the rib and Alice stomped on your hand. You try to roll into a ball, all you need is a second to recover but the girls don't even give you that.

As you try to curl up, Amy's round house smashes into your cheek and you flop upward just in time for Darla to jump full weight onto your back. Meanwhile Alice grabs your wrist and yanks it around your back.

With a cry of pain and rage you try to use one hand against Alice's two hands. You actually manage to do it but Alice quickly redirects the force you were exerting and using a judo throw she rolls you onto your back. Just in time to see Amy's pretty foot do a downward heel strike right to your throat.

If you weren't tougher then you were before this attack would have killed you. It did cause you to choke and restrict your air for a few moments and in those few moments another dozen blows rained down on your body. Everywhere you turned another foot smashed into your face, kidney, chest, rib, hand or leg.

Even your new improved body couldn't handle the beating. Your failed blocks grew sluggish and the countless stomps on your head made you dizzy. Blood leaked from your mouth as at some point during the beating a tooth was smashed. And still the Troop Squad continued the sadistic beating.

"How do you like my feet now FREAK?"

You whimper in pain as Alice lines up a perfect stomp to your temple.

Alice orders Amy and Darla to pull your legs apart and you helplessly watch as she takes a jump in the air and lands perfectly on your balls. Your cry of anguish unleashes a torrent of mocking laughter.

"Loser!"

"Pervert!"

"Hawk BOY"

"Pathetic!"

"Freak!"

Alice grabs some chain (since rope wouldn't be strong enough anymore) and trusses you up like a pig to slaughter. Your arms are tied tightly behind your back and thick chain is wrapped around your shoulders. Another chain is wrapped around your neck and the three girls drag you by it choking you.

They drag you back into the factory. You see your mother pitifully struggling underneath the massive pile of smelly socks and you realize that once more you have failed.

Alice kneels down and looks you in the eye. "So you thought you could defy me? No one gets away with that. It is time to really make you suffer!" She spits in your face and you try to break free but the chains are industrial strength and they don't budget.

121311211222.content:
Horrible guilt assails your conscious. The mayor of Footropolis is a good man. He cared about the cities poor and worked to keep the criminals you caught in prison. Him dying would be a terrible blow to the city and would unleash a surge of fear in the cities population. It would embolden criminals, who knows what kind of havoc they would then wrack. You knew of course this was all part of Madam Reich's plan.

Even if you wanted to, you know you can't stop her now. She has beaten you too badly, you couldn't stop a common thug on the street in your current condition. The Nazi criminal removes her boot from your neck and lays down flat on the roof with her sniper rifle. You pathetically crawl over to her and began to lick her jackboots. You notice quickly they have become dirty again since your last cleaning.

You humbly begin to clean her dirty boots once more. A submissive thrill shoots through your body as you realize what you are doing. You are lovingly, tenderly licking the boots of an evil sadistic bitch who is right now lining up a shot to assassinate an innocent man you respect. You hear Madam Reich chuckle as she glances back at you obediently licking her boots.

Tears of shame leak down your face as you see her take aim and then fire. "Ja " you hear her joyfully exclaim. You knew she had just changed the fate of the city with one bullet. She kicks your face away from her boots. "Enough for now my little Vogel it is time to leave before the police come. You can barely walk but she hauls you up to your feet and half drags you away into her getaway car.

You feel numb and barely pay attention to the ride back to the evil Nazi's lair. The abandoned warehouse actually had quite a few furnishings. Couch, beds, chairs, and a television. Not that you noticed things too keenly as you were still a bit woozy from the blows to your head. Madam Reich sits down on the couch.

She orders you to kneel before her and you obediently drop to your knees.

"Look at you moping, you are pathetic. I thought you would be happy to have the privilege of worshiping my boots."

Your throat tightens, yes you want to worship her boots but you can't get the Mayor's face out of your head.

"I... I can't believe you killed him. He has done so much for the city and..."

You are cut off by vicious slap across your face.

"He was not of the master race!" She screams at you visibly angry. "He and all the other filth like him will die. The explosions earlier? Hah they were just the beginning. Every man woman and child who is not of the master race will die." She amended her statement, "Well eventually. I will have some kneel and work as slaves to further my ends but eventually the goal is to completely purify the world."

Listening to her you felt sick to your stomach. She was a monster. A living embodiment of evil and you did nothing to stop her!

"What have I done," you ask in horror.

Madam Reich's cruel laughter rings in your ears. "What have you done? You have done nothing yet but watch. But soon you will be a champion in my cause. You will be the one to carry out assassinations. You will be the one to murder the schmutz in droves. Yes you will do it because you will be my complete and utter slave."

"No, no, I will never do that."

She smirks at you. "Oh yes you will. You see I know you will do anything to worship my feet. You allowed the deaths of dozens and the assassination of the mayor just to lick my boots! How much more will you do to actually put your lips on my feet? Now be a good little slave and remove my boots and taste my feet."

She was right, you would do anything to be at her feet.

Feeling lower then pond scum you kiss her boots and gently remove them from her attractive feet. You take a whiff and are immediately intoxicated by the glorious smell emanating from them. You bury your face in feet, inhaling the lovely scent as deeply as you could. Your mouth opens and you begin to frantically tongue bath Madam Reich's feet.

"I knew you could not resist, you are mine forever, say it!"

"I am yours forever Madam Reich!"

"Tell me you want to serve and obey me!"

"I want to serve and obey you!"

"Tell me you worship me!"

"I worship you goddess, I worship you, I'll do anything for you!"

Your goddess laughs in triumph while you continue to bathe her feet with your mouth. You suck her toes and run your tongue all over her feet. In between her toes, her soles, the tops of her feet, literally everywhere. It is everything you ever dreamed of, it is perfection it is utter bliss.

Madam Reich grabs you by the neck and looks down on you.

"I want you to bring me the police chief and his 18 year old daughter."

You hesitate and ask, "What are you going to do to them?"

She viciously backhands you across the face.

"What do you think I am going to do to them? I am going to kill them and you are going to help. You will have innocent blood on your hands. A drop in the bucket, in the end you will be personally responsible for more deaths then even I. You will be the perfect Nazi weapon because no one will suspect you."

Narrowing your eyes, you passed by the front desk before cautiously advancing through the hallway, the ceiling lights flickering on and off. As you passed through the dust tunnel, the beeping sound became more and more louder, increasing with each step.
Sweat began to form on your brow as you kept walking, until finally, you reached a set of double doors, obviously installed recently. The beeping sound emitted from behind those two doors. There was no telling what was in there. There was a swastika symbol painted on one of them, the paint starting to drip to the floor. Painted on the other door was a black skull. “She’s been busy,” you remark, observing the interior of the warehouse. Many of the crates were unopened, and there was a fork lift truck still parked next to the crates. It looked abandoned, if not for her personal lair.
You narrowed your eyes and stared at her real hideout, one of her makeshift stakeouts consisting of a lumpy bed, and a metal chair along with a flat screen T.V. playing the mayor’s recent inauguration speech on loop.
As you started to walk forward to investigate more, your foot bumped against a large circular device, where the beeping noise emitted from. It was some sort of black round alarm device, where the noise was coming from. You picked it up and examined it, the alarm still wailing even in your hands.
“Now, you’re starting to annoy me,” you murmur, turning it over and finding the battery lid. With great joy, you plopped it off and ripped out the battery, along with the wiring. Instantly, the wailing died down.

You walked over to the bulletin board. She had thrown several black darts at each picture, with dates attached to each one signifying when she would take them out. You unraveled the slips of paper attached to each date of her target's assassination. Many of the city councilmen had a date for this week, the city sheriff for next week. Alice turns around, and holds her feet aloft in your face, and you begin to scream. In front of you are feet that are so callused, befouled with foot sweat, replete with corns, caked with long dirty toenails, that at that moment your fetish leaves you completely.

But they never get clean. The corns taste like sweat filled patches of skin, and her calluses begin to stick to your face.

"She cheated," a voice chimed in over the din of the women speaking, with a steely tone.

All of the women looked back and forth at the duo, waiting to see what would happen. The Troop Squad members waited anxiously with excited grins, hoping to see some fireworks, as Pyra, and Icicle, watched cooly. Jester maintained the same crazy grin she'd had since the contest before.

As you watch, mouth still sore, a scowl graces Mighty Mouth's trademark full lips.

"Watch who you calling a HO, punta"! Mighty Mouth exclaimed.

"Whatever.......ho!" Frostbite explained with indifference. "This is a smelly foot contest! And you pulled that little trick out of your bag because you know I have the stinkiest, nastiest feet in all of Footropolis!"

Raising her hand Jester chimed in "Don't be so quick to gloat, teeny foot! I think I have you beat there, my maldrous foot malcontent!!!!!!

Frostbite rolled her eyes, tapping her Ugg on the floor, and you could hear the accumulated foot sweat squishing beneath her peds.

"Whatever. Point being, Mighty, you're disqualified, and you can get the hell out of my house before I give you what Hawk Boy got!"

By this time the duo were standing toe to toe, Mighty with her black ballet flats on, which were too tight on her large feet (you could see those horrendous yet beautiful feet busting out of the fabric), and Frostbite with her trademark blue Uggs on.

"Is that a threat punta!?" Mighty said, her lips inches away from Frostbite.

"That's a pro-" Frostbite said, but she was interrupted by Icicle, who'd stepped in between the duo.

"Girls, girls, girls," Icicle said. "Lets act like ladies. Or something close to it. I suggest a solution to get us pass this impasse. Why don't you duke it out? No powers. Just brawn. Winner stays in the contest, the other gets kicked out. How's that sound? Remember we're all here for the same reason: to humiliate our biggest rival. Lets maintain some civility."

Mighty Mouth and Frostbite stared at each other and nodded their affirmation.

"One thing though," Mighty said with a sly grin. "Loser has to worship the others nasty feet. Hawkboy lapped up my treat, but since I've got these flats on........ well lets say my size 10's are pretty ripe for some attention bitch."

Frostbite looked down in awe at the large set of feet encased in the tight confines of the smaller sized shoes. To mess with Frostbite's mind a bit more, Mighty wiggled her toes, which pressed against the tight fabric of the shoes.

Leaning forward Might whispered in the now shaken villianess's ear "Get ready to suck some toe jam, bitch."

---------------------------------------------------------------------------- -----------------------------------------------------------------

The girls were encircled by the other villianesses, with you watching from afar. The Troop Squad and Jester passed around a bucket of popcorn, which they alternated between dipping their nasty toes into, and threatening to feed it to you when their turns came. Pyra and Icicle watched on silently, maintaining some decorum.

Mighty stood on one side, as did Frost on the other.

"Ready bitch? My toes have been sweating like crazy inside these boots. I can hear them squishing, ready to be cleaned!" Frostbite taunted.

Mighty's answer was a flying jump kick to Frostbite's face, which connected with the girl's mouth.

Frostbite looked up from the ground with a growl, as Mighty stood over her triumphantly.

"Ready now bitch. Toe jam's ready to be licked....." Mighty said.

"RRRRAAAAAGGGGGHHHH!!!!" Frostbite yelled reaching for Mighty.

With a flurry of swings Frostbite missed every one, as the better trained Mighty dodged them repeatedly. POW!! Frost is body slammed by Mighty to the foot sweat drenched floor!

"GET UP FROST!!! Icicle yelled, losing her calm demeanor. "Please don't make her eat your toe jam Mighty! For all that is holy!"

Mighty had picked up the now wozzy and defeeted Frostbite, and propped her against a nearby wall. She looked over her shoulder at Icicle with a smile.
